3390_CD ,_, dated_VBD 11th_CD July_NNP ,_, 1866_CD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD further_RBR circulated_VBN from_IN this_DT Office_NNP to_TO Deputy_NNP Inspectors-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP in_IN Bengal_NNP ._.

Sergeant_JJ Frawley_NNP ,_, who_WP has_VBZ not_RB proved_VBN himself_PRP an_DT efficient_JJ Overseer_NNP and_CC Assistant_NNP to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, has_VBZ happily_RB resigned_VBN his_PRP$ post_NN ._.
An_DT Hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN provided_VBN temporarily_RB for_IN the_DT insanes_NNS ,_, by_IN the_DT occupation_NN ,_, for_IN this_DT pur-_JJ pose_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Dewanee_NNP Jail_NNP ._.
The_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Dunbar_NNP ,_, in_IN commenting_VBG upon_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS Report_NNP ,_, does_VBZ not_RB agree_VB with_IN Dr._NNP Hutchinson_NNP 's_POS pro-_NN posed_VBD alterations_NNS to_TO the_DT male_NN Asylum_NNP building_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP justly_RB ._.
There_EX must_MD exist_VB necessary_JJ precautions_NNS against_IN the_DT escape_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT throwing_VBG open_JJ of_IN the_DT quadrangle_NN would_MD interfere_VB with_IN ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB proper_JJ that_IN the_DT insanes_NNS should_MD be_VB locked_VBN up_RP and_CC crowded_VBN into_IN the_DT cells_NNS at_IN night_NN ._.
The_DT verandah_JJ space_NN should_MD be_VB available_JJ for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC free_JJ to_TO them_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN jhamps_NNS or_CC purdahs_NN might_MD be_VB put_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT verandahs_NN to_TO guard_VB against_IN the_DT cold_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Dunbar_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT concurrence_NN of_IN the_DT visitors_NNS ,_, has_VBZ put_VBN a_DT stop_NN to_TO the_DT recreations_NNS of_IN loud_JJ singing_NN and_CC nautches_NNS pursued_VBN and_CC allowed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Hutchin-_NNP son_NN ,_, conceiving_VBG that_IN the_DT concomitant_JJ excitement_NN must_MD be_VB injurious_JJ ._.
Moder-_JJ ate_JJ recreation_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN is_VBZ salutary_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PRP may_MD possibly_RB be_VB over-done_NN ._.

FROM_IN THE_NNP SUPERINTENDENT_NNP ,_, NATIVE_NNP INSANE_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ,_, Dullunda_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP ,_, INSPECTOR_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, BENGAL_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, FORT_NNP WILLIAM_NNP ._.

SIR_NNP ,_, THE_NNP papers_NNS which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN submitting_VBG herewith_NN will_MD present_VB to_TO the_DT Government_NNP the_DT leading_VBG facts_NNS in_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT Dullunda_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT result_NN of_IN its_PRP$ working_NN ._.
The_DT General_NNP Return_NNP ,_, if_IN it_PRP be_VB compared_VBN with_IN that_DT of_IN foregoing_VBG years_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO present_VB several_JJ discrepancies_NNS of_IN detail_NN ;_: they_PRP have_VBP arisen_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN an_DT attempt_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT record_NN more_JJR exact_JJ than_IN it_PRP has_VBZ hitherto_VBN been_VBN in_IN several_JJ points_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT purpose_VBP the_DT case_NN of_IN each_DT person_NN has_VBZ been_VBN examined_VBN anew_RB ,_, in_IN preference_NN to_TO copying_VBG from_IN the_DT former_JJ Return_NNP the_DT entries_NNS of_IN those_DT included_VBN in_IN it_PRP ._.
Admissions_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
(_( 10_CD )_) The_DT French_JJ system_NN introduced_VBN by_IN Morel_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT symptoms_NNS are_VBP set_VBN aside_RB ,_, and_CC names_NNS are_VBP derived_VBN only_RB from_IN the_DT cause_NN or_CC manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN has_VBZ arisen_VBN ,_, is_VBZ one_CD which_WDT leads_VBZ to_TO a_DT minuter_JJ sub-division_NN of_IN classes_NNS ,_, and_CC consequently_RB to_TO greater_JJR uniformity_NN than_IN any_DT other_JJ ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ really_RB a_DT classification_NN of_IN causes_NNS ,_, not_RB of_IN varieties_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, and_CC embraces_NNS under_IN one_CD head_NN several_JJ forms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, commonly_RB regarded_VBD as_IN distinct_NN ._.
For_IN certain_JJ purposes_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ useful_JJ and_CC accurate_NN ._.
Having_VBG reference_NN to_TO antecedents_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD illustrate_VB the_DT influence_NN on_IN the_DT mental_JJ health_NN of_IN communities_NNS ,_, of_IN their_PRP$ habits_NNS and_CC occupations_NNS ,_, of_IN physical_JJ diseases_NNS ,_, of_IN climates_NNS ,_, or_CC other_JJ circumstances_NNS of_IN local_JJ geography_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN inheritance_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN this_DT manner_NN ,_, if_IN carefully_RB followed_VBN out_RP ,_, may_MD ,_, in_IN course_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, afford_NN trustworthy_NN data_NNS for_IN preventive_JJ legislation_NN ._.
But_CC on_IN the_DT issue_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS of_IN treatment_NN ,_, the_DT comparison_NN of_IN various_JJ methods_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, for_IN administrative_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, are_VBP scarcely_RB less_RBR important_JJ ,_, it_PRP throws_VBZ no_DT light_JJ whatever_WDT ._.
For_IN the_DT risk_NN which_WDT lies_VBZ before_IN a_DT lunatic_JJ in_IN every_DT case_NN but_CC that_IN of_IN inheritance_NN (_( and_CC in_IN some_DT degree_NN in_IN that_DT also_RB )_) ,_, is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB more_RBR connected_JJ with_IN the_DT form_NN and_CC duration_NN of_IN his_PRP$ illness_NN ,_, than_IN with_IN any_DT antecedent_JJ circumstance_NN ._.
Moreover_RB the_DT system_NN of_IN Morel_NNP is_VBZ quite_RB inapplicable_JJ to_TO a_DT country_NN where_WRB the_DT simplest_JJS facts_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT origin_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN are_VBP ,_, in_IN many_JJ instances_NNS ,_, quite_RB unascertainable_JJ ;_: and_CC this_DT difficulty_NN alone_RB appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP to_TO forbid_VB ,_, as_IN useless_JJ ,_, any_DT attempt_NN to_TO supersede_VB the_DT broad_JJ classification_NN in_IN use_NN ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN its_PRP$ admitted_JJ vagueness_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT consequent_NN want_NN of_IN uniformity_NN which_WDT attends_VBZ its_PRP$ use_NN ._.
Among_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN admissions_NNS ,_, there_EX appears_VBZ nothing_NN of_IN novelty_NN or_CC special_JJ interest_NN ._.
The_DT fact_NN which_WDT each_DT succeeding_VBG year_NN brings_VBZ prominently_RB forward_RB ,_, of_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN ganja_NN smoking_NN as_IN a_DT fertile_JJ source_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, is_VBZ as_RB prominent_JJ as_IN ever_RB in_IN the_DT records_NNS of_IN 1867_CD ._.
The_DT districts_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT people_NNS came_VBD are_VBP shown_VBN in_IN Table_JJ 5_CD ._.

(_( 41_CD )_) FROM_NNP JAMES_NNP WISE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, To_TO DR._NNP H._NNP M._NNP MACPHERSON_NNP ,_, Secy._NNP ,_, Inspr_NNP ._.
Genl_NNP ._.
of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Dept._NNP ,_, L._NNP P._NNP DACCA_NNP ,_, the_DT 19th_CD February_NNP ,_, 1868_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_PDT the_DT Annual_NNP Returns_NNP of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ,_, together_RB with_IN a_DT general_JJ Report_NNP on_IN the_DT management_NN and_CC sanitary_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant_NNP Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
Statements_NNS Nos_NNP ._.
1_CD and_CC 2_CD are_VBP the_DT Annual_NNP Return_NNP of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN 1867_CD ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ abstract_NN ._.
From_IN these_DT it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN treated_VBN during_IN 1867_CD was_VBD 293_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 77_CD admissions_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 10_CD were_VBD re-admissions_NNS ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD 210_CD ,_, or_CC 16_CD below_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT previous_JJ 5_CD years_NNS ._.
Thirty-four_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN as_IN cured_VBN ,_, 7_CD were_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, 35_CD died_VBD ,_, 8_CD escaped_VBD ,_, and_CC 209_CD remained_VBN on_IN the_DT list_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 77_CD admissions_NNS ,_, 7_CD (_( 6_CD males_NNS and_CC 1_CD female_NN )_) were_VBD under_IN the_DT Criminal_NNP Procedure_NNP Code_NNP ;_: 70_CD under_IN Act_NNP XXXVI_NNP of_IN 1858_CD ._.
A_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT ratio_NN of_IN cures_NNS and_CC transfers_NNS on_IN the_DT actual_JJ strength_NN is_VBZ apparent_JJ in_IN this_DT year_NN 's_POS return_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN those_DT of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
In_IN 1865_CD the_DT proportion_NN was_VBD 25.85_CD 1866_CD (_( 42_CD )_) admissions_NNS were_VBD only_RB 87_CD ._.
The_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ 25_CD years_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN 96_CD ._.
The_DT largest_JJS number_NN received_VBN in_IN any_DT one_CD year_NN was_VBD 129_CD in_IN 1850_CD ;_: the_DT lowest_JJS was_VBD 63_CD in_IN 1843_CD ._.
As_IN might_MD be_VB expected_VBN ,_, patients_NNS are_VBP generally_RB sent_VBN in_IN during_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ,_, when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ the_DT greatest_JJS facility_NN for_IN transporting_VBG the_DT sick_JJ by_IN boats_NNS ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS yearly_RB received_VBD into_IN this_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ quite_RB insignificant_JJ ._.
Unless_IN when_WRB lunatics_NNS are_VBP dangerous_JJ ,_, or_CC when_WRB the_DT relatives_NNS are_VBP too_RB poor_JJ or_CC too_RB much_JJ occupied_VBN to_TO maintain_VB a_DT constant_JJ watch_NN over_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP are_VBP kept_VBN at_IN home_NN ._.
When_WRB refractory_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP bound_VBN with_IN chains_NNS ,_, or_CC their_PRP$ feet_NNS are_VBP fastened_VBN to_TO a_DT heavy_JJ log_NN of_IN wood_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP never_RB designedly_RB maltreated_VBN ,_, but_CC when_WRB a_DT paroxysm_NN of_IN excitement_NN comes_VBZ on_IN there_EX is_VBZ too_RB much_JJ cause_NN for_IN suspecting_VBG that_IN they_PRP are_VBP inconsiderately_RB dealt_JJ with_IN ._.
The_DT rapid_JJ spread_NN of_IN spirit_JJ drinking_NN among_IN the_DT Hindoos_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN opium_NN eating_NN and_CC gunjah_JJ smoking_NN among_IN the_DT Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, must_MD lead_VB to_TO an_DT increase_NN of_IN mental_JJ diseases_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT returns_NNS of_IN this_DT asylum_NN do_VBP not_RB indicate_VB any_DT such_JJ result_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ explanation_NN is_VBZ that_IN Section_NNP 5_CD of_IN Act_NNP XXXVI_NNP of_IN 1858_CD is_VBZ not_RB enforced_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
People_NNS of_IN unsound_JJ mind_NN are_VBP frequently_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN Dacca_NNP and_CC other_JJ towns_NNS ,_, who_WP can_MD not_RB be_VB considered_VBN accountable_JJ for_IN their_PRP$ actions_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP might_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN commit_NN a_DT homicidal_JJ act_NN ._.
Such_JJ persons_NNS generally_RB gain_VBP a_DT livelihood_NN by_IN begging_VBG ,_, and_CC as_RB long_RB as_IN they_PRP do_VBP no_DT overt_NN act_NN they_PRP are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO wander_VB at_IN large_JJ ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
3_CD shows_VBZ the_DT type_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD :_: 10_CD were_VBD cases_NNS of_IN acute_NN mania_NN ,_, 179_CD of_IN chronic_JJ mania_NN ,_, 82_CD of_IN dementia_NN ,_, 18_CD of_IN monomania_NN ,_, 3_CD of_IN moral_JJ insanity_NN ,_, and_CC 1_CD of_IN amentia_NN ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ report_NN on_IN the_DT Insane_NNP Asylums_NNP for_IN 1866_CD ,_, Dr._NNP Green_NNP remarks_NNS upon_IN the_DT different_JJ classification_NN of_IN mental_JJ diseases_NNS followed_VBD in_IN this_DT asylum_NN from_IN that_DT adopted_VBN at_IN Dullunda_NNP ._.
On_IN referring_VBG to_TO the_DT reports_NNS of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, I_PRP find_VBP that_IN Dr._NNP Simpson_NNP in_IN 1862_CD distinguished_VBD between_IN 9_CD varieties_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT reports_NNS for_IN 1863_CD and_CC 1864_CD 8_CD classes_NNS only_RB are_VBP enumerated_VBN ;_: mania_CC being_VBG subdivided_VBN into_IN chronic_JJ and_CC recurrent_NN ,_, and_CC dementia_NN into_IN primary_JJ and_CC secondary_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1865_CD only_RB 5_CD classes_NNS are_VBP noted_VBN ,_, mania_VB chronic_NN and_CC dementia_NN being_VBG made_VBN to_TO include_VB the_DT subdivisions_NNS of_IN the_DT former_JJ years_NNS ._.

It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN impossible_JJ to_TO alter_VB the_DT classification_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ report_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT monthly_JJ returns_NNS and_CC case_NN books_NNS have_VBP been_VBN filled_VBN up_RP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT circular_JJ letter_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.

Statement_JJ No_DT :_: 7_CD shows_NNS that_IN the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN 35_CD were_VBD between_IN 30_CD and_CC 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN on_IN admission_NN ,_, 31_CD between_IN 20_CD and_CC 30_CD ;_: 5_CD between_IN 10_CD and_CC 20_CD years_NNS ;_: 3_CD between_IN 40_CD and_CC 50_CD ,_, and_CC 3_CD between_IN 50_CD and_CC 60_CD ._.

The_DT cells_NNS have_VBP barred_VBN windows_NNS through_IN which_WDT the_DT night_NN wind_NN blows_NNS ._.

A._NN P._NNP Balance_NNP of_IN last_JJ year_NN ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: ..._: 4,178_CD 8_CD 4_CD By_IN amount_NN incurred_VBN for_IN Wood_NNP ,_, Carpenters_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ..._: 478_CD 3_CD 1_CD To_TO proceeds_NNS of_IN Carpentering_VBG ..._: ..._: 340_CD 15_CD 11_CD (_( 71_CD )_) FROM_NNP SURGEON_NNP R._NNP F._NNP HUTCHINSON_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, To_TO SURGEON-MAJOR_NNP H._NNP M._NNP MACPHERSON_NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP ,_, Inspector_NNP General_NNP ,_, Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Lower_NNP Provinces_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Patna_NNP ,_, January_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1868_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN submitting_VBG the_DT usual_JJ Asylum_NNP Report_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ,_, and_CC before_IN entering_VBG upon_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD draw_VB special_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT fol-_JJ lowing_JJ objects_NNS of_IN importance_NN :_: (_( 72_CD )_) This_DT evil_NN can_MD not_RB ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, be_VB remedied_VBN without_IN either_CC raising_VBG the_DT plinth_NN or_CC removing_VBG the_DT Asylum_NNP bodily_RB to_TO a_DT higher_JJR site_NN ._.
South_NNP ._.
Present_JJ buildings_NNS in_IN thick_JJ line_NN ._.
``_`` Removal_NN and_CC extension_NN in_IN thin_JJ line_NN ._.
The_DT ventilation_NN of_IN the_DT main_JJ block_NN of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP is_VBZ very_RB defective_JJ ,_, and_CC necessarily_RB so_RB from_IN its_PRP$ shape_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, being_VBG that_IN of_IN a_DT large_JJ quadrangle_NN running_VBG North_NNP and_CC South_NNP ,_, can_MD only_RB receive_VB ventilation_NN from_IN the_DT prevailing_VBG eastern_JJ and_CC western_JJ winds_NNS ._.
Therefore_RB the_DT north_NN and_CC south_JJ ranges_NNS of_IN cells_NNS rarely_RB ,_, if_IN ever_RB ,_, have_VBP a_DT breath_NN of_IN air_NN through_IN them_PRP ,_, as_IN their_PRP$ doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS are_VBP all_DT north_JJ and_CC south_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP have_VBP dead_JJ walls_NNS to_TO the_DT East_NNP and_CC west_JJS ._.
These_DT remarks_NNS only_RB apply_VB to_TO the_DT main_JJ block_NN ,_, the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP being_VBG admirably_RB ventilated_VBN ._.
To_TO increase_VB the_DT accommodation_NN ,_, and_CC throw_VB open_VB the_DT whole_JJ building_NN to_TO air_NN and_CC sun-_JJ shine_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB the_DT following_JJ alter-_JJ ations_NNS ,_, illustrating_VBG them_PRP by_IN a_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT main_JJ block_NN ._.
Remove_NNP entirely_RB the_DT north-_JJ ern_JJ and_CC two_CD southern_JJ rows_NNS of_IN cells_NNS ,_, and_CC extend_VB to_TO the_DT northern_JJ the_DT eastern_JJ and_CC west-_JJ ern_JJ rows_NNS of_IN cells_NNS ._.
This_DT extension_NN would_MD exactly_RB compensate_VB for_IN the_DT removals_NNS ,_, and_CC we_PRP should_MD thus_RB have_VB two_CD long_JJ rows_NNS of_IN airy_NN and_CC well_RB ventilated_JJ cells_NNS ,_, accommodating_VBG 60_CD patients_NNS ;_: and_CC from_IN there_EX being_VBG no_DT enclosing_VBG walls_NNS ,_, there_EX would_MD be_VB less_JJR risk_NN of_IN damp_NN ._.
To_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Dewani_NNP Jail_NNP ,_, I_PRP would_MD erect_VB two_CD parallel_JJ blocks_NNS for_IN 40_CD patients_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN extend_VBP the_DT female_JJ block_NN to_TO the_DT south_NN ,_, allowing_VBG accommodation_NN for_IN 40_CD patients_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN 20_CD ,_, as_IN at_IN present_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT Asylum_NNP would_MD be_VB capable_JJ of_IN separately_RB accommodating_VBG 165_CD patients_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 73_CD )_) As_IN usual_JJ ,_, dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh_NN (_( 74_CD )_) I_PRP have_VBP now_RB in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP two_CD or_CC three_CD such_JJ cases_NNS ;_: one_CD in_IN particular_JJ ,_, where_WRB the_DT patient_NN ,_, a_DT Bengali_NNP lad_NN ,_, seems_VBZ overwhelmed_VBN with_IN a_DT sense_NN of_IN his_PRP$ disgrace_NN and_CC degradation_NN ._.

2_CD ._.

._.
On_IN recovery_NN Bustum_NNP Doss_NNP stated_VBD that_IN there_EX were_VBD many_JJ things_NNS which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD prior_RB to_TO being_VBG taken_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT Police_NNP as_IN mad_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP was_VBD deprived_VBN of_IN these_DT ,_, and_CC sent_VBD on_IN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ._.
On_IN writing_VBG to_TO the_DT Deputy_NNP Magistrate_NNP of_IN Balasore_NNP no_DT information_NN was_VBD given_VBN ,_, although_IN duplicate_JJ copy_NN of_IN the_DT descriptive_JJ roll_NN was_VBD sent_VBN ._.

ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP EUROPEAN_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP AT_NNP BHOWANIPORE_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NNP ,_, 1867_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
FROM_IN THE_NNP SUPERINTENDENT_NNP OF_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP AT_NNP THE_NNP PRESIDENCY_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP INSPECTOR_NNP GENERAL_NNP ,_, MEDICAL_NNP DEPT._NNP ,_, FORT_NNP WILLIAM_NNP ,_, BHOWANIPORE_NNP ,_, The_DT 17th_CD January_NNP 1868_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN submitting_VBG herewith_PDT the_DT Annual_NNP Returns_NNP of_IN the_DT European_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ report_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1866_CD ,_, a_DT complete_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN was_VBD given_VBN from_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB it_PRP passed_VBD into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT several_JJ changes_NNS which_WDT it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN expedient_NN to_TO make_VB in_IN the_DT details_NNS of_IN management_NN from_IN that_DT time_NN to_TO the_DT present_JJ ._.
I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP the_DT great_JJ structural_JJ defects_NNS of_IN the_DT place_NN with_IN the_DT reasons_NNS which_WDT render_VBP it_PRP unnecessary_JJ to_TO apply_VB any_DT remedy_NN for_IN them_PRP on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT special_JJ circumstances_NNS which_WDT govern_VBP the_DT admission_NN ,_, detention_NN ,_, and_CC removal_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC render_VB the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN valueless_NN for_IN comparison_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN elucidation_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT origin_NN ,_, progress_NN ,_, and_CC issue_NN of_IN insanity_NN among_IN Europeans_NNPS in_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT preclude_VBP the_DT introduction_NN of_IN an_DT industrial_JJ system_NN or_CC any_DT form_NN of_IN regular_JJ employment_NN such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ attended_VBN with_IN great_JJ advantages_NNS in_IN the_DT native_JJ asylum_NN ._.
I_PRP traced_VBD ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP was_VBD able_JJ ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN despatching_VBG harmless_JJ military_JJ lunatics_NNS to_TO Europe_NNP as_IN ordinary_JJ invalids_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT general_JJ removal_NN of_IN those_DT of_IN European_JJ parentage_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP at_IN my_PRP$ recommendation_NN in_IN 1863_CD ._.
The_DT several_JJ measures_NNS recorded_VBN were_VBD approved_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT arguments_NNS and_CC conclusions_NNS fully_RB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP in_IN resolution_NN dated_VBD 22nd_CD April_NNP 1867_CD ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB therefore_RB (_( 2_CD )_) necessary_JJ to_TO repeat_VB the_DT observations_NNS with_IN which_WDT the_DT figures_NNS required_VBN for_IN the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN an_DT office_NN form_NN are_VBP now_RB presented_VBN for_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ._.
They_PRP call_VBP for_IN little_JJ comment_NN ._.
The_DT year_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN without_IN prominent_JJ events_NNS in_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
The_DT admissions_NNS show_VBP little_JJ ,_, numerical_JJ difference_NN from_IN those_DT of_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
Of_IN 26_CD cases_NNS among_IN the_DT males_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT cause_NN was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR ascertained_JJ ,_, intemperance_NN is_VBZ assigned_VBN in_IN 9_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT reason_NN stated_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ ,_, this_DT attribution_NN must_MD be_VB accepted_VBN with_IN extreme_JJ caution_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ the_DT same_JJ ground_NN for_IN regarding_VBG the_DT self-indulgence_NN in_IN those_DT cases_NNS as_IN more_RBR often_RB the_DT early_JJ manifestation_NN of_IN insanity_NN than_IN its_PRP$ real_JJ cause_NN ._.
In_IN 4_CD instances_NNS injury_NN to_TO the_DT head_NN had_VBD preceded_VBN the_DT derangement_NN ._.
In_IN 3_CD it_PRP was_VBD ascertained_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN hereditary_JJ ._.

READ_VB a_DT letter_NN No_NNP ._.
197_CD ,_, dated_VBD 26th_CD June_NNP 1868_CD ,_, from_IN the_DT Inspector-_NNP General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Lower_NNP Provinces_NNP ,_, submitting_VBG the_DT Annual_JJ Reports_NNS and_CC Returns_NNS of_IN the_DT several_JJ Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP under_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1867_CD ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_DT ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, in_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ a_DT slight_JJ increase_NN ,_, the_DT rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN ,_, calculated_VBN on_IN the_DT daily_JJ average_NN treated_VBN ,_, has_VBZ decreased_VBN considerably_RB as_IN compared_VBN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ;_: the_DT reduction_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB entirely_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN cholera_NN which_WDT only_RB caused_VBD 2_CD deaths_NNS against_IN 29_CD last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT diminished_JJ violence_NN of_IN dysentery_NN and_CC diarrh_NN (_( 2_CD )_) excessive_JJ pressure_NN taken_VBN off_RP the_DT available_JJ space_NN by_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN additional_JJ Asylums_NNP at_IN other_JJ places_NNS ,_, overcrowding_VBG will_MD cease_VB ,_, and_CC with_IN it_PRP the_DT present_JJ excessive_JJ mortality_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ perused_VBN with_IN interest_NN the_DT Table_NNP prepared_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP to_TO shew_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN long_JJ journeys_NNS on_IN the_DT health_NN and_CC mortality_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO show_VB clearly_RB enough_RB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT far_RB greater_JJR liability_NN to_TO death_NN among_IN patients_NNS that_WDT have_VBP recently_RB joined_VBN the_DT Asylum_NNP than_IN among_IN those_DT that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN it_PRP for_IN some_DT time_NN ._.
This_DT seems_VBZ placed_VBN beyond_IN all_DT doubt_NN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN with_IN 197_CD admissions_NNS 34_CD patients_NNS of_IN less_JJR than_IN one_CD year_NN 's_POS residence_NN in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP died_VBD ,_, while_IN out_IN of_IN 190_CD patients_NNS previously_RB in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP only_RB 17_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC that_IN out_IN of_IN the_DT 34_CD deaths_NNS 30_CD happened_VBD in_IN the_DT first_JJ four_CD months_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT Table_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO afford_VB much_JJ support_NN to_TO the_DT theory_NN that_IN the_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ greater_JJR among_IN patients_NNS who_WP come_VBP from_IN distant_JJ than_IN among_IN those_DT who_WP come_VBP from_IN adjacent_JJ districts_NNS ,_, however_RB certain_JJ that_IN theory_NN may_MD be_VB on_IN other_JJ grounds_NNS ._.
The_DT Calcutta_NNP group_NN of_IN districts_NNS avowedly_RB throws_VBZ no_DT light_NN on_IN the_DT theory_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN patients_NNS that_WDT arrived_VBD in_IN a_DT weak_JJ physical_JJ condition_NN is_VBZ greater_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT next_JJ group_NN of_IN districts_NNS one_CD degree_NN removed_VBN from_IN Calcutta_NNP ;_: but_CC omitting_VBG this_DT first_JJ group_NN for_IN the_DT reasons_NNS urged_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP ,_, it_PRP still_RB does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB that_IN the_DT patients_NNS who_WP have_VBP come_VBN from_IN districts_NNS remote_VBP from_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, show_VBP a_DT mortality_NN greater_JJR to_TO any_DT appreciable_JJ extent_NN than_IN that_DT of_IN those_DT who_WP come_VBP from_IN the_DT middle_JJ group_NN of_IN districts_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Payne_NNP contends_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ figures_NNS shew_VBP that_IN from_IN the_DT remoter_NN districts_NNS 25_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
arrived_VBN in_IN a_DT physically_RB bad_JJ state_NN ,_, and_CC 20.4_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
died_VBN ,_, while_IN from_IN the_DT less_JJR remote_JJ districts_NNS 8.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
only_RB arrived_VBN in_IN a_DT sick_JJ state_NN ,_, and_CC 12.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
only_RB died_VBD (_( the_DT 8.3_CD should_MD be_VB 10.8_CD ,_, as_IN there_EX were_VBD four_CD and_CC not_RB three_CD patients_NNS who_WP are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO have_VB arrived_VBN sick_JJ )_) but_CC this_DT result_NN is_VBZ obviously_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT method_NN of_IN grouping_NN ._.
Hazareebaugh_NNP and_CC Pubna_NNP are_VBP entered_VBN in_IN both_DT the_DT remoter_NN and_CC less_JJR remote_JJ groups_NNS ,_, while_IN Moorshedabad_NNP and_CC Jessore_NNP ,_, both_DT of_IN which_WDT materially_RB influence_VBP the_DT average_NN of_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ groups_NNS in_IN favor_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP 's_POS theory_NN ,_, are_VBP entered_VBN ,_, the_DT former_JJ as_IN a_DT remote_NN and_CC the_DT latter_NN as_IN a_DT less_RBR remote_JJ district_NN ._.
Practically_RB Moorshedabad_NNP is_VBZ more_RBR easy_JJ of_IN access_NN to_TO Calcutta_NNP than_IN Jessore_NNP is_VBZ ._.
Assuming_VBG that_IN Hazaree-_NNP baugh_NN and_CC Pubna_NNP were_VBD included_VBN in_IN the_DT middle_JJ group_NN by_IN mistake_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB difficult_JJ to_TO understand_VB why_WRB Moorshedabad_NNP should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT distant_JJ and_CC Maunbhoom_NNP as_IN a_DT less_RBR distant_JJ district_NN ._.
Had_VBD the_DT grouping_VBG been_VBN ,_, group_NN No_NNP ._.
2_CD (_( 3_CD )_) which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB denied_VBN ,_, )_) but_CC which_WDT does_VBZ not_RB support_VB to_TO any_DT appreciable_JJ extent_NN as_IN regards_NNS the_DT ultimate_JJ mortality_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT receipts_NNS from_IN the_DT profits_NNS of_IN labor_NN in_IN the_DT Dullundah_NNP Asylum_NNP are_VBP very_RB satisfactory_JJ ;_: the_DT value_NN actually_RB obtained_VBD being_VBG Rupees_NNP 8,368-2-1_CD ,_, besides_IN an_DT estimated_JJ amount_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 4,437-9-5_JJ ,_, for_IN which_WDT no_DT payment_NN was_VBD received_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_WDT Dr._NNP Payne_NNP attributes_VBZ this_DT result_NN to_TO the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN Overseer_NNP Bancroft_NNP ._.

8_CD ._.

9_CD ._.

Wise_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT lunatics_NNS who_WP escape_VBP ,_, are_VBP excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT number_NN entered_VBD as_IN discharged_VBN cured_NN ._.

The_DT new_JJ ward_NN for_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP was_VBD completed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, thereby_RB enabling_VBG it_PRP to_TO accommodate_VB forty_NN more_JJR patients_NNS ._.

The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_IN Dr_NNP ._.
Wise_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT admissions_NNS form_VBP no_DT satisfactory_JJ test_NN of_IN the_DT real_JJ amount_NN of_IN insanity_NN which_WDT prevails_VBZ ._.

The_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP has_VBZ risen_VBN from_IN Rupees_NNP 81_CD to_TO Rupees_NNP 94_CD per_IN head_NN ._.
This_DT appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN partly_RB due_JJ to_TO a_DT very_RB disadvantageous_JJ contract_NN entered_VBD into_IN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN 1866_CD for_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN rice_NN at_IN 11_CD seers_NNS per_IN rupee_NN ,_, and_CC partly_RB to_TO a_DT general_JJ rise_NN in_IN prices_NNS ._.
10_CD ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) During_IN this_DT year_NN ,_, more_JJR even_RB than_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ appeared_VBN that_IN fatal_JJ illness_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN traceable_JJ in_IN any_DT way_NN to_TO the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.

Even_RB the_DT meals_NNS are_VBP now_RB taken_VBN in_IN an_DT outside_JJ building_NN ._.
It_PRP will_MD not_RB ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, be_VB supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT fatal_JJ cases_NNS traceable_JJ to_TO former_JJ illness_NN represent_VBP the_DT entire_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS received_VBN in_IN a_DT sickly_JJ state_NN ._.

The_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector_NNP General_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Saunders_NNP ,_, has_VBZ proposed_VBN an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT daily_JJ issue_NN of_IN oil_NN to_TO the_DT lunatics_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN ,_, and_CC arrangements_NNS are_VBP in_IN progress_NN for_IN the_DT partial_JJ substitution_NN of_IN wheat_NN ottah_NN for_IN rice_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT dietary_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, may_MD bring_VB it_PRP into_IN closer_JJR correspondence_NN with_IN the_DT former_JJ food_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN persons_NNS from_IN the_DT remoter_NN districts_NNS ._.

General_NNP treatment_NN and_CC management_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) It_PRP would_MD seem_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ now_RB come_VBN when_WRB it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD ,_, without_IN fear_NN of_IN outside_JJ indignation_NN ,_, that_IN personal_JJ restraint_NN is_VBZ good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ in_IN the_DT absolute_NN ,_, precisely_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ effect_NN on_IN the_DT individual_NN subjected_VBD to_TO it_PRP ._.
That_IN there_EX are_VBP cases_NNS in_IN every_DT collection_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN which_WDT mischief_NN is_VBZ ob-_JJ viated_JJ ,_, excitement_JJ tranquillized_VBN ,_, exhaustion_NN prevented_VBD ,_, and_CC unqualified_JJ advantage_NN of_IN every_DT sort_NN obtained_VBN by_IN contrivances_NNS which_WDT effectually_RB hinder_VBP the_DT wild_JJ and_CC dangerous_JJ movements_NNS of_IN a_DT maniac_NN without_IN putting_VBG him_PRP to_TO any_DT sort_NN of_IN pain_NN or_CC injury_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN which_WDT admits_VBZ of_IN no_DT doubt_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO refrain_VB from_IN employing_VBG such_JJ means_NNS in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS would_MD be_VB to_TO leave_VB the_DT sufferers_NNS to_TO the_DT dictates_NNS of_IN prejudice_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN fatal_JJ an_DT error_NN as_IN to_TO reintroduce_VB the_DT cruelties_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ century_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ because_IN I_PRP fear_VBP that_IN in_IN reporting_VBG annually_RB on_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT modern_JJ non-restraint_JJ system_NN in_IN this_DT Asylum_NNP ,_, I_PRP may_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT supposition_NN that_IN no_DT person_NN is_VBZ ever_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT place_NN with_IN his_PRP$ limbs_NNS confined_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB to_TO a_DT false_JJ impression_NN ,_, that_IN I_PRP desire_VBP to_TO make_VB mention_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN now_RB ._.
Not_RB only_RB has_VBZ it_PRP been_VBN the_DT invariable_JJ practice_NN to_TO hinder_VB lunatics_NNS ,_, who_WP suffer_VBP from_IN ulcers_NNS which_WDT they_PRP injure_VBP with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, from_IN doing_VBG so_RB by_IN confining_VBG their_PRP$ arms_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ sides_NNS with_IN broad_JJ bandages_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN occasionally_RB thought_VBN proper_IN to_TO control_VB maniacal_JJ frenzy_NN by_IN fixing_VBG the_DT maniac_NN on_IN a_DT mattress_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT broad_JJ sheet_NN covering_VBG his_PRP$ entire_JJ body_NN ._.
Such_JJ a_DT procedure_NN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN at_IN once_RB ,_, entirely_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT objection_NN which_WDT attaches_VBZ to_TO all_DT contrivances_NNS which_WDT cramp_VBP or_CC strain_VBP the_DT joints_NNS ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB produce_JJ suffering_NN ._.
It_PRP needs_VBZ only_RB to_TO be_VB guarded_VBN from_IN being_VBG too_RB readily_RB and_CC injudiciously_RB employed_VBN ,_, or_CC too_RB long_JJ continued_VBD ,_, to_TO become_VB a_DT most_RBS humane_JJ and_CC useful_JJ measure_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN to_TO be_VB at_IN Dullunda_NNP ._.
Lately_RB a_DT very_RB convenient_JJ sub-_JJ stitute_NN for_IN the_DT broad_JJ sheet_NN ,_, in_IN cases_NNS requiring_VBG only_RB the_DT prevention_NN of_IN exhausting_VBG movements_NNS ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN devised_VBN by_IN the_DT Overseer_NNP ._.
It_PRP consists_VBZ merely_RB of_IN a_DT long_JJ canvas_NN bag_NN with_IN a_DT collar_JJ fitting_NN loosely_RB on_IN the_DT neck_NN ,_, sufficiently_RB wide_JJ to_TO prevent_VB any_DT very_RB active_JJ or_CC dangerous_JJ movement_NN of_IN the_DT limbs_NNS ,_, without_IN preventing_VBG such_JJ change_NN of_IN posture_NN as_IN is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN relief_NN ._.
This_DT bag_NN envelopes_VBZ the_DT whole_JJ person_NN except_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ edges_NNS are_VBP made_VBN fast_RB by_IN strong_JJ tapes_NNS to_TO the_DT cot_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT mattress_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN ._.
Not_RB only_RB are_VBP such_JJ methods_NNS as_IN these_DT advantageous_JJ and_CC free_JJ from_IN mischief_NN in_IN the_DT restraint_NN they_PRP effect_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP can_MD be_VB employed_VBN in_IN a_DT verandah_NN or_CC any_DT well_RB ventilated_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB the_DT lunatic_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN free_JJ from_IN padded_VBN rooms_NNS and_CC other_JJ places_NNS for_IN close_JJ seclusion_NN which_WDT are_VBP used_VBN in_IN Europe_NNP ,_, but_CC in_IN an_DT Indian_JJ climate_NN are_VBP quite_RB inadmissible_JJ ._.
Having_VBG used_VBN the_DT broad_JJ sheet_NN for_IN years_NNS in_IN the_DT manner_NN I_PRP have_VBP described_VBN with_IN good_JJ effect_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO find_VB that_IN its_PRP$ employment_NN is_VBZ now_RB openly_RB advocated_VBN by_IN writers_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN in_IN England_NNP ._.

I_PRP can_MD add_VB nothing_NN to_TO the_DT testimony_NN which_WDT I_PRP offered_VBD last_JJ year_NN to_TO the_DT character_NN and_CC conduct_NN of_IN Overseer_NNP Bancroft_NNP ._.

Unfortunately_RB he_PRP is_VBZ greatly_RB hampered_VBN by_IN the_DT office_NN work_NN that_WDT is_VBZ thrown_VBN on_IN him_PRP by_IN the_DT great_JJ variety_NN of_IN labour_NN now_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT multitude_NN of_IN petty_JJ cash_NN transactions_NNS during_IN the_DT day_NN ._.

Dacca_NNP ,_, 9th_CD January_NNP 1869_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_PDT the_DT Annual_NNP Returns_NNP of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD ,_, together_RB with_IN a_DT general_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT management_NN and_CC sanitary_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant_NNP Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
Statements_NNS Nos_NNP ._.
1_CD and_CC 2_CD are_VBP the_DT Annual_NNP Return_NNP of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN in_IN 1868_CD and_CC its_PRP$ abstracts_NNS ._.
From_IN these_DT it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS treated_VBN during_IN 1868_CD was_VBD 321_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 112_CD admissions_NNS (_( 90_CD males_NNS and_CC 22_CD females_NNS )_) ,_, of_IN which_WDT 13_CD were_VBD re-admis-_JJ sions_NNS (_( 11_CD males_NNS and_CC 2_CD females_NNS )_) ;_: the_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN strength_NN was_VBD 200_CD (_( 166_CD males_NNS and_CC 34_CD females_NNS )_) ;_: the_DT average_JJ strength_NN during_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN was_VBD 210_CD ._.
Forty-one_CD lunatics_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 14_CD were_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, 45_CD died_VBD ,_, 8_CD escaped_VBD ,_, and_CC 213_CD remained_VBN on_IN the_DT register_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
During_IN 1868_CD the_DT admissions_NNS were_VBD 35_CD over_IN those_DT of_IN 1867_CD ._.
This_DT was_VBD caused_VBN by_IN a_DT misapprehension_NN of_IN the_DT Order_NNP of_IN Government_NNP No_NNP ._.
5431_CD ,_, dated_VBD 13th_CD November_NNP 1868_CD ._.
Many_JJ persons_NNS whose_WP$ insanity_NN was_VBD of_IN long_JJ standing_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ relations_NNS were_VBD willing_JJ and_CC able_JJ to_TO support_VB them_PRP ,_, were_VBD forwarded_VBN to_TO the_DT Asylum_NNP ;_: several_JJ of_IN these_DT have_VBP already_RB been_VBN transferred_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ,_, security_NN being_VBG taken_VBN that_IN they_PRP will_MD be_VB properly_RB looked_VBN after_IN ._.
New_NNP orders_NNS have_VBP been_VBN issued_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Police_NNP are_VBP instructed_VBN to_TO forward_VB only_RB those_DT lunatics_NNS who_WP are_VBP of_IN dangerous_JJ tendencies_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 112_CD admissions_NNS ,_, 14_CD (_( all_DT males_NNS )_) were_VBD under_IN the_DT Criminal_NNP Procedure_NNP Code_NNP ;_: 98_CD under_IN Act_NNP XXXVI_NNP of_IN 1858_CD ._.
The_DT re-admissions_NNS were_VBD less_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN usual_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT previous_JJ five_CD years_NNS they_PRP averaged_VBD 17_CD annually_RB ._.
Of_IN the_DT re-admissions_NNS ,_, one_CD ,_, a_DT gunjah-seller_NN ,_, came_VBD in_IN for_IN the_DT seventh_JJ time_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT thin_JJ ,_, spare_JJ man_NN ,_, aged_VBN about_IN 60_CD years_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN intelligence_NN and_CC energy_NN ._.
Six_CD were_VBD re-admitted_VBN within_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN their_PRP$ discharge_NN ,_, two_CD within_IN two_CD years_NNS ;_: two_CD after_IN four_CD years_NNS ;_: one_CD after_IN seven_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD after_IN eight_CD years_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT 13_CD persons_NNS ,_, six_CD were_VBD addicted_VBN to-_JJ gunjah_NN ,_, four_CD to_TO gunjah_VB and_CC spirits_NNS ,_, two_CD to_TO spirits_VB alone_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT habits_NNS of_IN one_CD could_MD not_RB be_VB ascertained_VBN ._.
The_DT escapes_NNS this_DT year_NN are_VBP the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN 1867_CD ._.
Until_IN a_DT wall_NN of_IN sufficient_JJ height_NN is_VBZ :_: con-_JJ structed_VBD all_DT round_VBP the_DT Asylum_NNP ,_, or_CC a_DT fence_NN ,_, fixed_VBN on_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ wall_NN ,_, is_VBZ set_VBN up_RP ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO prevent_VB lunatics_NNS from_IN occasionally_RB escaping_VBG ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
3_CD shows_VBZ the_DT type_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD ._.
The_DT classification_NN followed_VBD is_VBZ that_DT contained_VBN in_IN circular_JJ memo_NN ._.
No_DT ._.
31_CD ,_, dated_VBD 4th_CD August_NNP 1868_CD ,_, from_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
The_DT varied_JJ forms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN can_MD with_IN difficulty_NN be_VB brought_VBN under_IN certain_JJ fixed_JJ classes_NNS ._.
Among_IN natives_NNS especially_RB ,_, the_DT various_JJ forms_NNS of_IN mania_NN approximate_VBP so_RB nearly_RB to_TO one_CD another_DT that_IN the_DT shades_NNS of_IN difference_NN become_VBN ill-defined_JJ ._.
The_DT temporary_JJ wild_JJ incoherent_NN delirium_NN ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN gunjah-smoking_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT subsequent_JJ restless_NN ,_, noisy_RB ,_, manageable_JJ ,_, but_CC brief_NN ,_, excitement_NN produced_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ (_( 21_CD )_) cause_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB classified_VBN under_IN one_CD and_CC the_DT same_JJ head_NN of_IN acute_JJ mania_NN ;_: yet_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT other_JJ class_NN under_IN which_WDT such_JJ cases_NNS can_MD more_VB properly_RB be_VB placed_VBN ._.
The_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ orders_NNS have_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, been_VBN implicitly_RB followed_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT returns_NNS for_IN 1868_CD ._.

This_DT year_NN 14_CD individuals_NNS (_( 11_CD males_NNS and_CC 3_CD females_NNS )_) ,_, chiefly_JJ Dhangurs_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN admitted_VBN ._.

7_CD shows_NNS that_RB ,_, as_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, the_DT largest_JJS proportion_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS admitted_VBN were_VBD between_IN 30_CD and_CC 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ;_: next_JJ in_IN frequency_NN were_VBD persons_NNS between_IN 20_CD and_CC 30_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC between_IN 40_CD and_CC 50_CD years_NNS ._.

Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
8_CD shows_VBZ the_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT mortality_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ period_NN of_IN confinement_NN at_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN each_DT death_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, 45_CD deaths_NNS ,_, 22.5_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, occurred_VBD out_IN of_IN a_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN 200_CD inmates_NNS (_( 22_CD )_) constructed_VBN for_IN only_RB 20_CD ._.
The_DT ventilation_NN of_IN the_DT ward_NN is_VBZ free_JJ ,_, the_DT cubic_JJ space_NN for_IN each_DT individual_NN is_VBZ liberal_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT tiled_JJ floor_NN is_VBZ clean_JJ and_CC dry_JJ ._.
As_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN advanced_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD observed_VBN that_IN cholera_NN was_VBD much_RB more_JJR frequent_JJ in_IN this_DT ward_NN than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ dormitory_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ explanation_NN of_IN this_DT peculiarity_NN was_VBD that_IN the_DT inmates_NNS suffered_VBD from_IN the_DT cold_JJ night_NN air_NN blowing_VBG upon_IN them_PRP from_IN beneath_IN the_DT eaves_NNS of_IN the_DT building_NN ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN this_DT opening_NN was_VBD closed_VBN on_IN the_DT northern_JJ side_NN ,_, sickness_NN ceased_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT women_NNS became_VBD as_RB healthy_JJ as_IN the_DT other_JJ inmates_NNS ._.
Tubercular_JJ diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT lungs_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, were_VBD more_RBR frequent_JJ than_IN usual_JJ ._.
Of_IN the_DT 10_CD deaths_NNS from_IN this_DT cause_NN ,_, six_CD were_VBD males_NNS ,_, four_CD females_NNS ;_: one_CD had_VBD been_VBN 7_CD days_NNS ,_, two_CD ,_, 2_CD months_NNS ;_: one_CD 10_CD months_NNS ,_, three_CD 4_CD years_NNS ;_: one_CD 6_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC two_CD 15_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
The_DT average_JJ age_NN of_IN the_DT males_NNS was_VBD 38_CD years_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT females_NNS 43_CD ._.
Ten_CD of_IN the_DT casualties_NNS are_VBP referred_VBN to_TO cachexia_VB ._.
At_IN the_DT post-mortem_JJ examinations_NNS sub-arachnoid_JJ serous_JJ effusion_NN was_VBD found_VBN in_IN eight_CD cases_NNS ;_: decolorised_VBN fibrinous_JJ clots_NNS in_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN of_IN heart_NN in_IN six_CD ;_: old_JJ pleuritic_JJ disease_NN in_IN two_CD ;_: tubercular_JJ deposit_NN in_IN lungs_NNS in_IN three_CD ;_: gangrene_NN of_IN lung_NN in_IN one_CD ;_: ``_`` Nutmeg_NNP ''_'' liver_NN in_IN two_CD ;_: and_CC congestion_NN and_CC ulceration_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ intestines_NNS in_IN six_CD ._.
The_DT three_CD casualties_NNS returned_VBD as_IN chronic_JJ meningitis_NN might_MD have_VB been_VBN classed_VBN under_IN the_DT head_NN cachexia_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT symptoms_NNS during_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pathological_JJ changes_NNS in_IN the_DT membranes_NNS of_IN the_DT brain_NN observed_VBD after_IN death_NN ,_, all_DT indicated_VBD that_IN the_DT disease_NN of_IN which_WDT they_PRP died_VBD was_VBD a_DT low_JJ inflammation_NN of_IN the_DT meninges_NNS ._.
The_DT man_NN who_WP died_VBD of_IN general_JJ paralysis_NN was_VBD a_DT most_RBS instructive_JJ case_NN ._.
He_PRP arrived_VBD from_IN Kamroop_NNP on_IN the_DT 29th_CD July_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP died_VBD with_IN all_PDT the_DT advanced_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN on_IN the_DT 7th_JJ October_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, an_DT oilman_NN by_IN trade_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ insanity_NN was_VBD referred_VBN to_TO the_DT desertion_NN of_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD several_JJ epileptic_JJ fits_NNS while_IN in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
The_DT right_NN hemisphere_NN was_VBD found_VBN after_IN death_NN softened_VBD and_CC an_DT (_( 23_CD )_) perhaps_RB more_RBR deadly_RB than_IN in_IN any_DT former_JJ year_NN ._.
Cholera_NN ,_, as_IN has_VBZ often_RB been_VBN remarked_VBN ,_, is_VBZ more_RBR liable_JJ to_TO appear_VB among_IN lunatics_NNS than_IN among_IN any_DT other_JJ class_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
Table_JJ 14_CD shows_VBZ the_DT greater_JJR prevalence_NN of_IN cholera_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ 28_CD years_NNS among_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP than_IN among_IN the_DT prisoners_NNS in_IN the_DT adjacent_JJ jail_NN ._.
This_DT liability_NN appears_VBZ due_JJ to_TO several_JJ causes_NNS ;_: (_( 24_CD )_) There_EX is_VBZ an_DT increase_NN under_IN the_DT heads_NNS of_IN Establishment_NNP and_CC Clothing_NNP ;_: the_DT former_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT augmentation_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS salary_NN ;_: the_DT latter_NN from_IN the_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT price_NN of_IN blankets_NNS ._.

13_CD is_VBZ a_DT nominal_JJ return_NN of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN under_IN treatment_NN during_IN 1868_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 321_CD lunatics_NNS treated_VBD 45_CD ,_, or_CC 14.0_CD ,_, were_VBD criminals_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1868_CD there_EX were_VBD 32_CD in_IN confinement_NN ,_, 14_CD were_VBD admitted_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, four_CD died_VBD ,_, three_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN ,_, one_CD was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO Burrisaul_NNP to_TO stand_VB his_PRP$ trial_NN ,_, one_CD was_VBD found_VBN not_RB to_TO be_VB a_DT criminal_JJ ,_, although_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN borne_VBN on_IN the_DT roll_NN for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ,_, leaving_VBG 37_CD in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1869_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 45_CD treated_VBD ,_, 42_CD were_VBD males_NNS ,_, only_RB three_CD females_NNS ._.
Conduct_NN of_IN Establish-_NNP ment_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Blackwell_NNP ,_, the_DT Overseer_NNP ,_, has_VBZ continued_VBN to_TO give_VB entire_JJ satisfaction_NN ._.
Through_IN his_PRP$ exer-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, the_DT new_JJ land_NN added_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT Asylum_NNP ,_, which_WDT in_IN August_NNP was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN native_JJ houses_NNS ,_, was_VBD by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN transformed_VBD into_IN a_DT productive_JJ kitchen_NN garden_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ steady_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ habits_NNS and_CC attentive_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ kind_NN to_TO the_DT lunatics_NNS and_CC manages_VBZ them_PRP with_IN tact_NN and_CC firmness_NN ._.
Native_JJ Doctor_NNP Ram_NNP Persaud_NNP Sein_NNP having_VBG resigned_VBD his_PRP$ appointment_NN ,_, his_PRP$ place_NN has_VBZ been_VBN filled_VBN by_IN Native_NNP Doctor_NNP Elahi_NNP Bux_NNP ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP that_IN I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO say_VB anything_NN in_IN favour_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ officer_NN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB unfit_JJ for_IN the_DT post_NN ._.
He_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN attached_VBN for_IN years_NNS to_TO a_DT survey_NN party_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ professional_JJ knowledge_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB very_RB defective_JJ ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ apathetic_JJ ,_, idle_JJ ,_, and_CC careless_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
An_DT Asylum_NN with_IN over_IN 200_CD lunatics_NNS requires_VBZ the_DT services_NNS of_IN an_DT intelligent_NN and_CC painstaking_VBG Native_NNP Doctor_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT salary_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS 40_CD Rupees_NNS per_IN mensem_NN ._.
This_DT appears_VBZ undeniable_JJ ,_, and_CC without_IN such_PDT a_DT resident_JJ Native_NNP Doctor_NNP the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB properly_RB carried_VBN on_IN ._.
With_IN the_DT keepers_NNS of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO find_VB fault_NN with_IN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP ,_, however_RB ,_, wretchedly_RB paid_VBD (_( 5_CD Rupees_NNS a_DT month_NN )_) ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP on_IN duty_NN for_IN 12_CD hours_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT 24_CD ._.
The_DT large_JJ majority_NN belong_NN to_TO the_DT low_JJ Mahomedan_NNP class_NN so_RB common_JJ in_IN Dacca_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP very_RB neglectful_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, hence_RB the_DT frequency_NN of_IN escapes_NNS from_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP addicted_VBN to_TO opium-eating_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT instances_NNS to_TO gunjah-smoking_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP have_VBP no_DT method_NN or_CC tact_NN in_IN their_PRP$ management_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
To_TO induce_VB a_DT better_JJR stamp_NN of_IN men_NNS to_TO take_VB service_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO raise_VB the_DT pay_NN to_TO 6_CD or_CC even_RB 7_CD Rupees_NNS a_DT month_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT Dhullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO grant_VB a_DT superannuation_NN pension_NN after_IN long_JJ service_NN ._.
Occupations_NNS ._.
During_IN 1868_CD there_EX was_VBD a_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN (_( 25_CD )_) Between_NNP August_NNP and_CC the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS were_VBD daily_RB engaged_VBN in_IN levelling_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN filling_VBG up_RP the_DT wells_NNS and_CC cess-pools_NNS in_IN the_DT new_JJ ground_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN added_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT old_JJ garden_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN December_NNP this_DT land_NN ,_, which_WDT embraces_VBZ 2_CD acres_NNS ,_, was_VBD all_DT under_IN cultivation_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT most_RBS productive_JJ kitchen-garden_NN it_PRP made_VBD ._.
This_DT change_NN was_VBD accomplished_VBN by_IN lunatic_JJ labour_NN alone_RB ._.
Several_JJ of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS have_VBP become_VBN good_JJ gardeners_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT open_JJ air_NN work_NN has_VBZ already_RB had_VBD a_DT beneficial_JJ effect_NN on_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN those_DT so_IN engaged_JJ ._.
Nautches_NNS have_VBP been_VBN regularly_RB held_VBN every_DT fortnight_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP looked_JJ for-_JJ ward_NN to_TO with_IN great_JJ eagerness_NN ._.
With_IN proper_JJ supervision_NN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT risk_NN of_IN their_PRP$ becoming_VBG prejudicial_NN to_TO the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT long_JJ evenings_NNS of_IN the_DT cold_JJ season_NN any_DT amusement_NN which_WDT breaks_VBZ in_IN upon_IN the_DT monotonous_JJ life_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS must_MD have_VB a_DT beneficial_JJ influence_NN on_IN their_PRP$ mental_JJ condition_NN ._.
Payment_NN of_IN the_DT main-_JJ tenance_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ._.
The_DT want_NN of_IN any_DT national_JJ game_NN in_IN which_WDT young_JJ and_CC old_JJ can_MD participate_VB is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ draw-_JJ back_NN in_IN India_NNP to_TO the_DT treatment_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ._.
During_IN 1868_CD the_DT sum_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
95-4-0_CD has_VBZ been_VBN received_VBN and_CC credited_VBN to_TO Government_NNP ._.
From_IN the_DT Rajah_NNP of_IN Cooch_NNP Behar_NNP Rs_NNP ._.
65-12-0_JJ were_VBD sent_VBN for_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD admitted_VBN for_IN the_DT seventh_JJ time_NN ,_, voluntarily_RB paid_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
21_CD for_IN the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ subsistence_NN while_IN in_IN confinement_NN ._.
The_DT re-_JJ mainder_NN ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
8-8-0_JJ ,_, was_VBD recovered_VBN by_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN Backergunge_NNP from_IN the_DT estate_NN of_IN a_DT rich_JJ Talookdar_NNP of_IN that_DT district_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB in_IN exceptional_JJ cases_NNS that_IN the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ can_MD be_VB realized_VBN ._.
The_DT classes_NNS who_WP furnish_VBP the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN Asylums_NNP are_VBP poor_JJ ,_, and_CC are_VBP unable_JJ to_TO support_VB the_DT family_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN to_TO defray_VB the_DT expenses_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ ._.
Sanitary_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
In_IN April_NNP the_DT Executive_NNP Engineer_NNP commenced_VBD to_TO construct_VB a_DT large_JJ new_JJ ward_NN with_IN 20_CD cells_NNS ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG 40_CD female_JJ lunatics_NNS ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT want_NN of_IN materials_NNS ,_, this_DT building_NN has_VBZ been_VBN advancing_VBG slowly_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN it_PRP had_VBD only_RB been_VBN raised_VBN above_IN the_DT level_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
The_DT alterations_NNS in_IN the_DT doors_NNS and_CC flooring_NN of_IN the_DT solitary_JJ cells_NNS have_VBP also_RB been_VBN delayed_VBN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN only_RB seven_CD had_VBD been_VBN finished_VBN ._.
These_DT cells_NNS ,_, with_IN their_PRP$ ornamental_JJ iron_NN doors_NNS and_CC asphalt_NN flooring_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB healthy_JJ quarters_NNS when_WRB compared_VBN with_IN the_DT old_JJ badly_RB ventilated_VBD apartments_NNS which_WDT they_PRP supersede_VBP ._.
The_DT accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT male_NN lunatics_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB inadequate_JJ during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN cholera_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ worst_JJS ,_, many_JJ of_IN the_DT dormitories_NNS were_VBD dangerously_RB crowded_VBN ._.
On_IN re-_JJ ducing_VBG the_DT numbers_NNS to_TO a_DT safe_JJ standard_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN 100_CD were_VBD without_IN any_DT accommodation_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO place_VB them_PRP at_IN night_NN in_IN the_DT verandah_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD exposed_VBN to_TO cold_VB and_CC damp_VB night_NN air_NN ._.
The_DT better_JJR health_NN enjoyed_VBN by_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS after_IN the_DT Jail_NNP Hospital_NNP was_VBD given_VBN up_RP to_TO them_PRP ,_, shows_VBZ that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT chief_NN wants_VBZ in_IN this_DT Asylum_NNP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ room_NN for_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT new_JJ buildings_NNS are_VBP completed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT altered_JJ cells_NNS become_VBP available_JJ ,_, the_DT mor-_JJ tality_NN among_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS will_MD in_IN every_DT likelihood_NN be_VB reduced_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Asylum_NNP become_VB a_DT com-_JJ fortable_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ residence_NN for_IN the_DT insane_JJ population_NN of_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.
It_PRP certainly_RB can_MD not_RB be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN so_RB in_IN the_DT past_NN ._.
While_IN the_DT criminals_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN have_VBP been_VBN provided_VBN with_IN good_JJ quarters_NNS ,_, the_DT unfortunate_JJ lunatic_JJ ,_, whose_WP$ charge_NN Government_NNP has_VBZ acknow-_RB ledged_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT State_NNP duty_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN crowded_VBN into_IN cells_NNS half_PDT the_DT size_NN of_IN that_DT allotted_VBD to_TO the_DT criminal_JJ ,_, or_CC into_IN wards_NNS where_WRB one_CD third_NN of_IN the_DT number_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB confined_VBN ._.
This_DT neglect_NN is_VBZ at_IN present_JJ being_VBG made_VBN up_RP for_IN ,_, and_CC even_RB now_RB in_IN this_DT Asylum_NNP several_JJ of_IN the_DT wards_NNS are_VBP airy_JJ ,_, clean_JJ ,_, and_CC favorable_JJ to_TO health_NN ._.
7_CD (_( 26_CD )_) The_DT Asylum_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN inspected_VBN monthly_RB by_IN the_DT Official_JJ Visitors_NNS ,_, who_WP take_VBP great_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT wellbeing_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
The_DT Asylum_NNP was_VBD also_RB inspected_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Mouat_NNP ,_, Inspector_NNP General_NNP of_IN Jails_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT 6th_CD December_NNP ._.

(_( 35_CD )_) FROM_NNP SURGEON_NNP R._NNP F._NNP HUTCHINSON_NNP ,_, M._NNP D._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, Patna_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_DT OFFG_NNP ._.

DEPT_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN ,_, Asylum_NNP ,_, 1st_CD January_NNP 1869_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN submitting_VBG the_DT Asylum_NNP Report_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN in_IN every_DT respect_NN it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS favorable_JJ ._.
II_NNP ._.
I_PRP drew_VBD attention_NN ,_, last_JJ year_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT over-crowded_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ,_, and_CC suggested_VBD certain_JJ additions_NNS and_CC alterations_NNS ;_: in_IN accordance_NN with_IN which_WDT ,_, three_CD large_JJ open_JJ sheds_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB added_VBN ,_, two_CD to_TO the_DT male_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD to_TO the_DT female_JJ asylum_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT southern_JJ cross-row_NN of_IN cells_NNS in_IN the_DT main_JJ block_NN of_IN the_DT male_NN asylum_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB removed_VBN ,_, securing_VBG thus_RB a_DT thorough_NN ,_, and_CC much_RB needed_VBN ,_, ventilation_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN a_DT hospital_NN has_VBZ been_VBN added_VBN ,_, and_CC two_CD buildings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN converted_VBN ,_, respectively_RB ,_, into_IN an_DT office_NN and_CC a_DT store-room_NN ,_, both_DT being_VBG greatly_RB wanted_VBN ._.
Throughout_IN the_DT male_NN asylum_NN saucer_NN drains_NNS have_VBP been_VBN substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT deep_JJ ones_NNS ,_, and_CC great_JJ benefit_NN has_VBZ accrued_VBN from_IN laying_VBG down_RP a_DT coating_NN of_IN tar_NN and_CC ashes_NNS throughout_IN the_DT whole_JJ asylum_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT additions_NNS and_CC alterations_NNS are_VBP fully_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, we_PRP shall_MD have_VB the_DT Asylum_NNP as_IN healthy_JJ and_CC comfortable_JJ as_IN its_PRP$ bad_JJ site_NN and_CC old-fashioned_JJ plan_NN will_MD admit_VB of_IN ._.
III_NNP ._.
The_DT past_NN has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT remarkably_RB healthy_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP most_RBS thankful_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN we_PRP entirely_RB escaped_VBD cholera_NN ,_, though_IN it_PRP was_VBD ravaging_VBG up_RP to_TO our_PRP$ gate_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD off_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT keepers_NNS ;_: and_CC we_PRP have_VBP similarly_RB escaped_VBN that_IN other_JJ scourge_NN (_( 36_CD )_) As_IN valuable_JJ accessories_NNS ,_, I_PRP would_MD include_VB the_DT daily_JJ wash_NN and_CC bath_NN ;_: a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN coaxed_NN ,_, not_RB exacted_VBN ,_, from_IN each_DT patient_NN ;_: innocent_JJ amusements_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT nautch_NN ,_, tom-tom_JJ ,_, and_CC occasional_JJ wrestling_NN matches_NNS ;_: the_DT distribution_NN of_IN little_JJ luxuries_NNS ,_, as_IN sweetmeats_NNS ,_, fruits_NNS and_CC cigars_NNS ;_: and_CC frequent_JJ conversations_NNS with_IN individual_JJ insanes_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT you_PRP hear_VBP the_DT same_JJ story_NN ,_, or_CC listen_VB to_TO the_DT same_JJ grievance_NN ,_, real_JJ or_CC imaginary_JJ ,_, perhaps_RB ,_, for_IN the_DT hundredth_JJ time_NN ._.
Nor_CC must_MD I_PRP omit_VBP to_TO allude_VB to_TO two_CD ,_, by_IN no_DT means_NNS trifling_VBG ,_, adjuvants_NNS :_: last_JJ year_NN I_PRP pickled_VBD several_JJ thousand_CD limes_NNS and_CC issued_VB them_PRP as_IN a_DT relish_NN to_TO the_DT food_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT sickly_JJ months_NNS each_DT insane_NN had_VBD a_DT daily_JJ drachm_NN of_IN fresh_JJ powdered_JJ charcoal_NN mixed_JJ with_IN a_DT little_JJ water_NN ._.
V._NNP In_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ report_NN I_PRP alluded_VBD to_TO my_PRP$ intention_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT adulteration_NN of_IN flour_NN by_IN grinding_VBG it_PRP on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ;_: this_DT is_VBZ now_RB done_VBN ,_, and_CC four_CD mills_NNS are_VBP busily_RB at_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT female_JJ asylum_NN ,_, providing_VBG pure_JJ flour_NN and_CC soojee_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB for_IN home_NN consumption_NN ,_, but_CC for_IN outside_JJ sale_NN ._.
The_DT females_NNS also_RB manufacture_VBP all_PDT the_DT charcoal_NN tickeeas_NN which_WDT are_VBP used_VBN in_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
The_DT manufactures_NNS carried_VBD on_IN by_IN the_DT insanes_NNS have_VBP progressed_VBN very_RB favorably_RB during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP included_VBN brick_NN and_CC tile_NN making_NN and_CC soorkee_NN pounding_NN ,_, carpentering_NN ,_, the_DT oil_NN mills_NNS ,_, weaving_VBG dosootee_NN ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, jharuns_NNS and_CC tat_NN ,_, making_VBG tape_NN and_CC woollen_NN rugs_NNS ,_, and_CC working_VBG in_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.
These_DT items_NNS have_VBP yielded_VBN a_DT clear_JJ profit_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,038-3-6_JJ against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
917-6-4_CD of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT estimated_VBN value_NN of_IN our_PRP$ labor_NN has_VBZ been_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
2,708-13-4_JJ against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,057_CD for_IN 1867_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN we_PRP constructed_VBD with_IN our_PRP$ labor_NN and_CC material_NN a_DT large_JJ and_CC roomy_JJ dining_NN or_CC sleeping_VBG shed_VBN ,_, which_WDT will_MD serve_VB as_IN a_DT model_NN for_IN those_DT to_TO be_VB erected_VBN under_IN the_DT sanctioned_JJ extension_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Though_IN our_PRP$ daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN has_VBZ been_VBN 162_CD against_IN 130_CD ,_, our_PRP$ annual_JJ expendi-_JJ ture_NN has_VBZ diminished_VBN instead_RB of_IN increased_VBN ,_, the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT insane_NN being_VBG Rs_NNP ._.
63-11-4_JJ against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
89-9-1_CD last_JJ year_NN ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, I_PRP find_VBP that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN admissions_NNS is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO indulgence_VB in_IN gunjah_NN or_CC bhang_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT a_DT great_JJ number_NN should_MD never_RB be_VB sent_VBN to_TO an_DT asylum_NN at_IN all_DT ;_: the_DT mere_JJ fact_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN being_VBG found_VBN reeling_VBG about_IN under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN cannabism_NN affords_NNS no_DT more_JJR ground_NN for_IN his_PRP$ being_VBG sent_VBN to_TO a_DT Lunatic_JJ Asylum_NNP ,_, than_IN if_IN the_DT same_JJ man_NN were_VBD simply_RB under_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN spirituous_JJ liquors_NNS ._.
If_IN existing_VBG laws_NNS were_VBD properly_RB attended_VBN to_TO ,_, such_JJ mistakes_NNS would_MD not_RB so_RB frequently_RB occur_VBP ._.
Act_NNP XXXVI_NNP affords_NNS full_JJ protection_NN ,_, but_CC then_RB the_DT Police_NNP do_VBP not_RB wait_VB to_TO find_VB out_RP whether_IN the_DT person_NN be_VB a_DT lunatic_JJ ,_, and_CC thereby_RB dangerous_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT personal_JJ examination_NN by_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP fear_VBP ,_, more_JJR honoured_VBN in_IN the_DT breach_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT observance_NN ._.
Were_WRB it_PRP otherwise_RB ,_, descriptive_JJ rolls_NNS would_MD not_RB be_VB sent_VBN in_IN either_DT altogether_RB blank_NN ,_, or_CC filled_VBD up_RP with_IN contradictory_JJ nonsense_NN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ certificate_NN ,_, the_DT most_RBS important_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT docu-_JJ ments_NNS ,_, is_VBZ too_RB often_RB carelessly_RB filled_VBN in_IN ,_, and_CC fails_VBZ to_TO afford_VB any_DT information_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, in_IN two_CD cases_NNS out_IN of_IN many_JJ (_( 37_CD )_) beyond_IN the_DT walls_NNS ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ establishment_NN be_VB furnished_VBN from_IN the_DT asylum_NN ;_: and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN its_PRP$ presence_NN would_MD greatly_RB diminish_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS into_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP proper_NN ,_, and_CC thereby_RB lessen_VB its_PRP$ expenditure_NN ._.
X_NN ._.
Seeing_VBG that_DT so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT cases_NNS admitted_VBD into_IN our_PRP$ asylums_NNS result_VBP from_IN over_IN indulgence_NN in_IN gunjah_NN or_CC bhang_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP not_RB really_RB cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, I_PRP find_VBP some_DT difficulty_NN in_IN classing_VBG them_PRP ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB venture_NN to_TO suggest_VB that_IN all_DT such_JJ cases_NNS be_VB included_VBN under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN Cannabism_NNP ;_: they_PRP are_VBP easy_JJ of_IN recognition_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT following_JJ characteristics_NNS will_MD assist_VB in_IN determining_VBG them_PRP ._.
In_IN a_DT recent_JJ case_NN the_DT conjunctiv_NN are_VBP congested_VBN ,_, the_DT pupils_NNS generally_RB contracted_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT countenance_NN wears_VBZ a_DT peculiar_JJ leery_JJ look_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, when_WRB once_RB seen_VBN ,_, is_VBZ unmistakable_JJ ._.
The_DT pulse_NN may_MD or_CC may_MD not_RB be_VB accelerated_VBN ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT marked_JJ unsteadiness_NN in_IN the_DT gait_NN ;_: great_JJ volubility_NN or_CC continued_JJ indulgence_NN in_IN laughter_NN or_CC song_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT muscular_NN system_NN is_VBZ greatly_RB excited_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT tendency_NN even_RB to_TO rush_VB wildly_RB onwards_NNS in_IN a_DT straight_JJ line_NN (_( 38_CD )_) I_PRP think_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN a_DT settled_JJ thing_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT such_JJ thing_NN as_IN lunar_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT insane_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT such_JJ person_NN as_IN a_DT lunatic_JJ ._.

XIII_NN ._.

Bhowanipore_NNP ,_, the_DT 15th_CD January_NNP 1869_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN of_IN submitting_VBG herewith_PDT the_DT Annual_NNP Returns_NNP of_IN the_DT Bhowanipore_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD 62_CD admissions_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN and_CC 1_CD re-admission_NN against_IN 44_CD in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ._.
Intemperance_NN is_VBZ the_DT cause_NN assigned_VBD in_IN 11_CD cases_NNS ,_, but_CC this_DT must_MD be_VB accepted_VBN with_IN the_DT reservation_NN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP indicated_VBN in_IN former_JJ reports_NNS ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ always_RB doubtful_JJ whether_IN excess_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN due_JJ in_IN any_DT case_NN to_TO the_DT loss_NN of_IN self-control_NN which_WDT is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS effects_NNS of_IN incipient_JJ madness_NN ._.
In_IN 9_CD instances_NNS hereditary_JJ transmission_NN has_VBZ been_VBN traceable_JJ ._.
This_DT number_NN is_VBZ probably_RB far_RB from_IN representing_VBG the_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT cause_NN has_VBZ been_VBN actually_RB present_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT impossibility_NN of_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT point_NN in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS forbids_NNS any_DT further_JJ assignment_NN of_IN the_DT cause_NN ._.
Sunstroke_NNP and_CC climatic_JJ disease_NN have_VBP preceded_VBN insanity_NN in_IN four_CD cases_NNS ;_: ill-treatment_JJ in_IN two_CD ;_: and_CC excessive_JJ study_NN ,_, grief_NN ,_, and_CC childbirth_NN ,_, have_VBP each_DT produced_VBN a_DT single_JJ case_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT rest_NN the_DT cause_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN ascertainable_JJ ._.
The_DT chronic_JJ character_NN of_IN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS admitted_VBN is_VBZ worthy_JJ of_IN remark_NN as_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
A_DT single_JJ case_NN of_IN acute_NN mania_NN appears_VBZ ,_, and_CC in_IN it_PRP the_DT disorder_NN was_VBD of_IN hereditary_JJ kind_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT appropriateness_NN of_IN the_DT name_NN is_VBZ doubtful_JJ even_RB here_RB ._.
Mania_NNP ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ general_JJ insanity_NN with_IN more_RBR or_CC less_RBR excitement_JJ ,_, greatly_RB predominates_VBZ over_IN other_JJ forms_NNS of_IN derangement_NN ._.
Melancholia_NNP is_VBZ rarely_RB seen_VBN ,_, and_CC though_IN dementia_NN is_VBZ occasionally_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN as_IN a_DT primary_JJ mental_JJ disorder_NN following_VBG climatic_JJ fever_NN ,_, it_PRP generally_RB appears_VBZ as_IN a_DT secondary_JJ result_NN of_IN mania_NN ._.
Twelve_CD patients_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, five_CD were_VBD so_RB far_RB improved_VBN as_IN to_TO admit_VB of_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT care_NN of_IN friends_NNS ,_, and_CC seventeen_NNS were_VBD despatched_VBN to_TO Europe_NNP as_IN ordinary_JJ invalids_NNS ;_: twenty-eight_JJ were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Europe_NNP as_IN lunatics_NNS ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB observed_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN from_IN this_DT record_NN of_IN cures_NNS is_VBZ excluded_VBN all_PDT those_DT which_WDT are_VBP subjected_VBN to_TO ,_, that_DT which_WDT is_VBZ confessedly_RB the_DT most_RBS powerful_JJ curative_JJ measure_NN at_IN command_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, removal_NN from_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT reasons_NNS given_VBN in_IN former_JJ reports_NNS ,_, I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO state_NN numerically_RB the_DT results_NNS which_WDT attended_VBD the_DT despatch_NN of_IN patients_NNS in_IN 1868_CD ,_, but_CC from_IN such_JJ items_NNS of_IN information_NN as_IN I_PRP have_VBP received_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN as_RB satisfactory_JJ as_IN in_IN other_JJ years_NNS ._.
The_DT mortality_NN was_VBD ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, very_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT notes_NNS appended_VBD to_TO the_DT cases_NNS will_MD show_VB that_IN they_PRP arose_VBP from_IN causes_NNS which_WDT were_VBD in_IN no_DT case_NN preventible_NN in_IN the_DT Institution_NNP ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ report_NN I_PRP mentioned_VBD the_DT damage_NN which_WDT the_DT buildings_NNS had_VBD sustained_VBN from_IN the_DT Cyclone_NNP of_IN 1867_CD ._.
This_DT has_VBZ since_IN appeared_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN much_RB greater_JJR than_IN was_VBD then_RB known_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT effect_NN of_IN the_DT heavy_JJ rains_NNS of_IN 1868_CD on_IN the_DT foundations_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO reduce_VB the_DT centre_NN building_NN to_TO a_DT state_NN of_IN dilapidation_NN ._.
The_DT several_JJ barrack_NN ranges_VBZ too_RB are_VBP greatly_RB injured_VBN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ decayed_JJ condition_NN has_VBZ become_VBN daily_RB more_RBR and_CC more_JJR manifest_JJS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ to_TO enter_VB more_RBR fully_RB into_IN particulars_NNS here_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT reconstruction_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN pronounced_VBN ab-_JJ solutely_RB necessary_JJ by_IN the_DT Officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP Department_NNP ,_, and_CC plans_NNS are_VBP now_RB under_IN consideration_NN ._.
Meanwhile_RB ,_, all_DT works_NNS of_IN petty_JJ repair_NN and_CC construction_NN ,_, including_VBG the_DT restoration_NN of_IN the_DT recreation_NN shed_VBN in_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, have_VBP been_VBN suspended_VBN ._.

1,198_CD ._.
The_DT claim_NN against_IN Mr._NNP Kallonas_NNP is_VBZ still_RB unadjusted_VBN with_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ understood_JJ that_IN the_DT realization_NN of_IN the_DT money_NN by_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Backergunge_NNP is_VBZ in_IN progress_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN sufficient_JJ time_NN has_VBZ now_RB elapsed_VBN ,_, application_NN will_MD shortly_RB be_VB made_VBN to_TO him_PRP for_IN the_DT proceeds_NNS ._.

1,210_CD ,_, some_DT portion_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, at_IN least_JJS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ feared_VBN ,_, will_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB irrecoverable_JJ ._.

22,157_CD was_VBD incurred_VBN for_IN passages_NNS and_CC outfits_NNS ._.

The_DT cost_NN of_IN actual_JJ maintenance_NN per_IN man_NN per_IN month_NN (_( including_VBG establishment_NN )_) was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.

MEDICAL_NNP ._.
Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 6th_CD July_NNP 1869_CD ._.
READ_VB a_DT letter_NN ,_, No_NNP ._.
247_CD ,_, dated_VBD 23rd_CD ultimo_JJ ,_, from_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, submitting_VBG the_DT Annual_JJ Reports_NNS and_CC Returns_NNS of_IN the_DT several_JJ Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP in_IN the_DT Lower_JJR Provinces_NNS for_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN insanes_NNS admitted_VBN and_CC re-admitted_JJ into_IN the_DT various_JJ Asylums_NNP shews_VBZ a_DT considerable_JJ increase_NN over_IN the_DT figures_NNS for_IN last_JJ year_NN (_( 429_CD as_IN against_IN 372_CD )_) ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ also_RB a_DT corresponding_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN cured_VBN and_CC transferred_VBN to_TO friends_NNS (_( from_IN 177_CD to_TO 278_CD )_) ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN cured_JJ and_CC transferred_VBD to_TO friends_NNS to_TO total_JJ treated_JJ stands_NNS at_IN 25.71_CD as_IN against_IN 18.71_CD in_IN 1867_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN to_TO total_JJ treated_VBN has_VBZ improved_VBN from_IN 11.31_CD last_JJ year_NN to_TO 9.52_CD ,_, a_DT lower_JJR figure_NN than_IN that_DT obtained_VBN in_IN any_DT year_NN since_IN 1863_CD ._.
The_DT percent-_JJ age_NN of_IN mortality_NN to_TO daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN stands_VBZ at_IN 15.25_CD as_IN against_IN 17.74_CD in_IN 1867_CD ._.
These_DT results_NNS are_VBP decidedly_RB favorable_JJ ._.
The_DT separate_JJ Returns_NNP of_IN each_DT Asylum_NNP will_MD be_VB examined_VBN below_IN ;_: but_CC it_PRP may_MD here_RB be_VB noted_VBN that_IN Patna_NNP exhibits_VBZ the_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ,_, the_DT ratio_NN of_IN mortality_NN to_TO daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN having_VBG been_VBN there_RB 3.70_CD as_IN against_IN 11.11_CD in_IN Cuttack_NNP ,_, 17.91_CD in_IN Dullunda_NNP ,_, and_CC 22.50_CD in_IN Dacca_NNP ._.
The_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT general_JJ percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN more_JJR marked_JJ but_CC for_IN the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN cholera_NN at_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, to_TO which_WDT 15_CD out_IN of_IN 103_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD owing_VBG 2_CD ._.
The_DT extraordinary_JJ influence_NN of_IN intoxicating_VBG drugs_NNS in_IN producing_VBG various_JJ forms_NNS of_IN insanity_NN in_IN India_NNP is_VBZ seen_VBN from_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN 1_CD out_IN of_IN every_DT 2.67_CD cases_NNS treated_VBN was_VBD attributable_JJ to_TO this_DT cause_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN 1,079_CD cases_NNS the_DT causes_NNS of_IN insa-_JJ nity_NN were_VBD unknown_JJ in_IN 522_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ yearly_JJ cost_NN of_IN maintenance_NN has_VBZ risen_VBN from_IN Rupees_NNP 93-3-3_CD to_TO Rupees_NNP 95-0-2_CD ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN spite_NN of_IN a_DT considerable_JJ reduction_NN of_IN cost_NN at_IN Patna_NNP (_( from_IN Rupees_NNP 89-9-1_CD to_TO Rupees_NNP 63-11-4_JJ )_) ,_, and_CC slight_JJ reductions_NNS at_IN Dullunda_NNP and_CC Cuttack_NNP ._.
The_DT increase_NN at_IN Moydapore_NNP ,_, from_IN Rupees_NNP 55-4-0_JJ to_TO Rupees_NNP 88-4-1_CD ,_, is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO a_DT diminution_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
Same_JJ explanation_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN of_IN the_DT differences_NNS in_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN diet_NN in_IN the_DT different_JJ Asylums_NNP as_IN shown_VBN on_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
Rs_NNP ._.
As_IN ._.
P._NNP Dacca_NNP ..._: 48_CD 3_CD 0_CD Dullunda_NNP ..._: 42_CD 2_CD 0_CD Cuttack_NN ..._: 35_CD 12_CD 0_CD Patna_NNP ..._: 26_CD 12_CD 0_CD Moydapore_NN ..._: 21_CD 1_CD 0_CD 4_CD ._.
Dullunda_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) should_MD place_VB himself_PRP in_IN communication_NN with_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP ,_, and_CC see_VB if_IN some_DT use-_JJ ful_JJ hints_NNS can_MD not_RB be_VB derived_VBN from_IN Dullunda_NNP in_IN this_DT respect_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Patna.ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP INSANE_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NN 1869_CD ._.
BY_NNP J._NNP MURRAY_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.

1870_CD ._.
ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP INSANE_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP YEAR_NN 1869_CD ._.
BY_NNP J._NNP MURRAY_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Calcutta_NN :_: PRINTED_NN AT_IN THE_NNP BENGAL_NNP SECRETARIAT_NNP OFFICE_NNP ._.
1870_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
53_CD ._.
FROM_IN THE_NNP INSPECTOR-GENEEAL_NNP of_IN HOSPITALS_NNP ,_, INDIAN_NNP MEDICAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 12th_CD April_NNP 1870_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB an_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS in_IN the_DT province_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1869_CD ,_, with_IN remarks_NNS ._.
The_DT several_JJ annual_JJ reports_NNS and_CC returns_NNS are_VBP printed_VBN in_IN full_JJ ._.
To_TO follow_VB a_DT former_JJ custom_NN I_PRP insert_VBP a_DT comparative_JJ statement_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT native_JJ institutions_NNS for_IN the_DT last_JJ seven_CD years_NNS :_: (_( ii_NN )_) In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1868_CD there_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS of_IN 72_CD as_IN contrasting_VBG with_IN 1867_CD ._.
The_DT present_JJ year_NN shews_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN 46.2_CD from_IN the_DT preceding_NN ._.
