Heavy_NNP iron_NN castings_NNS were_VBD required_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN some_DT skilled_JJ advice_NN ,_, all_DT of_IN which_WDT were_VBD most_RBS readily_RB furnished_VBN under_IN Captain_NNP Eckford_NNP 's_POS orders_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT contrivances_NNS adopted_VBN ,_, a_DT very_RB perfect_JJ method_NN of_IN cooking_NN has_VBZ been_VBN introduced_VBN with_IN a_DT saving_NN of_IN fuel_NN which_WDT brings_VBZ the_DT consumption_NN of_IN coal_NN below_IN the_DT quantity_NN per_IN man_NN which_WDT the_DT most_RBS approved_JJ appliances_NNS in_IN use_NN in_IN England_NNP require_NN ._.
For_IN much_JJ similar_JJ assistance_NN in_IN smaller_JJR matters_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN the_DT profitable_JJ employment_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN the_DT telegraph_NN yard_NN ,_, the_DT institution_NN is_VBZ indebted_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ establishment_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ servant_NN ,_, ARTHUR_NNP PAYNE_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-Major_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP at_IN Presidency_NNP ._.
MEMORANDUM_NN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, in_IN forward-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT report_NN to_TO the_DT Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals,6_NNP DULLUNDA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
these_DT insanes_NNS were_VBD not_RB sufficiently_RB well_RB nourished_VBN ,_, and_CC advised_VBD an_DT improvement_NN in_IN the_DT nutritive_JJ value_NN of_IN the_DT diet_NN ._.
This_DT has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT superintendent_NN informs_VBZ us_PRP ,_, the_DT more_RBR healthy_JJ inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN have_VBP gained_VBN in_IN flesh_NN and_CC general_JJ appearance_NN ._.
Of_IN course_NN more_JJR time_NN is_VBZ required_VBN to_TO benefit_VB those_DT who_WP were_VBD previously_RB in_IN an_DT anmic_JJ or_CC cachectic_JJ state_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB that_IN many_JJ of_IN these_DT poor_JJ people_NNS will_MD require_VB additional_JJ care_NN and_CC special_JJ advantages_NNS before_IN they_PRP are_VBP considered_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN a_DT good_JJ state_NN of_IN physical_JJ health_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP clearly_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN overcrowding_VBG has_VBZ had_VBN little_JJ to_TO say_VB to_TO the_DT general_JJ ill_NN health_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN commented_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC I_PRP feel_VBP equally_RB certain_JJ that_IN the_DT best_JJS way_NN of_IN improving_VBG the_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS is_VBZ to_TO feed_VB them_PRP liberally_RB and_CC well_RB ._.
More_JJR space_NN is_VBZ required_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN wards_NNS ,_, but_CC space_NN alone_RB will_MD not_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, have_VBP the_DT effect_NN of_IN lowering_VBG the_DT death-rate_JJ unless_IN we_PRP avail_VBP ourselves_NNS of_IN the_DT aid_NN which_WDT we_PRP know_VBP we_PRP can_MD rely_VB on_IN in_IN an_DT improved_JJ dietary_NN ._.
Overcrowding_VBG usually_RB induces_VBZ disease_NN of_IN a_DT different_JJ type_NN from_IN that_DT which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN observable_JJ at_IN Dullunda_NNP of_IN late_JJ years_NNS ._.
A_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN work_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN by_IN the_DT insanes_NNS at_IN Dullunda_NNP ,_, and_CC every_DT author_NN of_IN a_DT work_NN on_IN hygiene_NN admits_NNS that_IN men_NNS must_MD be_VB fed_VBN in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP called_VBN upon_IN to_TO do_VB ._.
At_IN Dullunda_NNP the_DT evil_JJ effects_NNS of_IN overcrowding_VBG are_VBP in_IN a_DT measure_NN obviated_VBN by_IN allowing_VBG many_JJ of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS to_TO sleep_VB in_IN the_DT verandahs_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT daytime_NN they_PRP are_VBP occupied_VBN in_IN the_DT work-sheds_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT open_JJ air_NN in_IN fine_JJ weather_NN ._.
The_DT general_JJ conduct_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN excellent_JJ ._.
G._NNP SAUNDERS_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Inspector-_NNP General_NNP ._.
THE_DT annual_JJ inspection_NN report_NN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP is_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: DULLUNDA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
7_CD meat_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO record_VB my_PRP$ opinion_NN in_IN the_DT visitors_NNS '_POS book_NN to_TO that_DT effect_NN ._.
The_DT general_JJ health_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS at_IN Dullunda_NNP is_VBZ a_DT subject_NN which_WDT has_VBZ occupied_VBN my_PRP$ attention_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT object_NN of_IN greatest_JJS interest_NN at_IN the_DT present_JJ moment_NN of_IN any_DT connected_VBN with_IN this_DT institution_NN ._.
I_PRP again_RB very_RB recently_RB made_VBD a_DT careful_JJ examination_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS under_IN confinement_NN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN ,_, to_TO ascertain_VB if_IN any_DT improvement_NN had_VBD taken_VBN place_NN in_IN their_PRP$ general_JJ health_NN since_IN August_NNP 1869_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN there_EX is_VBZ less_JJR scurvy_JJ ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP are_VBP in_IN fair_JJ health_NN are_VBP (_( as_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP says_VBZ )_) I_PRP think_VBP in_IN better_JJR condition_NN than_IN they_PRP were_VBD last_JJ year_NN ;_: but_CC more_JJR than_IN a_DT fourth_JJ ,_, I_PRP should_MD think_VB ,_, of_IN the_DT whole_JJ body_NN have_VBP now_RB clear_JJ indication_NN of_IN scurvy_NN ,_, not_RB what_WP Dr._NNP Payne_NNP alludes_VBZ to_TO in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN as_IN a_DT blueness_NN of_IN the_DT gums_NNS ,_, but_CC a_DT swollen_NN ,_, suppurating_VBG state_NN of_IN the_DT gums_NNS ,_, with_IN recession_NN from_IN the_DT teeth_NN ;_: the_DT latter_NN in_IN many_JJ instances_NNS having_VBG fallen_VBN out_RP ._.
I_PRP noticed_VBD also_RB that_DT very_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS are_VBP exceedingly_RB anmic_JJ and_CC cachectic_JJ ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN in_IN my_PRP$ mind_NN that_IN the_DT conditions_NNS noted_VBN above_IN are_VBP closely_RB related_VBN to_TO the_DT large_JJ and_CC still_RB exceptionally_RB heavy_JJ death-rate_NN at_IN Dullunda_NNP ._.
My_PRP$ own_JJ belief_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN on_IN record_NN over_IN and_CC over_RB again_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT system_NN of_IN dieting_VBG carried_VBN on_IN for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN was_VBD a_DT thoroughly_JJ inadequate_JJ one_NN in_IN relation_NN to_TO the_DT amount_NN of_IN actual_JJ labor_NN performed_VBD ._.
Taking_VBG fully_RB into_IN consideration_NN the_DT opinion_NN recorded_VBN by_IN the_DT superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN regarding_VBG the_DT necessity_NN for_IN greater_JJR space_NN ,_, and_CC fully_RB agreeing_VBG with_IN him_PRP as_IN to_TO the_DT deleterious_JJ effect_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG in_IN jails_NNS ,_, barracks_NNS ,_, or_CC asylums_NNS ,_, I_PRP say_VBP that_IN no_DT amount_NN of_IN space_NN at_IN this_DT institution_NN will_MD efface_VB the_DT marks_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN without_IN an_DT improved_JJ dietary_NN ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB also_RB a_DT more_RBR careful_JJ system_NN of_IN labor_NN ._.
The_DT subject_NN is_VBZ so_RB momentous_JJ a_DT one_CD ,_, that_IN I_PRP offer_VBP no_DT apology_NN for_IN again_RB referring_VBG as_IN I_PRP have_VBP done_VBN to_TO this_DT vital_JJ question_NN ,_, the_DT due_JJ and_CC proper_JJ amount_NN of_IN nourishment_NN required_VBN for_IN these_DT poor_JJ creatures_NNS in_IN relation_NN to_TO the_DT work_NN done_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP elsewhere_RB ,_, when_WRB inspecting_VBG other_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, alluded_VBD to_TO the_DT labor_NN question_NN ,_, and_CC recorded_VBD my_PRP$ belief_NN that_IN in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS light_JJ work_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN cloth_JJ manufacture_NN ,_, is_VBZ much_RB more_RBR suited_JJ for_IN lunatic_JJ employment_NN than_IN pounding_VBG soorky_JJ or_CC manufacturing_JJ oil_NN ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN the_DT labor_NN is_VBZ light_JJ and_CC the_DT exposure_NN to_TO climate_VB is_VBZ small_JJ ,_, and_CC consequently_RB the_DT expenditure_NN of_IN vital_JJ force_NN is_VBZ inconsiderable_JJ ;_: in_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, all_PDT the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ daily_JJ life_NN are_VBP against_IN the_DT insane_NN ._.
At_IN Dullunda_NNP the_DT ill_JJ effects_NNS of_IN overcrowding_VBG are_VBP practically_RB reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT minimum_NN by_IN the_DT doors_NNS at_IN night_NN being_VBG thrown_VBN open_JJ and_CC the_DT verandahs_NN being_VBG occupied_VBN ;_: and_CC again_RB if_IN anmia_NN and_CC scurvy_JJ exist_NN (_( as_IN they_PRP do_VBP )_) how_WRB are_VBP these_DT produced_VBN by_IN over-_JJ crowding_NN ?_.
Overcrowding_VBG will_MD most_RBS certainly_RB originate_JJ disease_NN ,_, but_CC disease_NN of_IN a_DT different_JJ type_NN ;_: whilst_CC scurvy_NN is_VBZ everywhere_RB known_VBN and_CC recognised_VBN as_IN a_DT dietetic_JJ disease_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP convinced_VBN that_IN exceptional_JJ mortality_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB checked_VBN at_IN Dullunda_NNP by_IN a_DT careful_JJ re-consideration_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN diet_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN labor_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT significant_JJ fact_NN that_IN the_DT simplest_JJS sores_NNS at_IN Dullunda_NNP heal_NN with_IN difficulty_NN ,_, and_CC here_RB again_RB I_PRP say_VBP is_VBZ an_DT evidence_NN of_IN low_JJ vitality_NN ,_, resulting_VBG from_IN what_WP ?_. 8_CD DULLUNDA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
India_NNP indulges_VBZ in_IN an_DT intoxicating_JJ drug_NN which_WDT he_PRP knows_VBZ will_MD produce_VB maniacal_JJ excitement_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP escapes_VBZ all_DT future_JJ punishment_NN (_( except_IN confinement_NN in_IN a_DT lunatic_JJ asylum_NN )_) on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.
The_DT drunken_JJ native_NN is_VBZ no_DT more_RBR mad_JJ than_IN the_DT drunken_JJ Englishman_NNP :_: why_WRB then_RB this_DT difference_NN in_IN the_DT punishment_NN awarded_VBD ?_.
I_PRP think_VBP I_PRP could_MD point_VB out_RP several_JJ (_( so-called_JJ )_) criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS at_IN Dullunda_NNP who_WP have_VBP never_RB shewn_VBN any_DT signs_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP have_VBP never_RB been_VBN insane_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP have_VBP suffered_VBN from_IN the_DT stimulating_NN and_CC destructive_JJ effects_NNS of_IN bhang_NN ,_, churrus_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ intoxicating_JJ agent_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD add_VB that_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT officials_NNS at_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, most_JJS satisfactory_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP Payne_NNP does_VBZ not_RB seem_VB satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN native_JJ doctor_NN Shaik_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, but_CC he_PRP is_VBZ an_DT excellent_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD selected_VBN by_IN me_PRP quite_RB on_IN account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ excep-_JJ tionally_RB good_JJ conduct_NN and_CC character_NN ._.
I_PRP appointed_VBD him_PRP to_TO the_DT asylum_NN in_IN place_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD notoriously_RB inefficient_JJ and_CC untrustworthy_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP this_DT man_NN (_( Shaik_NNP Bahadoor_NNP )_) will_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO be_VB all_PDT that_IN he_PRP should_MD be_VB in_IN time_NN ._.
The_DT duty_NN is_VBZ a_DT new_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO meet_VB with_IN any_DT native_JJ subordinate_NN who_WP will_MD do_VB all_DT that_WDT Dr._NNP Payne_NNP points_VBZ out_RP as_IN the_DT native_JJ doctor_NN 's_POS duty_NN ,_, uninstructed_JJ ._.

Dated_VBN Dacca_NNP ,_, the_DT 21st_CD January_NNP 1870_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN herewith_NN to_TO enclose_VB the_DT annual_JJ returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1869_CD ,_, and_CC to_TO submit_VB the_DT following_JJ report_NN for_IN transmission_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT usual_JJ manner_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
From_IN table_JJ No_NNP ._.
2_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ an_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT annual_JJ return_NN of_IN 1869_CD ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN there_EX were_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN 90_CD patients_NNS admitted_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC 9_CD re-admissions_NNS ,_, which_WDT with_IN 213_CD remaining_VBG at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN show_VBP a_DT total_NN of_IN 312_CD treated_JJ during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS was_VBD 231.76_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ 31.53_CD above_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD ._.
Twenty-nine_NN were_VBD discharged_VBN as_IN cured_VBN ,_, 6_CD were_VBD transferred_VBN (_( 2_CD to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC 4_CD to_TO stand_VB their_PRP$ trial_NN )_) ,_, 7_CD escaped_VBD ,_, 41_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC 229_CD were_VBD remaining_VBG on_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1870_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 90_CD new_JJ admissions_NNS ,_, 22_CD were_VBD detained_VBN under_IN the_DT Criminal_NNP Procedure_NNP Code_NNP ,_, and_CC 68_CD under_IN Act_NNP XXXVI_NNP ._.
of_IN 1858_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ``_`` cured_VBD or_CC transferred_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ friends_NNS ''_'' during_IN the_DT year_NN 1868_CD amounted_VBD to_TO 55_CD ;_: in_IN 1869_CD this_DT number_NN fell_VBD to_TO 35_CD ._.
The_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ attributed_VBN to_TO several_JJ causes_NNS :_: 1st_CD ,_, the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP has_VBZ become_VBN somewhat_RB choked_JJ with_IN incurable_JJ cases16_NN DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
all_DT punishment_NN ,_, and_CC become_RB ,_, as_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, burdens_NNS on_IN the_DT State_NNP ._.

IV_NNP ._.
Table_JJ No_DT ._.
5_CD shows_VBZ the_DT castes_NNS and_CC sexes_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT zillahs_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD received_VBN ._.

of_IN the_DT whole_JJ number_NN ,_, and_CC between_IN the_DT years_NNS 20_CD to_TO 30_CD ,_, twenty-nine_NN ,_, or_CC 29.29_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD admitted_VBN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Table_JJ No_DT ._.
8_CD shows_VBZ the_DT causes_NNS of_IN mortality_NN and_CC the_DT duration_NN of_IN confinement_NN at_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS was_VBD 41_CD ,_, or_CC 13.14_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN strength_NN ._.
Last_JJ year_NN 45_CD died_VBD ,_, or_CC 14.01_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN strength_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ period_NN of_IN residence_NN of_IN each_DT lunatic_JJ that_WDT died_VBD in_IN 1869_CD was_VBD 3_CD years_NNS ,_, 7_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC 16.58_CD days_NNS ._.
But_CC as_IN I_PRP wish_VBP to_TO make_VB some_DT remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN mortality_NN in_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN table_JJ No_NNP ._.
10_CD prepared_JJ with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO show_VB at_IN a_DT glance_NN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN death_NN ,_, the_DT total_JJ per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO strength_NN ,_, the_DT mean_JJ average_JJ temperature_NN of_IN each_DT month_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT accommodation_NN which_WDT the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN capable_JJ of_IN affording_VBG ._.
I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO make_VB this_DT return_NN conform_NN as_RB nearly_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO the_DT arrangement_NN in_IN the_DT new_JJ nomenclature_NN ._.
Pathologically_RB considered_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ in_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN causation_NN of_IN death_NN much_JJ that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, to_TO say_VB the_DT least_JJS of_IN it_PRP ,_, very_RB coarse_JJ ._.
First_RB ,_, I_PRP would_MD premise_VB that_IN the_DT causes_NNS herein_VBP noted_JJ make_VBP no_DT reference_NN to_TO the_DT insanity_NN of_IN the_DT individual_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, is_VBZ an_DT actual_JJ condition_NN of_IN disease_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD ,_, too_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ often_RB sufficiently_RB potent_JJ to_TO determine_VB a_DT fatal_JJ issue_NN from_IN an_DT ailment_NN which_WDT ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT local_JJ or_CC pathological_JJ conditions_NNS are_VBP concerned_VBN ,_, would_MD in_IN a_DT sane_JJ person_NN most_RBS probably_RB end_VBP in_IN recovery_NN ._.
In_IN scrofulous_JJ affections_NNS there_EX was_VBD observed_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT peculiarly_JJ strong_JJ pre-disposition_NN towards_NNS death_NN ._.
In_IN diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ system_NN ,_, 11_CD cases_NNS are_VBP entered_VBN as_IN meningitis_NN ,_, because_IN altered_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT membranes_NNS of_IN the_DT brain_NN were_VBD the_DT only_RB well_RB marked_VBN or_CC extensive_JJ pathological_JJ changes_NNS perceptible_JJ by_IN the_DT naked_JJ eye_NN ._.
That_DT altered_VBD conditions_NNS of_IN nutrition_NN existed_VBN in_IN the_DT minute_NN structure_NN of_IN the_DT brain_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT microscopical_JJ researches_NNS could_MD demonstrate_VB wide_JJ deviations_NNS from_IN the_DT natural_JJ arrange-_JJ ment_NN or_CC condition_NN of_IN the_DT intricate_JJ cells_NNS or_CC fibres_NNS of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ centres_NNS ,_, is_VBZ beyond_IN all_DT doubt_NN ._.
But_CC then_RB we_PRP have_VBP no_DT names_NNS in_IN our_PRP$ nomenclature_NN for_IN these_DT microscopic_NN appearances_NNS ,_, and_CC so_RB it_PRP has_VBZ appeared_VBN to_TO me_PRP better_JJR to_TO state_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT coarse_JJ language_NN of_IN our_PRP$ present_JJ system_NN ,_, merely_RB what_WP was_VBD apparent_JJ to_TO unaided_JJ vision_NN ._.
In_IN many_JJ of_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS simply_RB ebbed_VBD away_RB ._.
They_PRP had_VBD once_RB been_VBN raving_VBG maniacs_NN and_CC then_RB had_VBD become_VBN poor_JJ demented_JJ creatures_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ intellects_NNS gradually_RB faded_VBN till_NN they_PRP were_VBD little_JJ else_RB than_IN tottering_VBG helpless_JJ animals_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ lives_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN agoing_VBG by_IN food_NN ;_: that_IN they_PRP had_VBD neither_CC the_DT sense_NN to_TO take_VB ,_, nor_CC the_DT appetite_NN to_TO desire_VB ._.
Death_NN was_VBD but_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT phenomena_NN to_TO be_VB expected_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN a_DT disease_NN which_WDT during_IN life_NN we_PRP call_VBP dementia_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN death_NN ,_, meningitis_NN ._.
It_PRP would_MD be_VB perhaps_RB more_RBR rational_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN death_NN resulted_VBD from_IN exhaustion_NN ,_, or_CC syncope_NN and_CC coma_NN combined_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP certainly_RB did_VBD ;_: but_CC in_IN saying_VBG so_IN we_PRP have_VBP said_VBD very_RB little_RB more_JJR than_IN that_IN the_DT patient_NN died_VBD because_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB live_VB ,_, and_CC at_IN most_JJS we_PRP should_MD attempt_VB to_TO state_NN the_DT mode_NN of_IN dying_VBG rather_RB than_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
In_IN time_NN ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, we_PRP shall_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO describe_VB the_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS with_IN greater_JJR precision_NN ;_: meanwhile_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB learnt_VBN from_IN the_DT present_JJ arrangement_NN or_CC classification_NN of_IN diseases_NNS ._.
Every_DT case_NN was_VBD actually_RB dissected_VBN ,_, and_CC therefore_RB the_DT disease_NN ,_, whatever_WP it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN ,_, that_DT could_MD be_VB detected_VBN by_IN the_DT scalpel_NN ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN under_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ proper_JJ heading_NN or_CC sub-division_NN ._.
Grouped_VBN under_IN headings_NNS which_WDT refer_VBP to_TO the_DT several_JJ physiological_JJ systems_NNS ,_, the_DT diseases_NNS are_VBP well_RB placed_VBN for_IN an_DT analytical_JJ examination_NN of_IN their_PRP$ primary_JJ causes_NNS ._.
The_DT case_NN returned_VBD as_IN intermittent_NN fever_NN occurred_VBD before_IN I_PRP came_VBD to_TO the_DT DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
17_CD asylum_NN ._.
Cholera_NN is_VBZ endemic_JJ in_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD generally_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN and_CC again_RB during_IN the_DT cold_JJ months_NNS ._.
Six_NNP fatal_JJ cases_NNS occurred_VBD out_IN of_IN 13_CD lunatics_NNS who_WP were_VBD attacked_VBN by_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 41_CD deaths_NNS ,_, 10_CD ,_, or_CC nearly_RB one-fourth_JJ ,_, died_VBD from_IN tubercu-_JJ lar_JJ disease_NN ;_: 14_CD ,_, or_CC more_JJR than_IN one-fourth_JJ ,_, from_IN diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT brain_NN and_CC its_PRP$ membranes_NNS ;_: 3_CD from_IN pneumonia_NN ;_: 4_CD from_IN dysentery_NN ;_: 6_CD from_IN cholera_NN ;_: 1_CD from_IN fever_NN ;_: 1_CD from_IN abscess_NN ;_: and_CC 1_CD from_IN violence_NN inflicted_VBN by_IN another_DT lunatic_JJ ._.
Looking_VBG to_TO the_DT months_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT deaths_NNS occurred_VBD ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN 10_CD ,_, or_CC nearly_RB a_DT fourth_JJ of_IN all_PDT the_DT deaths_NNS ,_, occurred_VBD in_IN November_NNP ,_, and_CC 9_CD in_IN Decem-_NNP ber_NN ._.
Many_JJ feeble_JJ lunatics_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN organic_JJ diseases_NNS died_VBD with_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ weather_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ now_RB (_( January_NNP )_) decreasing_NN ,_, and_CC mainly_RB ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, because_IN those_DT amongst_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS who_WP were_VBD most_RBS weak_JJ and_CC sickly_JJ have_VBP already_RB died_VBN ._.
In_IN November_NNP two_CD cases_NNS of_IN pneumonia_NN died_VBN ,_, and_CC several_JJ others_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN ._.
The_DT three_CD cases_NNS of_IN dysentery_NN that_IN I_PRP saw_VBD were_VBD all_DT old_JJ cases_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT tissues_NNS of_IN the_DT large_JJ intestine_NN had_VBD undergone_JJ extensive_JJ morbid_NN changes_NNS ._.
The_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP died_VBD from_IN rupture_NN of_IN the_DT viscera_NN was_VBD at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN its_PRP$ occurrence_NN reported_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP ._.
The_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN were_VBD as_IN follows:18_JJ DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
When_WRB the_DT minimum_JJ monthly_JJ mean_NN temperature_NN fell_VBD to_TO 66_CD ,_, as_IN it_PRP did_VBD in_IN November_NNP ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN ran_VBD up_RB to_TO 4_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN ._.
The_DT new_JJ wards_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN are_VBP so_RB thoroughly_RB perflated_VBN by_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP are_VBP very_RB cold_JJ at_IN night_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN stoves_VBZ with_IN flues_NNS so_RB carefully_RB protected_VBN that_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS could_MD not_RB reach_VB them_PRP ,_, should_MD be_VB introduced_VBN and_CC used_VBN for_IN heating_VBG the_DT air_NN of_IN the_DT wards_NNS at_IN night_NN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN November_NNP ,_, December_NNP ,_, and_CC January_NNP ._.
The_DT stoves_NNS and_CC flues_NNS might_MD be_VB tried_VBN as_IN an_DT experiment_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT new_JJ ward_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP could_MD be_VB put_VBN up_RP without_IN much_JJ difficulty_NN or_CC expense_NN ._.
The_DT overcrowding_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ throughout_IN the_DT year_NN been_VBN excessive_JJ ._.
As_IN is_VBZ explained_VBN in_IN the_DT table_NN ,_, the_DT lunatics_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO sleep_VB in_IN the_DT verandahs_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT wards_NNS ._.
We_PRP had_VBD jhamps_NNS and_CC screens_NNS put_VBD up_RP in_IN the_DT verandahs_NN ,_, but_CC we_PRP could_MD by_IN no_DT means_NNS afford_VBP proper_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
I_PRP expected_VBD a_DT much_RB higher_JJR death-rate_NN than_IN we_PRP have_VBP had_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP trust_VBP that_IN the_DT medical_JJ department_NN will_MD strongly_RB impress_VB upon_IN the_DT Government_NNP that_IN lunatics_NNS are_VBP more_RBR likely_JJ than_IN even_RB prisoners_NNS in_IN jails_NNS to_TO suffer_VB from_IN overcrowding_VBG ;_: and_CC that_IN whereas_VBP the_DT wards_NNS of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Jail_NNP afford_NN to_TO each_DT prisoner_NN at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN a_DT superficial_JJ area_NN of_IN 40_CD feet_NNS ,_, the_DT wards_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylum_NN can_MD give_VB to_TO each_DT of_IN its_PRP$ unfortunate_JJ inmates_VBZ no_DT more_JJR than_IN 28.92_CD square_JJ feet_NNS of_IN superficial_JJ area_NN and_CC 451.93_CD cubic_JJ feet_NNS of_IN space_NN ._.
The_DT new_JJ female_JJ ward_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN to_TO be_VB built_VBN in_IN January_NNP last_JJ ;_: by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT building_NN was_VBD almost_RB completed_VBN ._.
In_IN this_DT incomplete_JJ state_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN left_VBN ;_: the_DT workmen_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN off_RP ,_, and_CC I_PRP can_MD only_RB regret_VB that_IN the_DT Department_NNP of_IN Public_NNP Works_NNP extended_VBD over_RP twelve_JJ months_NNS building_VBG operations_NNS which_WDT I_PRP can_MD not_RB but_CC think_VB might_MD ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN building_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ,_, have_VBP easily_RB been_VBN completed_VBN in_IN six_CD or_CC eight_CD months_NNS ._.
New_NNP wards_NNS are_VBP very_RB urgently_RB required_VBN for_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP trust_VBP that_IN orders_NNS may_MD be_VB issued_VBN not_RB only_RB for_IN their_PRP$ erection_NN ,_, but_CC for_IN their_PRP$ completion_NN without_IN unnecessary_JJ delay_NN ._.
VIII_NNP ._.

47-6-11.8_JJ ,_, showing_VBG a_DT diminution_NN of_IN annas_JJ 13-0.4_JJ per_IN lunatic_NN in_IN favor_NN of_IN 1869_CD ._.
This_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ attributable_JJ to_TO the_DT cheaper_JJR rates_NNS at_IN which_WDT provisions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN purchased_VBN ._.

XI_NN ._.
Table_JJ No_DT ._.
13_CD shows_VBZ the_DT amount_NN of_IN profit_NN derived_VBN from_IN manufactures_NNS ._.
The_DT amount_NN realized_VBN was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
1,368-12-10_CD ,_, which_WDT ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN Rs_NNP ._.
586-6-11_CD of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, shows_VBZ an_DT increase_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
782-5-11_CD in_IN the_DT profits_NNS from_IN manufactures_NNS during_IN 1869_CD ._.
In_IN Government_NNP resolution_NN dated_VBD Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 6th_CD July_NNP 1869_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD remarked_VBN that_IN the_DT outturn_NN from_IN manufactures_NNS of_IN this_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB good_JJ as_IN it_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB ;_: and_CC the_DT superintendent_NN was_VBD directed_VBN to_TO place_VB himself_PRP in_IN communication_NN with_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP ,_, and_CC see_VB if_IN some_DT useful_JJ hints_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB derived_VBN from_IN Dullunda_NNP in_IN this_DT respect_NN ._.
I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD February_NNP 1869_CD ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN Dr_NNP ._.
Wise_NNP had_VBD devoted_VBN the_DT time_NN and_CC labor_NN of_IN his_PRP$ lunatics_NNS chiefly_VBP to_TO the_DT endeavour_NN to_TO clear_VB the_DT new_JJ ground_NN which_WDT had_VBD recently_RB been_VBN enclosed_VBN and_CC dismantled_VBN of_IN the_DT house_NN which_WDT had_VBD covered_VBN it_PRP ._.
Foundations_NNS of_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN houses_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB dug_VBN up_RP ,_, no_DT less_JJR than_IN 103_CD wells_NNS to_TO be_VB filled_VBN in_IN ,_, and_CC a_DT tank_NN extending_NN over_IN about_IN 5,372_CD square_JJ feet_NNS of_IN superficial_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC reaching_VBG to_TO a_DT depth_NN of_IN 38_CD feet_NNS ,_, had_VBD to_TO be_VB filled_VBN up_RP ._.
With_IN the_DT time_NN and_CC attention_NN both_DT of_IN the_DT establishment_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS thus_RB devoted_VBN to_TO the_DT very_RB desirable_JJ object_NN of_IN clearing_NN and_CC levelling_VBG the_DT ground_NN and_CC preparing_VBG it_PRP for_IN cultivation_NN ,_, DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
19_CD works_NNS of_IN manufacture_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB carried_VBN on_IN extensively_RB in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN there_EX was_VBD much_JJ work_NN remaining_VBG to_TO be_VB done_VBN in_IN the_DT grounds_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN before_IN a_DT garden_NN could_MD be_VB laid_VBN out_RP ._.
The_DT filling_VBG up_IN of_IN the_DT tank_NN was_VBD completed_VBN ,_, many_JJ large_JJ hollows_NNS in_IN which_WDT water_NN lodged_VBD were_VBD filled_VBN up_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT general_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN was_VBD levelled_VBN ._.
But_CC for_IN this_DT ,_, as_IN for_IN the_DT labor_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP comparatively_RB a_DT small_JJ sum_NN in_IN money_NN to_TO show_VB ._.
The_DT advantages_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, which_WDT have_VBP accrued_VBN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN are_VBP great_JJ ,_, though_IN not_RB represented_VBN by_IN a_DT money_NN value_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN August_NNP I_PRP had_VBD to_TO go_VB on_IN duty_NN to_TO Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP took_VBD advantage_NN of_IN the_DT opportunity_NN to_TO place_VB myself_PRP ,_, as_IN directed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP ,_, in_IN communica-_JJ tion_NN with_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP ,_, who_WP most_JJS kindly_RB showed_VBD me_PRP over_IN the_DT Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, and_CC gave_VBD me_PRP much_JJ valuable_JJ instruction_NN and_CC many_JJ useful_JJ hints_NNS ._.
Amongst_IN these_DT probably_RB the_DT most_RBS important_JJ was_VBD the_DT necessity_NN of_IN a_DT good_JJ establishment_NN ._.
The_DT shortcomings_NNS of_IN the_DT establishment_NN of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP were_VBD last_JJ year_NN commented_VBD on_IN by_IN Dr_NNP ._.
Wise_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN have_VBP refered_VBN me_PRP to_TO the_DT Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP that_IN they_PRP will_MD now_RB sanction_VB for_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP an_DT establishment_NN similar_JJ to_TO that_DT of_IN Dullunda_NNP ._.
We_PRP have_VBP purchased_VBN an_DT English_JJ oil_NN press_NN ,_, and_CC we_PRP hope_VBP soon_RB to_TO be_VB turning_VBG out_RP regularly_RB such_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN castor-oil_NN as_IN will_MD ensure_VB for_IN the_DT asylum_NN a_DT steady_JJ source_NN of_IN profit_NN ._.
Some_DT other_JJ hints_NNS in_IN minor_NN details_NNS have_VBP been_VBN gleaned_VBN ,_, but_CC I_PRP venture_NN to_TO think_VB that_IN it_PRP will_MD take_VB many_JJ years_NNS before_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ as_IN yet_RB only_RB in_IN a_DT transitional_JJ state_NN ,_, can_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO yield_VB anything_NN like_IN the_DT outturn_NN of_IN an_DT asylum_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB long_RB in_IN development_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT is_VBZ now_RB in_IN such_JJ admirable_JJ order_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.

XVI_NN ._.
The_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN regularly_RB visited_VBN by_IN the_DT visitors_NNS ,_, and_CC frequently_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Dr._NNP Buckle_NNP ,_, C.B_NNP ._.

XVII_NN ._.
Thus_RB frequently_RB inspected_VBN and_CC reported_VBN on_IN as_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ this_DT year_NN been_VBN His_PRP$ Honor_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP will_MD have_VB been_VBN well_RB informed_VBN concerning_VBG the_DT general_JJ management_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP happy_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO add_VB that_IN having_VBG now_RB got_VBN through_IN much_RB of_IN the_DT heavy_JJ work_NN which_WDT had_VBD to_TO be_VB done_VBN in_IN clearing_VBG away_RB the_DT debris_NN of_IN houses_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN bringing_VBG the_DT new_JJ grounds_NNS of_IN the_DT institution_NN under_IN cultivation_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT outturn_NN from_IN manufactures_NNS at_IN this_DT asylum_NN will_MD during_IN the_DT year_NN 1870_CD be_VB more_RBR satisfactory_JJ ._.
Already_RB the_DT garden_NN is_VBZ yielding_VBG a_DT considerable_JJ monthly_JJ income_NN ;_: various_JJ branches_NNS of_IN industry_NN are_VBP being_VBG developed_VBN in_IN the_DT work-sheds_NNS ;_: the_DT preparation_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN of_IN castor-_JJ oil_NN is_VBZ being_VBG commenced_VBN ;_: and_CC yet_RB further_JJ resources_NNS in_IN industrial_JJ labor_NN will_MD be_VB developed_VBN as_IN the_DT idiosyncracies_NNS of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT institution_NN are_VBP more_RBR intimately_RB understood_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ servant_NN ,_, H._NNP C._NNP CUTCLIFFE_NNP ,_, F.R.C.S._NNP ,_, Offg_NNP ._.
Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, and_CC Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, Dacca_NNP ._.
THE_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, MR._NNP H._NNP B._NNP BUCKLE_NNP ,_, C.B._NNP ,_, in_IN trans-_JJ mitting_NN this_DT report_NN ,_, makes_VBZ the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS :_: DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.
The_DT management_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ most_RBS satisfactory_JJ :_: the_DT insanes_NNS are_VBP kindly_RB and_CC judiciously_RB treated_VBN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP encouraged_VBN to_TO work_VB ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB made_VBN a_DT task_NN ,_, but_CC done_VBN with_IN a_DT willing_JJ and_CC cheerful_JJ spirit_NN ._.

The_DT superintendent_NN reports_NNS very_RB favorably_RB of_IN his_PRP$ attention_NN to_TO his_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ gentleness_NN and_CC tact_NN ._.

33_CD FROM_NNP SURGEON_NNP J._NNP BEDFORD_NNP ALLEN_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Patna_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_DT DEPY_NNP ._.
INSPR.-GENL_NNP ._.
OF_IN HOSPITALS_NNP ,_, DINAPORE_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Patna_NNP ,_, 1st_CD January_NNP 1870_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT several_JJ returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Patna_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP together_RB with_IN my_PRP$ report_NN for_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN upon_IN the_DT 13th_CD July_NNP 1869_CD ._.
The_DT past_JJ year_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN a_DT healthy_JJ one_CD ,_, though_IN we_PRP have_VBP had_VBN no_DT serious_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN any_DT epidemic_JJ ._.
The_DT hot_JJ season_NN was_VBD very_RB trying_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT rains_NNS unusually_RB heavy_JJ with_IN severe_JJ inundations_NNS ;_: the_DT rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN consequently_RB high_JJ ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
2_CD shews_NNS an_DT increase_NN in_IN admissions_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, of_IN 14_CD ,_, and_CC a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 3_CD remain-_JJ ing_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
3_CD contains_NNS abstract_JJ from_IN the_DT annual_JJ return_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, male_NN and_CC female_NN ,_, and_CC nature_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, drawn_VBN out_RP according_VBG to_TO the_DT new_JJ nomenclature_NN of_IN diseases_NNS ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
4.34_CD PATNA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
12_CD shews_VBZ the_DT articles_NNS manufactured_VBD and_CC amount_NN realized_VBN and_CC disbursed_VBN for_IN the_DT same_JJ ._.
These_DT four_CD last_JJ returns_NNS are_VBP not_RB as_RB favorable_JJ as_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT reprehensible_JJ conduct_NN of_IN overseer_NN Manson_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ laxity_NN and_CC incapacity_NN totally_RB unfitted_VBD him_PRP for_IN the_DT post_NN he_PRP held_VBD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ but_CC little_JJ to_TO remark_VB upon_IN with_IN regard_NN to_TO treatment_NN ._.
The_DT ._.
application_NN of_IN the_DT cold_JJ douche_NN has_VBZ been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN good_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP freely_RB permitted_VBN amusements_NNS and_CC recreations_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP frequently_RB remarked_VBN that_IN an_DT accession_NN of_IN excitement_NN occurs_NNS at_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ moon_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT tables_NNS have_VBP been_VBN kept_VBN this_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT food_NN is_VBZ unexceptionable_JJ in_IN quality_NN and_CC sufficient_NN in_IN quantity_NN ._.
The_DT atta_NN is_VBZ ground_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN by_IN the_DT female_JJ insanes_NNS ,_, who_WP also_RB prepare_VBP soojee_NN for_IN sale_NN ._.
The_DT monthly_JJ meeting_NN of_IN visitors_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN most_JJS studiously_RB attended_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT Inspector-_NNP General_NNP of_IN Jails_NNP paid_VBD his_PRP$ annual_JJ inspection_NN visit_NN in_IN March_NNP last_JJ ._.
The_DT dry-earth_JJ conservancy_NN system_NN has_VBZ been_VBN strictly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
One_CD large_JJ shed_VBN was_VBD added_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT males_NNS ,_, which_WDT cost_VBP Rs_NNP ._.
858_CD ,_, the_DT whole_JJ amount_NN sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP in_IN letter_NN No_NNP ._.
779_CD ,_, dated_VBD 22nd_CD February_NNP 1869_CD ._.
A_DT large_JJ tank_NN ,_, 150ft_CD ._.
x_RB 100ft._CD ,_, was_VBD sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT visitors_NNS to_TO be_VB excavated_VBN at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,641-6_JJ ,_, and_CC application_NN was_VBD made_VBN through_IN the_DT magistrate_NN to_TO the_DT commissioner_NN for_IN assistance_NN from_IN the_DT relief_NN works_VBZ ,_, and_CC sanction_NN obtained_VBN for_IN half_PDT the_DT amount_NN ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
820_CD ,_, and_CC sub-_JJ sequently_RB a_DT further_JJ sum_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
17-9-9_CD was_VBD granted_VBN ._.
This_DT tank_NN was_VBD considered_VBN necessary_JJ in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT wells_NNS failing_VBG to_TO give_VB the_DT needful_JJ supply_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactorily_RB performed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT earth_NN made_VBD use_NN of_IN to_TO level_VB the_DT compound_NN ._.
A_DT pucka_NN ght_NN yet_RB remains_VBZ to_TO be_VB built_VBN ._.
Bamboo_NNP machans_NNS were_VBD put_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT verandah_NN for_IN the_DT insanes_NNS to_TO sleep_VB on_IN ,_, damp_NN was_VBD so_RB excessive_JJ in_IN the_DT cells_NNS of_IN the_DT male_JJ ward_NN ._.
Upon_IN receiving_VBG charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, an_DT unfavorable_JJ report_NN of_IN overseer_NN Manson_NNP was_VBD given_VBN me_PRP by_IN my_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT overseer_NN 's_POS subsequent_JJ conduct_NN proved_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB totally_RB unfit_JJ and_CC incompetent_JJ for_IN such_JJ a_DT charge_NN ._.
For_IN two_CD months_NNS after_IN my_PRP$ taking_VBG charge_NN he_PRP was_VBD con-_JJ fined_VBN to_TO the_DT house_NN and_CC incapacitated_VBN for_IN work_NN by_IN severe_JJ illness_NN ._.
Shortly_RB after_IN returning_VBG to_TO duty_VB he_PRP was_VBD charged_VBN with_IN committing_VBG a_DT criminal_JJ assault_NN upon_IN a_DT female_JJ insane_NN ,_, which_WDT charge_VBP though_IN not_RB proven_VBN ,_, strong_JJ reasons_NNS existed_VBD for_IN condemning_VBG his_PRP$ conduct_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ removal_NN was_VBD ordered_VBN ._.
Pending_VBG arrival_NN of_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN he_PRP was_VBD retained_VBN ,_, but_CC behaving_VBG in_IN a_DT disgraceful_JJ and_CC insubor-_JJ dinate_NN manner_NN ,_, his_PRP$ immediate_JJ dismissal_NN became_VBD necessary_JJ ._.
A_DT native_JJ overseer_NN was_VBD appointed_VBN pro_JJ tem_NN ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP to_TO say_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT subordinate_NN establishment_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT asylum_NN became_VBD disorganized_VBN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN overseer_NN Manson_NNP ._.
The_DT native_JJ doctor_NN proved_VBD himself_PRP untrustworthy_JJ and_CC was_VBD transferred_VBN ._.
I_PRP may_MD truly_VB say_VB I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN nothing_NN but_CC difficulties_NNS and_CC up-hill_JJ work_NN since_IN I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, but_CC am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO add_VB that_IN I_PRP have_VBP every_DT hope_NN next_IN year_NN 's_POS report_NN will_MD be_VB satisfactory_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP advised_VBN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT matron_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ kindly_RB taken_VBN it_PRP into_IN consideration_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ servant_NN ,_, J._NNP BEDFORD_NNP ALLEN_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.
PATNA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
35_CD THE_NNP forwarding_VBG report_NN of_IN Deputy_NNP Inspector-Greneral_NNP H._NNP M._NNP MACPHERSON_NNP is_VBZ appended_VBN :36_JJ PATNA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN his_PRP$ fitness_NN for_IN his_PRP$ important_JJ office_NN became_VBD suspected_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Hutchinson_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ subsequent_JJ misconduct_NN and_CC necessary_JJ removal_NN have_VBP already_RB been_VBN fully_RB reported_VBN ._.
He_PRP quarrelled_VBD with_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT native_JJ establishment_NN ,_, who_WP entertained_VBD no_DT respect_NN for_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC especially_RB with_IN the_DT native_JJ doctor_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD up_RP to_TO that_DT time_NN been_VBN a_DT useful_JJ and_CC atten-_JJ tive_JJ man_NN ,_, but_CC eventually_RB became_VBD so_RB insubordinate_JJ and_CC insolent_JJ ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB suspended_VBN and_CC sent_VBN to_TO a_DT distant_JJ and_CC inferior_JJ post_NN as_IN a_DT punishment_NN ._.
The_DT native_JJ doctor_NN appointed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ room_NN appears_VBZ to_TO give_VB satisfaction_NN ,_, as_IN does_VBZ the_DT native_JJ overseer_NN or_CC darogah_NN who_WP was_VBD put_VBN in_IN subordinate_JJ charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN until_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ overseer_NN transferred_VBN from_IN Cuttack_NNP ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP that_DT things_NNS will_MD work_VB well_RB and_CC smoothly_RB under_IN the_DT superintendence_NN of_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN to_TO place_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT female_JJ ward_NN should_MD she_PRP prove_VB to_TO be_VB qualified_VBN for_IN the_DT post_NN ._.

49_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP MOYDAPORE_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP FOR_NNP 1869_CD ._.

his_PRP$ dismissal_NN long_RB ago_RB had_VBD not_RB his_PRP$ services_NNS been_VBN so_RB excessively_RB overrated_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ superior_NN ,_, the_DT late_JJ civil_JJ surgeon_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT occupation_NN for_IN such_PDT an_DT official_NN here_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP recommend_VBP his_PRP$ discharge_NN ._.
A_DT head_NN native_JJ overseer_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD sufficiently_RB educated_VBN to_TO relieve_VB the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN from_IN the_DT trouble_NN of_IN writing_VBG the_DT monthly_JJ returns_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP could_MD keep_VB the_DT accounts_NNS and_CC supply_NN diets_NNS ,_, is_VBZ all_DT that_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN in_IN such_JJ a_DT place_NN as_IN this_DT ;_: and_CC I_PRP therefore_VBP advise_IN the_DT introduction_NN here_RB of_IN a_DT good_JJ darogah_NN on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD a_DT month_NN ._.
I_PRP again_RB invite_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT recommendations_NNS which_WDT I_PRP made_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ inspection_NN reports_NNS on_IN asylums_NNS last_JJ year_NN ;_: and_CC when_WRB this_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ re-built_JJ ,_, or_CC when_WRB new_JJ asylums_NNS elsewhere_RB are_VBP constructed_VBN ,_, I_PRP urgently_RB press_NN for_IN the_DT appoint-_JJ ment_NN of_IN a_DT resident_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, as_IN in_IN all_PDT the_DT asylums_NNS in_IN England_NNP ._.
There_EX should_MD be_VB a_DT good_JJ ,_, specially_RB instructed_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN living_NN on_IN the_DT asylum_NN grounds_NNS ._.
In_IN every_DT case_NN his_PRP$ salary_NN would_MD be_VB Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD a_DT month_NN only_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP would_MD have_VB under_IN his_PRP$ superintendence_NN every-_JJ thing_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT sanitation_NN ,_, hygiene_NN ,_, treatment_NN ,_, and_CC clothing_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS ,_, whilst_VBP the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN ,_, on_IN a_DT reduced_VBN salary_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB simple_JJ superintendent_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP is_VBZ not_RB now_RB ._.
I_PRP would_MD give_VB him_PRP Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD for_IN this_DT duty_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN Rs_NNP ._.

55_CD should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO Madras_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN promised_VBN employment_NN ,_, and_CC whither_RB he_PRP considered_VBD himself_PRP bound_NN when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ._.

for_IN their_PRP$ maintenance_NN ._.

56,170_CD in_IN 1868_CD ;_: of_IN which_WDT Rs_NNP ._.

24,335_CD were_VBD expended_VBN on_IN establishment_NN (_( including_VBG salary_NN of_IN superintendent_NN )_) ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
21,306_CD :_: the_DT difference_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO sanctioned_JJ increase_NN of_IN wages_NNS and_CC to_TO enhanced_VB numbers_NNS ._.

23-5-4_JJ ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
29_CD in_IN 1868_CD ,_, without_IN deduction_NN for_IN sums_NNS received_VBN in_IN payment_NN for_IN individuals_NNS ._.
I_PRP can_MD add_VB nothing_NN to_TO what_WP has_VBZ been_VBN said_VBD in_IN former_JJ years_NNS of_IN the_DT characters_NNS and_CC conduct_NN of_IN the_DT European_JJ subordinates_NNS ._.
The_DT head_NN overseer_NN and_CC matron_NN are_VBP so_RB thoroughly_RB suited_VBN in_IN every_DT respect_NN to_TO their_PRP$ situations_NNS ,_, that_IN all_PDT the_DT daily_JJ routine_NN of_IN discipline_NN and_CC order_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN almost_RB without_IN my_PRP$ intervention_NN ._.
Except_IN where_WRB there_EX are_VBP acute_JJ cases_NNS and_CC others_NNS requiring_VBG medical_JJ treatment_NN ,_, my_PRP$ daily_JJ visit_NN becomes_VBZ little_RB more_JJR than_IN a_DT visit_NN of_IN inspection_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN correspondence_NN and_CC other_JJ external_JJ business_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ._.
Overseer_NNP Franklin_NNP continues_VBZ to_TO deserve_VB most_RBS favorable_JJ mention_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN overseer_NN rendered_VBD it_PRP desirable_JJ that_IN he_PRP should_MD take_VB privilege_NN leave_NN ,_, and_CC advantage_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT asylum_NN had_VBD fewest_JJS inmates_NNS ._.
This_DT threw_VBD additional_JJ work_NN on_IN the_DT matron_NN and_CC second_JJ overseer_NN ,_, whose_WP$ conduct_NN left_VBD nothing_NN to_TO desire_VB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO be_VB ,_, SIR_NNP ,_, Your_NNP most_RBS obedient_JJ servant_NN ,_, ARTHUR_NNP PAYNE_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-Major_NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN Asylums_NNP at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, Annual_NNP inspection_NN report_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN by_IN Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, G._NNP Saunders_NNP ._.
AT_NNP Bhowanipore_NNP there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN everywhere_RB the_DT same_JJ regularity_NN and_CC order_NN observable_JJ as_IN was_VBD noticed_VBN by_IN me_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ inspection_NN remarks_NNS last_JJ year_NN ._.
Surgeon-Major_JJ Payne_NNP is_VBZ an_DT excellent_JJ superintendent_NN ,_, and_CC bestows_NNS such_PDT an_DT amount_NN of_IN care_NN and_CC attention_NN on_IN every_DT detail_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN this_DT institution_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB scarcely_RB possible_JJ to_TO find_VB fault_NN with_IN anything_NN that_WDT has_VBZ come_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ notice_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS scrupu-_JJ lous_JJ cleanliness_NN is_VBZ observable_JJ in_IN every_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP never_RB yet_RB ,_, at_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN my_PRP$ visits_NNS ,_, observed_VBD the_DT wards_NNS or_CC rooms_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT insanes_NNS are_VBP confined_VBN otherwise_RB than_IN perfectly_RB clean_JJ and_CC neat_NN ._.
The_DT conservancy_NN also_RB must_MD be_VB very_RB perfect_JJ ,_, for_IN anything_NN approaching_VBG a_DT disagreeable_JJ smell_NN is_VBZ never_RB ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN I_PRP am_VBP aware_JJ ,_, to_TO be_VB detected_VBN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN premises_NNS ._.
That_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN allotted_VBD to_TO the_DT female_JJ insanes_NNS is_VBZ a_DT marvel_NN of_IN studied_JJ neatness_NN and_CC regularity_NN ._.
The_DT wards_NNS are_VBP some_DT of_IN them_PRP wanting_VBG repair_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT centre_NN building_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN grounds_NNS (_( in_IN which_WDT the_DT overseer_NN resides_NNS )_) is_VBZ in_IN an_DT unsafe_JJ condition_NN ,_, and_CC should_MD be_VB repaired_VBN at_IN once_RB ._.
It_PRP was_VBD in_IN contemplation_NN to_TO pull_VB down_RP some_DT of_IN these_DT asylum_JJ buildings_NNS and_CC reconstruct_NN on_IN a_DT better_JJR plan_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT acquisition_NN of_IN greater_JJR space_NN and_CC accommodation_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP am_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN with_IN substantial_JJ repairs_NNS to_TO the_DT superintendent_NN 's_POS house_NN ,_, and_CC annual_JJ petty_NN repairs_NNS to_TO the_DT other_JJ buildings_NNS ,_, additional_JJ accommodation_NN is_VBZ not_RB now_RB needed_VBN ,_, if_IN ,_, as_IN contem-_JJ plated_JJ and_CC recommended_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP and_CC myself_PRP ,_, the_DT majority_NN of_IN soldier_JJR insanes_NNS are_VBP sent_VBN from_IN the_DT provinces_NNS to_TO the_DT most_RBS ready_JJ port_NN for_IN embarkation_NN ,_, Bombay_NNP ._.
As_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP the_DT provisioning_NN at_IN this_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN as_RB good_JJ as_IN can_MD be_VB expected_VBN ._.
Occasionally_RB the_DT con-_JJ tractor_NN has_VBZ had_VBN his_PRP$ meat_NN condemned_VBD ,_, and_CC I_PRP had_VBD occasion_NN only_RB recently_RB to_TO make_VB a_DT remark_NN in_IN the_DT visitors_NNS '_POS book_NN which_WDT was_VBD adverse_JJ to_TO the_DT meat_NN supplier_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP quite_RB think_VBP that_IN the_DT inmates_NNS are_VBP well_RB fed_VBN ,_, and_CC well_RB clothed_VBN also_RB ._.
BHOWANIPORE_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
57_CD A_DT very_RB pretty_RB and_CC useful_JJ garden_NN shed_VBN has_VBZ been_VBN erected_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_JJ grounds_NNS of_IN corrugated_JJ iron_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT female_JJ insanes_NNS ,_, to_TO enable_VB them_PRP to_TO sit_VB out_RP as_RB much_RB as_IN possible_JJ in_IN the_DT open_JJ air_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ covered_VBN now_RB with_IN creepers_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ not_RB only_RB useful_JJ ,_, but_CC ornamental_JJ ._.
The_DT superintendent_NN 's_POS report_NN will_MD give_VB all_DT necessary_JJ information_NN of_IN a_DT statistical_JJ nature_NN ,_, as_IN also_RB on_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN cost_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG the_DT asylum_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP may_MD remark_VB that_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN actual_JJ monthly_JJ maintenance_NN per_IN individual_NN (_( Rs_NNP ._.
23-5-4_JJ )_) is_VBZ moderate_JJ and_CC reasonable_JJ ,_, considering_VBG the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT supplies_NNS are_VBP contracted_VBN for_IN and_CC the_DT higher_JJR market_NN rates_NNS of_IN many_JJ articles_NNS of_IN food_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS has_VBZ always_RB appeared_VBN to_TO me_PRP to_TO be_VB judicious_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB rare_JJ indeed_RB that_IN much_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ needed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT overseer_NN and_CC his_PRP$ assistant_NN are_VBP generally_RB enabled_VBN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP told_RB ,_, to_TO carry_VB out_RP their_PRP$ orders_NNS without_IN having_VBG recourse_NN to_TO violent_JJ measures_NNS of_IN repression_NN ._.
Occasionally_RB forcible_JJ restraint_NN is_VBZ needed_VBN ,_, but_CC usually_RB kindness_JJ and_CC gentleness_NN are_VBP all_DT that_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, the_DT superintendent_NN raises_VBZ the_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT causation_NN of_IN insanity_NN as_IN dependant_NN on_IN ,_, or_CC associated_VBN with_IN intemperance_NN ,_, and_CC records_NNS his_PRP$ belief_NN that_IN in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS where_WRB an_DT insane_NN has_VBZ been_VBN addicted_VBN to_TO intemperate_VB habits_NNS ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT manifestations_NNS of_IN disease_NN ._.
Possibly_RB Dr._NNP Payne_NNP is_VBZ correct_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ view_NN of_IN the_DT relationship_NN between_IN insanity_NN and_CC habitual_JJ drunkenness_NN ,_, but_CC probably_RB the_DT true_JJ explanation_NN is_VBZ this_DT ,_, that_DT whereas_NNS in_IN rare_JJ cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN that_IN mania_VBZ directly_RB results_NNS from_IN intemperance_NN ,_, yet_CC that_IN the_DT too_RB free_JJ use_NN of_IN spirituous_JJ liquors_NNS will_MD be_VB more_RBR likely_JJ than_IN anything_NN else_JJ to_TO assist_VB in_IN maturing_VBG mental_JJ disease_NN whenever_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT hereditary_JJ tendency_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT individual_NN is_VBZ predisposed_VBN by_IN habit_NN or_CC mode_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, or_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN acute_NN brain_NN disease_NN ._.
Very_RB little_JJ is_VBZ done_VBN at_IN this_DT asylum_NN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN labor_NN ._.
Doubtless_NNP many_JJ forms_NNS of_IN mental_JJ disease_NN are_VBP benefitted_VBN by_IN manual_JJ labor_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN such_JJ an_DT approved_JJ remedial_JJ agent_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB more_RBR frequently_RB had_VBD recourse_NN to_TO ;_: but_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP any_DT system_NN of_IN labor_NN ._.
Soldier_NNP insanes_NNS are_VBP only_RB here_RB for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Payne_NNP finds_VBZ that_IN the_DT Eurasians_NNPS wo_MD n't_RB work_VB ._.
The_DT women_NNS do_VBP needle_JJ work_NN ,_, and_CC croquet_NN and_CC other_JJ amusements_NNS are_VBP available_JJ for_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN the_DT after_IN history_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS sent_VBD from_IN this_DT asylum_NN to_TO England_NNP is_VBZ never_RB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT superintendent_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT remark_NN is_VBZ especially_RB refer-_JJ able_JJ to_TO military_JJ insanes_NNS ._.
Insanity_NN is_VBZ often_RB assumed_VBN by_IN men_NNS in_IN the_DT service_NN as_IN a_DT means_NN of_IN getting_VBG themselves_PRP dis-_JJ charged_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP think_VBP I_PRP have_VBP occasionally_RB seen_VBN men_NNS at_IN Bhowanipore_NNP whose_WP$ appearance_NN and_CC condition_NN suggested_VBD the_DT idea_NN either_CC that_IN the_DT particular_JJ mental_JJ condition_NN for_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN invalided_VBN was_VBD of_IN a_DT very_RB ephemeral_JJ kind_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN it_PRP had_VBD not_RB existed_VBN ._.

The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN insanes_NNS admitted_VBN and_CC re-admitted_JJ into_IN the_DT several_JJ native_JJ institutions*_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD slightly_RB below_IN the_DT number_NN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, being_VBG 418_CD against_IN 429_CD ;_: but_CC the_DT aggregate_JJ number_NN treated_VBN was_VBD greater_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG six_CD years_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, 1,106_CD ._.

as_IN cured_VBN ,_, and_CC 5.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
improved_VBN and_CC made_VBN over_IN to_TO friends_NNS ,_, the_DT total_JJ percentage_NN being_VBG 21.4_CD against_IN 25.71_CD discharged_VBD in_IN 1868_CD ._.

less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT mortality_NN amounted_VBD to_TO 113_CD ,_, or_CC 10.2_CD percent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN treated_VBN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD slightly_RB in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT rates_NNS in_IN 1868_CD ,_, though_RB below_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG six_CD years_NNS ;_: while_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN stood_VBD at_IN 15.6_CD against_IN 15.25_CD in_IN 1868_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT results_NNS were_VBD considered_VBN particularly_RB favorable_JJ ._.

were_VBD from_IN cholera_NN ._.

At_IN Patna_NNP ,_, where_WRB 269_CD were_VBD treated_VBN ,_, the_DT results_NNS ,_, both_CC as_IN to_TO cures_NNS and_CC mortality_NN ,_, were_VBD more_RBR favorable_JJ than_IN at_IN either_DT Dullunda_NNP or_CC Dacca_NNP ;_: while_IN at_IN Dullunda_NNP ,_, which_WDT received_VBD the_DT largest_JJS number_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS were_VBD more_RBR favorable_JJ than_IN at_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, where_WRB decidedly_RB the_DT greatest_JJS amount_NN of_IN sickness_NN prevailed_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT whole_JJ number_NN under_IN treatment_NN ,_, 71.15_CD per_IN cent_NN were_VBD suffer-_JJ ing_NN from_IN acute_NN or_CC chronic_JJ mania_NN ,_, as_IN distinguished_VBN from_IN dementia_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT less_JJR than_IN 490_CD cases_NNS proceeded_VBD from_IN ,_, or_CC were_VBD attributed_VBN to_TO ,_, the_DT use_NN of_IN intoxicating_VBG drugs_NNS and_CC spirits_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN in_IN Patna_NNP from_IN ganjah_NN alone_RB ,_, put_VBD down_RB at_IN 126_CD ,_, is_VBZ very_RB noticeable_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD show_VB that_IN this_DT drug_NN is_VBZ more_RBR largely_RB consumed_VBN in_IN Behar_NNP than_IN elsewhere_RB ._.

1_CD furnishes_VBZ the_DT summary_JJ results_NNS of_IN 1870_CD for_IN all_PDT the_DT native_JJ asylums_NNS in_IN comparison_NN with_IN the_DT years_NNS 1865-69_JJ ,_, and_CC statement_NN No_NNP ._.
2_CD shows_VBZ the_DT general_JJ statistical_JJ data_NNS for_IN each_DT institution_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN ._.
It_PRP were_VBD well_RB if_IN each_DT asylum_NN gave_VBD the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN in_IN comparison_NN with_IN former_JJ years_NNS on_IN a_DT uniform_JJ plan_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP might_MD admit_VB of_IN ready_JJ comparison_NN with_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ previous_JJ history_NN ,_, with_IN other_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT general_JJ table_NN for_IN all_DT asylums_NNS ._.

7_CD ._.

10_CD ._.
Table_JJ No_DT ._.
11_CD has_VBZ been_VBN prepared_VBN to_TO show_VB the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN cholera_NN and_CC from_IN other_JJ causes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT ratio_NN per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN deaths_NNS calculated_VBN both_DT in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT total_JJ population_NN (_( as_IN has_VBZ hitherto_VBN been_VBN the_DT custom_NN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN )_) ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT more_RBR usual_JJ and_CC correct_JJ method_NN ._.
The_DT ratio_NN per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD ,_, during_IN the_DT year_NN 1870_CD ,_, 18.46_CD ,_, or_CC .72_VBZ more_JJR than_IN the_DT death-rate_NN of_IN 1869_CD ,_, and_CC 4.10_CD less_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN 1868_CD ,_, in_IN which_WDT year_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, 7.5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT deaths_NNS were_VBD caused_VBN by_IN cholera_NN ,_, which_WDT disease_NN in_IN 1869_CD destroyed_VBD only_RB 2.38_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC in_IN 1870_CD ,_, 2.24_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN all_DT who_WP died_VBD ._.
But_CC in_IN 1869_CD one_CD accidental_JJ death_NN (_( from_IN injury_NN )_) occurred_VBD ,_, and_CC in_IN 1870_CD two_CD accidental_JJ deaths_NNS (_( suicides_NNS )_) occurred_VBD ._.
Excluding_VBG these_DT accidental_JJ deaths_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN cholera_NN ,_, the_DT death-rate_NN from_IN other_JJ diseases_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, for_IN 1868_CD ,_, 15_CD ;_: for_IN 1869_CD ,_, 14.68_CD ;_: and_CC for_IN 1870_CD ,_, 15.78_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
to_TO daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN ._.
In_IN table_JJ No_NNP ._.
12_CD are_VBP exhibited_VBN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN death_NN ,_, ratio_VBP per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN deaths_NNS in_IN each_DT month_NN ,_, the_DT temperature_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT accommodation_NN afforded_VBD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 41_CD deaths_NNS ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN 8_CD ,_, or_CC 19.51_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP returned_VBN as_IN cases_NNS of_IN ``_`` meningitis_NN ._. ''_''
They_PRP were_VBD cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT well-marked_JJ and_CC extensive_JJ morbid_NN changes_NNS were_VBD observable_JJ in_IN the_DT pia_NN mater_NN and_CC arachnoid_NN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN those_DT cases_NNS seemed_VBD to_TO sink_VB from_IN exhaustion_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP have_VBP classified_VBN all_DT cases_NNS as_RB much_RB as_IN possible_JJ in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT chief_JJ pathological_JJ lesions_NNS observed_VBD on_IN actual_JJ dissection_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT three_CD cases_NNS of_IN dementia_NN with_IN debility_NN ,_, the_DT arachnoid_NN and_CC pia_NN mater_NN were_VBD not_RB in_IN such_JJ states_NNS as_IN would_MD be_VB at_IN all_DT described_VBN by_IN the_DT word_NN ``_`` inflamed_VBD ,_, ''_'' and_CC the_DT causes_NNS of_IN death_NN in_IN these_DT cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN referred_VBN to_TO debility_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ remarks_NNS apply_VBP to_TO those_DT cases_NNS entered_VBD as_IN epilepsy_NN with_IN debility_NN ._.
14.85_CD deaths_NNS ,_, or_CC 24.41_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, resulted_VBD from_IN diseases_NNS referable_JJ to_TO the_DT brain_NN and_CC its_PRP$ membranes_NNS ._.
Five_CD deaths_NNS ,_, or_CC 2.24_CD of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, resulted_VBD from_IN cholera_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN cholera_NN treated_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 13_CD ._.
The_DT ratio_NN per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO cases_NNS treated_VBN was_VBD therefore_RB 38.46_CD ._.
No_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN after_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN May_NNP ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB remarkable_JJ that_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN is_VBZ known_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN in_IN Dacca_NNP from_IN August_NNP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN from_IN the_DT asylum_NN during_IN these_DT months_NNS is_VBZ therefore_RB not_RB attributable_JJ to_TO any_DT specialities_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT institution_NN and_CC its_PRP$ inmates_NNS ,_, but_CC is_VBZ merely_RB in_IN harmony_NN with_IN a_DT very_RB exceptional_JJ absence_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Why_WRB cholera_NN did_VBD not_RB appear_VB in_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, as_IN it_PRP almost_RB always_RB does_VBZ soon_RB after_IN the_DT rains_NNS have_VBP ceased_VBN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO explain_VB ._.
Another_DT exceptional_JJ peculiarity_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD the_DT prolonged_JJ and_CC high_JJ inun-_JJ dation_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ;_: but_CC whether_IN there_EX may_MD have_VB been_VBN any_DT possible_JJ connection_NN between_IN DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
37_CD these_DT peculiarities_NNS ,_, I_PRP am_VBP unable_JJ to_TO say_VB ._.
Six_CD out_IN of_IN 50_CD cases_NNS of_IN dysentery_NN admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN ,_, or_CC 12_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, died_VBD ._.
This_DT disease_NN is_VBZ extremely_RB fatal_JJ amongst_NN natives_NNS in_IN Dacca_NNP ._.
Dr_NNP ._.

a_DT cloth_NN passed_VBN round_IN the_DT neck_NN and_CC tied_VBN to_TO the_DT iron_NN door_NN of_IN his_PRP$ cell_NN so_RB as_RB partially_RB to_TO support_VB his_PRP$ body_NN ._.
The_DT deceased_VBN was_VBD last_JJ seen_VBN alive_JJ at_IN 2_CD A.M._NNP ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD visited_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ solitary_JJ cell_NN by_IN the_DT jemadar_NN on_IN duty_NN ._.

Profits.40_NNP DACCA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
The_DT keepers_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN are_VBP not_RB at_IN all_DT what_WP they_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB ;_: the_DT pay_NN is_VBZ insufficient_JJ to_TO attract_VB good_JJ men_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO me_PRP unreasonable_JJ to_TO suppose_VB that_IN in_IN Dacca_NNP any_DT native_NN who_WP has_VBZ no_DT more_JJR than_IN Rs_NNP ._.

In_IN September_NNP last_JJ ,_, at_IN a_DT monthly_JJ meeting_NN of_IN the_DT visitors_NNS ,_, I_PRP reported_VBD that_IN the_DT two_CD criminals_NNS who_WP escaped_VBD last_JJ month_NN (_( August_NNP )_) from_IN the_DT asylum_NN made_VBD their_PRP$ escape_NN from_IN the_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN the_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT containing_VBG wall_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN grounds_VBZ adjacent_JJ to_TO the_DT hospital_NN is_VBZ for_IN 62_CD yards_NNS only_RB 6_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.

I_PRP beg_VBP now_RB to_TO press_VB this_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT visitors_NNS on_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP ._.

FROM_NNP B._NNP SIMPSON_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, Patna_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_VB DEPUTY_NNP INSPECTOR-GENEEAL_NNP OF_NNP HOSPITALS_NNP ,_, DINAPORE_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ._.
Patna_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 11th_CD February_NNP 1871_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO forward_VB the_DT annual_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT Patna_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN ending_VBG 31st_CD December_NNP 1870_CD ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP and_CC Government_NNP ._.
Population.56_NNP PATNA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
The_DT only_JJ remaining_VBG death_NN resulted_VBD from_IN suicide_NN under_IN the_DT following_JJ circumstances_NNS :_: PATNA_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
57_CD were_VBD raised_VBN 4_CD feet_NNS ,_, and_CC railing_VBG introduced_VBN between_IN the_DT outside_JJ pillars_NNS ,_, to_TO prevent_VB the_DT men_NNS at_IN work_NN being_VBG interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN lunatics_NNS outside_JJ ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ repairs_NNS were_VBD executed_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT profits_NNS of_IN manufacture_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
200_CD ._.
The_DT dismantling_NN of_IN the_DT roof_NN was_VBD rendered_VBN necessary_JJ by_IN the_DT great_JJ leakage_NN during_IN the_DT rains_NNS ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT low_JJ pitch_NN of_IN the_DT roof_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB because_IN the_DT walls_NNS were_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB cracking_VBG ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ intention_NN during_IN the_DT present_JJ season_NN to_TO erect_VB a_DT new_JJ shed_VBN for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN castor_NN oil_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN sale_NN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN there_EX are_VBP sufficient_JJ bricks_NNS ready_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
I_PRP also_RB propose_VBP erecting_VBG two_CD English_JJ looms_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN table_JJ covers_NNS ,_, as_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT patients_NNS have_VBP become_VBN skilled_VBN in_IN the_DT art_NN of_IN weaving_NN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS are_VBP employed_VBN in_IN weaving_VBG cloth_NN ,_, tape_NN ,_, table-covers_NNS ,_, blankets_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN spinning_VBG putooa_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP lately_RB turned_VBN out_RP some_DT excellent_JJ work_NN ._.
The_DT ordinary_JJ lunatics_NNS make_VBP mustard_JJ oil_NN ,_, bricks_NNS ,_, soorkey_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP also_RB employed_VBN in_IN gardening_NN ,_, road-making_NN ,_, tailoring_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN At_IN the_DT north-east_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT compound_NN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT tank_NN which_WDT was_VBD dug_NN during_IN the_DT famine_NN of_IN 1869_CD by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT commissioner_NN at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
837-9-9_JJ ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO give_VB employment_NN to_TO the_DT poor_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT warm_JJ weather_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, last_JJ year_NN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN to_TO dry_VB up_RP ,_, and_CC was_VBD a_DT great_JJ nuisance_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD constantly_RB resorted_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT patients_NNS as_IN a_DT privy_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Nowlan_NNP ,_, the_DT new_JJ overseer_NN ,_, on_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, set_VBN about_IN remedying_VBG this_DT at_IN once_RB by_IN deepening_VBG and_CC enlarging_VBG this_DT tank_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO ensure_VB a_DT constant_JJ supply_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT excavated_JJ earth_NN was_VBD used_VBN to_TO raise_VB the_DT general_JJ level_NN of_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.
The_DT females_NNS are_VBP generally_RB employed_VBN in_IN making_VBG atta_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, in_IN spinning_VBG cotton_NN and_CC wool_NN for_IN manufactures_NNS ;_: they_PRP also_RB pound_NN soorkey_NN and_CC prepare_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT vegetables_NNS for_IN cooking_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP Mrs._NNP Nowlan_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN matron_NN on_IN Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD a_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN my_PRP$ taking_VBG charge_NN I_PRP received_VBD from_IN my_PRP$ predecessor_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Duka_NNP ,_, a_DT most_RBS satisfactory_JJ account_NN both_DT of_IN her_PRP$ and_CC her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Nowlan_NNP ,_, the_DT overseer_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD some_DT time_NN in_IN Dullunda_NNP asylum_NN for_IN instruction_NN in_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB at_IN Cuttack_NNP ,_, previous_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ being_VBG sent_VBN here_RB ._.

1_CD ._.
FROM_IN W._NNP D._NNP STEWART_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP ,_, Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, Cuttack_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_VB DEPUTY_NNP INSPECTOR-GENERAL_NNP OF_NNP HOSPITALS_NNP ,_, PRESIDENCY_NNP CIRCLE_NNP ,_, CALCUTTA_NNP ._.
Cuttack_NN ,_, the_DT 25th_CD January_NNP 1871_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO forward_VB herewith_PDT the_DT annual_JJ returns_NNS of_IN the_DT Cuttack_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1870_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN there_EX were_VBD 20_CD admissions_NNS and_CC 2_CD re-admissions_NNS ,_, 46_CD remained_VBD at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT total_JJ under_IN treatment_NN was_VBD 68_CD ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 17_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN ,_, 5_CD improved_VBN and_CC made_VBN over_IN to_TO friends_NNS ,_, 9_CD transferred_VBN at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN to_TO Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, 2_CD died_VBD and_CC 35_CD remain_NN under_IN treatment_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT two_CD deaths_NNS ,_, the_DT first_JJ was_VBD from_IN diarrhCUTTACK_JJ ASYLUM_NNP ._.
65_CD 7_CD ._.
The_DT situation_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ unfortunate_JJ ,_, being_VBG in_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN insufficient_JJ enclosure_NN for_IN the_DT recreation_NN and_CC diversion_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
The_DT wards_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, are_VBP very_RB well_RB built_VBN ,_, and_CC provide_VB sufficient_JJ and_CC good_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN eight_CD lunatics_NNS were_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO Dullunda_NNP ._.
This_DT has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT means_NNS of_IN preventing_VBG overcrowding_VBG ;_: the_DT transfer_NN was_VBD occasioned_VBN also_RB by_IN the_DT want_NN of_IN separate_JJ room_NN for_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ insanes_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT rule_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ to_TO let_VB each_DT man_NN move_VBP about_IN the_DT grounds_NNS as_RB freely_RB as_IN possible_JJ ;_: encouragement_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO employment_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT force_NN whatever_WDT is_VBZ used_VBN ._.
The_DT chief_JJ amusement_NN of_IN the_DT weak_JJ and_CC recovering_VBG is_VBZ to_TO move_VB about_IN the_DT garden_NN grounds_NNS ,_, weeding_VBG or_CC watering_VBG it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT noisy_NN and_CC turbulent_NN from_IN harassing_VBG those_DT who_WP are_VBP better_RB disposed_VBN ;_: hence_NN ,_, for_IN want_NN of_IN special_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN this_DT class_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN transferred_VBN to_TO Dullunda_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT chief_JJ occupation_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS disposed_VBD and_CC able_JJ to_TO work_VB is_VBZ weaving_VBG ,_, spinning_VBG twine_NN and_CC thread_NN ,_, tailoring_VBG ,_, cooking_VBG and_CC occasional_JJ soorkee_NN pounding_NN ._.
The_DT actual_JJ sale_NN proceeds_NNS of_IN manufactured_JJ goods_NNS are_VBP Rs_NNP ._.
220-6-1_JJ ;_: the_DT estimated_VBN cost_NN of_IN labor_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN is_VBZ Rs_NNP ._.
593-15-3_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ calculated_VBN by_IN fixing_VBG a_DT rate_NN on_IN the_DT kind_NN of_IN work_NN engaged_VBN in_IN ;_: but_CC as_IN task_NN work_NN is_VBZ never_RB exacted_VBN ,_, the_DT outturn_NN is_VBZ very_RB much_RB less_JJR to_TO what_WP would_MD be_VB the_DT case_NN if_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS were_VBD pressed_VBN to_TO work_VB ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ annual_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT patient_NN for_IN establishment_NN is_VBZ Rs_NNP ._.
83-6-0_JJ ;_: for_IN diets_NNS ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
26-14-2_JJ ;_: bazar_NN medicines_NNS ,_, As_IN ._.
3-6_JJ ;_: contingencies_NNS ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
3-6-10_JJ ;_: clothing_NN ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
2-9-2_JJ ;_: making_VBG the_DT total_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT ,_, excluding_VBG income_NN and_CC estimated_JJ profit_NN of_IN labor_NN ,_, Rs_NNP ._.
116-8-0_JJ ._.
This_DT large_JJ amount_NN is_VBZ mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO establishment_VB ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB nearly_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN required_VBN for_IN a_DT large_JJ asylum_NN ,_, where_WRB among_IN a_DT larger_JJR number_NN of_IN patients_NNS the_DT average_JJ cost_NN appears_VBZ much_RB less_JJR ._.
The_DT average_JJ expense_NN of_IN diet_NN of_IN each_DT inmate_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN is_VBZ less_JJR by_IN Rs_NNP ._.
4-10-4_JJ to_TO what_WP it_PRP was_VBD in_IN 1869_CD ._.
11_CD ._.
Cleanliness_NN and_CC perfect_JJ conservancy_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN are_VBP strictly_RB maintained_VBN ._.
Dry_NNP earth_NN conservancy_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC disinfectants_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN sulphate_NN of_IN iron_NN and_CC burning_NN sulphur_NN ,_, used_VBN in_IN cells_NNS which_WDT become_VBP soiled_VBN by_IN weakly_JJ patients_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT asylum_NN was_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP on_IN the_DT 10th_JJ September_NNP ,_, and_CC again_RB on_IN the_DT 15th_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT former_JJ date_NN the_DT commission_NN appointed_VBD to_TO inquire_VB into_IN the_DT advisability_NN of_IN releasing_VBG two_CD criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS was_VBD convened_VBN ._.
These_DT men_NNS ,_, Soobur_NNP Naik_NNP and_CC Uchub_NNP Naik_NNP ,_, were_VBD in_IN the_DT asylum_NN for_IN six_CD and_CC three_CD years_NNS respectively_RB ,_, and_CC were_VBD charged_VBN with_IN committing_VBG murder_NN and_CC causing_VBG grievous_JJ hurt_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD acquitted_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN of_IN insanity_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT inquiry_NN it_PRP was_VBD elicited_VBN that_IN both_DT these_DT men_NNS indulged_VBD in_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN gunja_NN previous_JJ to_TO committing_VBG the_DT offence_NN ,_, a_DT habit_NN which_WDT doubtless_NN had_VBD some_DT connection_NN with_IN the_DT origin_NN and_CC development_NN of_IN their_PRP$ mental_JJ aberration_NN ._.
Both_DT men_NNS were_VBD pronounced_VBN as_IN being_VBG perfectly_RB sane_VBN and_CC fit_JJ for_IN discharge_NN ;_: the_DT proviso_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD added_VBN ,_, that_DT except_IN they_PRP refrained_VBD from_IN indulgence_NN in_IN gunja_NN or_CC other_JJ intoxicating_JJ agent_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD liable_JJ to_TO a_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT dangerous_JJ excitement_NN which_WDT led_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ admission_NN into_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD discharged_VBN from_IN the_DT asylum_NN on_IN the_DT 18th_CD October_NNP ,_, and_CC made_VBD over_IN to_TO the_DT care_NN of_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, Tributary_NNP Mehals_NNP ._.
