1_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ perceives_NNS that_IN the_DT statements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN differently_RB arranged_VBN from_IN the_DT last_JJ report_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN some_DT new_JJ tables_NNS have_VBP been_VBN added_VBN ,_, rendering_VBG the_DT whole_NN more_RBR comprehensive_JJ ._.
His_PRP$ Honor_NNP quite_RB agrees_VBZ with_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT necessity_NN for_IN uniformity_NN of_IN plan_NN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT several_JJ institutions_NNS and_CC in_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT general_JJ report_NN ,_, and_CC hopes_VBZ to_TO see_VB an_DT improvement_NN in_IN this_DT respect_NN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT forms_NNS which_WDT the_DT Inspector-General_JJ proposes_NNS to_TO adopt_VB ,_, unnecessary_JJ diffuseness_NN and_CC repetition_NN of_IN details_NNS being_VBG avoided_VBD as_RB much_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
The_DT nominal_JJ lists_NNS and_CC particulars_NNS of_IN individual_JJ cases_NNS ,_, which_WDT of_IN course_NN must_MD be_VB carefully_RB recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT departmental_JJ registers_NNS ,_, need_VBP not_RB appear_VB in_IN the_DT printed_JJ report_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN insanes_NNS remaining_VBG in_IN the_DT five_CD native_JJ asylums_NNS on_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN January_NNP 1870_CD was_VBD 746_CD ,_, and_CC 401_CD were_VBD admitted_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, making_VBG a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 1,147_CD persons_NNS treated_VBN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT preceding_VBG five_CD years_NNS by_IN 119_CD ,_, but_CC only_RB 41_CD more_JJR than_IN the_DT total_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT actual_JJ admissions_NNS were_VBD less_JJR by_IN 17_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT re-admissions_NNS again_RB were_VBD more_RBR numerous_JJ (_( 2_CD )_) 6_CD ._.
The_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN on_IN the_DT whole_JJ better_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD fewer_JJR deaths_NNS (_( 10_CD only_RB )_) from_IN cholera_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN bore_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN 9.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
to_TO the_DT total_JJ number_NN ,_, showing_VBG a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 1.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
below_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ five_CD years_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT very_RB favorable_JJ result_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN the_DT other_JJ provinces_NNS in_IN the_DT statement_NN given_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 9_CD of_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, Nagpore_NNP only_RB excepted_VBD ._.
7_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ scarcely_RB any_DT variation_NN to_TO notice_VB in_IN the_DT classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS admitted_VBN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 74.06_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD Hindoos_NNP ,_, 24.18_CD Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, and_CC 1.74_CD Christians_NNPS ._.
The_DT proportion_NN of_IN females_NNS admitted_VBN was_VBD greater_JJR by_IN 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT admissions_NNS being_VBG 306_CD males_NNS to_TO 95_CD females_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT various_JJ types_NNS of_IN insanity_NN ,_, 773_CD were_VBD cases_NNS of_IN mania_NN ,_, 285_CD of_IN dementia_NN ,_, and_CC 89_CD were_VBD minor_JJ forms_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, 36_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
are_VBP classified_VBN as_IN acute_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG majority_NN as_IN chronic_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN cures_NNS ,_, amounting_VBG to_TO 35.2_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT latter_JJ class_NN ,_, is_VBZ ,_, as_IN pointed_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Inspector-General_NNP ,_, a_DT satisfactory_JJ proof_NN of_IN successful_JJ management_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, a_DT very_RB large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT causes_NNS are_VBP known_VBN proceed_NN from_IN intoxicating_VBG agents_NNS ,_, and_CC especially_RB from_IN the_DT deleterious_JJ effects_NNS of_IN ganjah_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 316_CD instances_NNS out_IN of_IN 466_CD cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN recorded_VBN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS ,_, the_DT inquiry_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD ordered_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, has_VBZ resulted_VBN in_IN 12_CD out_IN of_IN 80_CD known_JJ cases_NNS being_VBG attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN ganjah_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT aggregate_JJ expenditure_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO statement_NN No_NNP ._.
10_CD ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
71,965-3-7_JJ ,_, each_DT inmate_NN costing_VBG on_IN an_DT average_JJ Rs_NNP ._.
92-15-4_CD ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ slightly_RB in_IN excess_NN of_IN the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ amount_NN estimated_VBD as_IN profits_NNS from_IN manufactures_NNS and_CC value_NN of_IN labour_NN is_VBZ Rs_NNP ._.
34,686-7-7_JJ ,_, the_DT average_JJ earning_NN of_IN each_DT lunatic_JJ employed_NN being_VBG computed_VBN at_IN Rs_NNP ._.
52-6-6_JJ ;_: but_CC as_IN these_DT earnings_NNS form_VBP a_DT separate_JJ fund_NN at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP understands_VBZ ,_, contribute_NN to_TO the_DT reduction_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ expenses_NNS they_PRP should_MD not_RB appear_VB in_IN this_DT return_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT form_NN should_MD be_VB altered_VBN by_IN the_DT omission_NN of_IN columns_NN 4_CD ,_, 5_CD ,_, and_CC 8_CD ,_, which_WDT are_VBP at_IN present_JJ only_RB calculated_VBD to_TO mislead_VB ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP would_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO know_VB if_IN any_DT portion_NN of_IN these_DT funds_NNS are_VBP credited_VBN to_TO general_JJ revenues_NNS or_CC are_VBP in_IN any_DT way_NN expended_VBN on_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ._.
Apparently_RB the_DT only_JJ amounts_NNS which_WDT should_MD be_VB deducted_VBN ,_, and_CC which_WDT are_VBP now_RB omitted_VBN ,_, are_VBP the_DT payments_NNS made_VBN by_IN friends_NNS for_IN the_DT maintenance_NN of_IN patients_NNS ._.
These_DT should_MD be_VB credited_VBN to_TO the_DT general_JJ account_NN and_CC be_VB remitted_VBN in_IN full_JJ to_TO the_DT treasury_NN ,_, as_IN directed_VBN in_IN the_DT resolution_NN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT sum_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,349-5-3_JJ realized_VBN from_IN the_DT friends_NNS of_IN patients_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT Rs_NNP ._.
973-9-3_CD only_RB was_VBD paid_VBN into_IN the_DT treasury_NN ,_, is_VBZ considerably_RB less_JJR than_IN the_DT amount_NN recovered_VBD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN also_RB that_IN such_JJ payments_NNS were_VBD realized_VBN solely_RB at_IN the_DT Dullunda_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT excep-_JJ tion_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
20_CD only_RB at_IN Patna_NNP ._.
A_DT report_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN how_WRB they_PRP are_VBP regulated_VBN ,_, and_CC whether_IN some_DT uniform_JJ system_NN of_IN contribution_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB adopted_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT asylums_NNS ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT parties_NNS ._.
12_CD ._.
Dullunda_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) reference_NN to_TO the_DT remarks_NNS on_IN this_DT subject_NN in_IN the_DT 2nd_CD paragraph_NN of_IN Dr._NNP Payne_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT law_NN requires_VBZ a_DT specific_JJ certificate_NN from_IN the_DT visitors_NNS that_IN in_IN their_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT lunatic_JJ can_MD be_VB discharged_VBN without_IN danger_NN of_IN injury_NN to_TO himself_PRP or_CC others_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN when_WRB this_DT certificate_NN is_VBZ given_VBN the_DT Government_NNP discharges_VBZ him_PRP ._.
But_CC visitors_NNS are_VBP naturally_RB reluctant_JJ to_TO give_VB this_DT certificate_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS increase_NN in_IN number_NN ._.
This_DT may_MD render_VB the_DT management_NN of_IN an_DT asylum_NN more_RBR difficult_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT less_RBR evil_JJ than_IN discharging_VBG persons_NNS whose_WP$ homicidal_JJ mania_NN may_MD at_IN any_DT time_NN recur_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT progressive_JJ improvement_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN rates_NNS since_IN 1856_CD is_VBZ highly_RB creditable_JJ to_TO the_DT management_NN of_IN this_DT institution_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN cures_NNS and_CC transfers_NNS is_VBZ also_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ well_RB assured_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT efforts_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP to_TO improve_VB the_DT asylum_NN industry_NN ,_, the_DT essential_JJ object_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT cure_NN of_IN those_DT committed_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ Charge_NN ,_, will_MD not_RB cease_VB to_TO be_VB carefully_RB regarded_VBN ._.
14_CD ._.
It_PRP would_MD appear_VB that_IN here_RB ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT other_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, no_DT system_NN of_IN check_NN prevails_VBZ over_IN the_DT account_NN of_IN the_DT receipts_NNS and_CC expenditure_NN of_IN the_DT Industrial_NNP Funds_NNP ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ considers_NNS also_RB that_DT credit_NN is_VBZ wrongly_RB taken_VBN ,_, as_IN profit_NN ,_, for_IN articles_NNS in_IN store_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN nothing_NN but_CC actual_JJ cash_NN received_VBN by_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN manufactures_NNS and_CC produce_VB should_MD be_VB expended_VBN under_IN this_DT head_NN ._.
These_DT accounts_NNS should_MD be_VB regularly_RB submitted_VBN for_IN audit_NN to_TO the_DT Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitails_NNP ._.

of_IN the_DT number_NN treated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT mortality_NN had_VBD diminished_VBN to_TO 2.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

FROM_NNP J._NNP CAMPBELL_NNP BROWN_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, C.B._NNP ,_, Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Hospitals_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_DT OFFG_NNP ._.
SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 27th_CD June_NNP 1872_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT reports_NNS and_CC returns_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1871_CD ._.
Revision_NN of_IN forms_NNS of_IN returns_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN accordance_NN with_IN several_JJ suggestions_NNS which_WDT I_PRP found_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO make_VB in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ report_NN ,_, regarding_VBG the_DT improvement_NN of_IN the_DT forms_NNS of_IN statistical_JJ returns_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, I_PRP caused_VBD the_DT forms_NNS hitherto_VBP in_IN use_NN to_TO be_VB very_RB carefully_RB revised_VBN ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO rendering_VBG them_PRP more_RBR complete_JJ and_CC comprehensive_JJ ._.
After_IN consulting_VBG Drs_NNP ._.
Payne_NNP and_CC Wise_NNP as_IN to_TO their_PRP$ fitness_NN ,_, the_DT revised_VBN forms_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN for_IN future_JJ adoption_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT circular_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PRP place_VBP as_IN an_DT appendix_NN to_TO this_DT report_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN 1871_CD have_VBP been_VBN drawn_VBN up_RP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN this_DT scheme_NN ._.
The_DT preparation_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN these_DT forms_NNS has_VBZ caused_VBN a_DT little_JJ trouble_NN and_CC led_VBD to_TO some_DT delay_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP will_MD be_VB better_JJR under-_JJ stood_NN in_IN future_JJ and_CC prepared_VBD more_JJR easily_RB and_CC promptly_RB ._.
The_DT same_JJ scheme_NN of_IN returns_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT other_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN this_DT presidency_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ now_RB under_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO its_PRP$ adoption_NN in_IN all_PDT the_DT lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
These_DT forms_NNS meet_VBP all_PDT the_DT imperfections_NNS and_CC omissions_NNS which_WDT I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP in_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN ;_: they_PRP certainly_RB appear_VBP to_TO be_VB numerous_JJ and_CC elaborate_JJ ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS desirable_JJ to_TO register_VB fully_RB and_CC accurately_RB all_PDT the_DT circumstances_NNS connected_VBN with_IN so_RB very_RB important_JJ and_CC interesting_VBG a_DT subject_NN as_IN lunacy_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT difficulty_NN and_CC labour_NN involved_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ preparation_NN is_VBZ due_RB more_RBR to_TO the_DT calculations_NNS necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN comparing_VBG one_CD institution_NN with_IN another_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN with_IN its_PRP$ predecessors_NNS ,_, than_IN to_TO any_DT complexity_NN in_IN the_DT facts_NNS which_WDT are_VBP noted_VBN in_IN each_DT table_NN ._.
The_DT written_VBN reports_NNS of_IN Superintendents_NNS show_VBP that_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN ,_, and_CC comment_NN upon_NN ,_, these_DT tables_NNS cause_VBP them_PRP to_TO institute_VB a_DT most_RBS searching_JJ study_NN of_IN the_DT events_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sequel_NN of_IN this_DT report_NN will_MD demonstrate_VB that_IN under_IN the_DT system_NN now_RB initiated_VBN data_NN of_IN great_JJ interest_NN will_MD be_VB systematically_RB noted_VBN ._.
In_IN accord-_JJ ance_NN with_IN the_DT alterations_NNS in_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN each_DT institution_NN ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO alter_VB the_DT general_JJ statements_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN employed_VBN to_TO illustrate_VB this_DT general_JJ report_NN ._.
These_DT changes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN as_RB slight_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT general_JJ tables_NNS of_IN this_DT year_NN will_MD bear_VB a_DT comparison_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN previous_JJ reports_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ order_NN and_CC form_NN being_VBG preserved_VBN as_RB nearly_RB as_IN possible_JJ the_DT same_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB considered_VBN it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO append_VB to_TO the_DT report_NN of_IN each_DT asylum_NN the_DT whole_JJ series_NN of_IN forms_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT circular_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP omitted_VBN those_DT whose_WP$ contents_NNS are_VBP exhibited_VBN in_IN the_DT summary_JJ tables_NNS illustrating_VBG this_DT report_NN ,_, supplying_VBG a_DT reference_NN to_TO these_DT ,_, and_CC giving_VBG in_IN extenso_NN those_DT only_JJ whose_WP$ facts_NNS are_VBP not_RB exhibited_VBN in_IN the_DT general_JJ report_NN ._.

In_IN Statement_NNP No_NNP ._.
3_CD the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS are_VBP given_VBN for_IN each_DT asylum_NN and_CC a_DT summary_NN of_IN the_DT whole_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT corresponding_NN table_NN for_IN 1870_CD the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS 1865LUNATIC_CD ASYLUMS_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP ._.
5_CD would_MD therefore_RB be_VB lost_VBN ,_, and_CC matters_NNS would_MD remain_VB very_RB much_JJ where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD ._.
The_DT subject_NN was_VBD under_IN discussion_NN at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Payne_NNP has_VBZ again_RB represented_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN for_IN 1871_CD the_DT difficulties_NNS connected_VBN with_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS ,_, and_CC similar_JJ difficulties_NNS have_VBP been_VBN experienced_VBN in_IN the_DT other_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, which_WDT moreover_RB are_VBP becoming_VBG overcrowded_VBN from_IN the_DT accumulation_NN of_IN criminal_JJ insanes_NNS ._.

13_CD Inferences_NNS from_IN the_DT statement_NN ;_: As_IN regards_NNS popu-_JJ lation_NN ;_: From_IN this_DT it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN ,_, comparing_VBG periods_NNS of_IN one_CD month_NN ,_, the_DT numbers_NNS living_VBG decrease_NN regularly_RB ;_: comparing_VBG quarterly_JJ periods_NNS ,_, the_DT same_JJ circumstance_NN is_VBZ observable_JJ ._.
In_IN annual_JJ periods_NNS a_DT similar_JJ reduction_NN of_IN strength_NN among_IN older_JJR residents_NNS is_VBZ obvious_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT becomes_VBZ still_RB more_RBR apparent_JJ as_IN longer_JJR periods_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN ._.
The_DT asylums_NNS are_VBP thus_RB ever_RB being_VBG emptied_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT large_JJ majority_NN of_IN their_PRP$ residents_NNS are_VBP comparatively_RB short-term_JJ residents_NNS ._.
The_DT Dacca_NNP asylum_NN shows_VBZ a_DT larger_JJR proportional_JJ number_NN of_IN long-term_JJ residents_NNS than_IN the_DT two_CD others_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT comparatively_RB smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN short-term_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ quite_RB in_IN keeping_VBG with_IN the_DT smaller_JJR admission_NN rates_NNS of_IN 1870_CD and_CC 1871_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT longer_JJR average_JJ term_NN of_IN residence_NN of_IN each_DT lunatic_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS events_NNS ._.

1868_CD DACCA_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
39_CD Rupture_NN of_IN the_DT spleen_NN ._.
Causation_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Aziz_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 32_CD ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN on_IN the_DT 28th_CD March_NNP with_IN acute_JJ mania_NN of_IN seven_CD months_NNS '_POS duration_NN ._.
His_PRP$ health_NN was_VBD bad_JJ ._.
He_PRP was_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN fever_NN and_CC enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT spleen_NN ._.
At_IN 2_CD A.M._NNP on_IN the_DT morning_NN of_IN the_DT 10th_JJ April_NNP he_PRP was_VBD heard_VBN by_IN the_DT keeper_NN moaning_NN ._.
The_DT Native_NNP Doctor_NNP was_VBD summoned_VBN and_CC stimulants_NNS were_VBD given_VBN ._.
He_PRP died_VBD at_IN 5_CD A.M._NNP After_IN death_NN a_DT ruptured_JJ spleen_NN ,_, weighing_VBG even_RB then_RB 2lb_CD 3_CD oz_NN ._.
was_VBD found_VBN ._.
Along_IN the_DT internal_JJ or_CC concave_JJ surface_NN ,_, a_DT tear_NN of_IN great_JJ length_NN dividing_VBG several_JJ blood_NN vessels_NNS was_VBD traced_VBN ._.
As_IN death_NN was_VBD clearly_RB owing_VBG to_TO this_DT rupture_NN ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP was_VBD communicated_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Rampini_NNP immediately_RB attended_VBD and_CC took_VBD the_DT evidence_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT keepers_NNS who_WP were_VBD on_IN guard_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ._.
His_PRP$ deci-_JJ sion_NN was_VBD as_IN follows,40_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP this_DT year_NN ._.
Both_DT were_VBD inspired_VBN to_TO proclaim_VB a_DT new_JJ religion_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD to_TO embrace_VB all_DT races_NNS and_CC creeds_NNS in_IN one_CD social_JJ brotherhood_NN ,_, while_IN it_PRP left_VBD each_DT individual_NN to_TO worship_VB God_NNP according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ conscience_NN ._.
One_CD was_VBD an_DT inmate_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
On_IN finding_VBG Hindoos_NNP ,_, Mahomedans_NNP ,_, and_CC Christians_NNPS eating_VBG the_DT same_JJ food_NN on_IN the_DT same_JJ spot_NN ,_, he_PRP confessed_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN anticipated_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT further_JJ need_NN for_IN him_PRP to_TO enlighten_VB the_DT world_NN ._.
Acute_NNP dementia_NN ._.
Acute_NNP dementia_NN is_VBZ exceedingly_RB rare_JJ among_IN natives_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT records_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN are_VBP the_DT cases_NNS of_IN two_CD boys_NNS who_WP became_VBD suddenly_RB affected_VBN with_IN dementia_NN from_IN fear_NN ;_: one_CD in_IN 1857_CD ,_, who_WP was_VBD so_RB terrified_VBN at_IN the_DT sound_NN of_IN the_DT guns_NNS the_DT day_NN the_DT sepoys_NN mutinied_VBD at_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, that_IN he_PRP became_VBD incurably_RB insane_NN ._.
The_DT second_NN was_VBD aged_VBN about_IN 10_CD ;_: he_PRP fancied_VBD he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT bhoot_NN or_CC goblin_VB one_CD night_NN and_CC immediately_RB became_VBD insane_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN returned_VBN under_IN this_DT head_NN was_VBD a_DT domestic_JJ who_WP had_VBD smoked_VBN ganjah_NN to_TO such_JJ excess_JJ that_IN reason_NN disappeared_VBD and_CC left_VBD him_PRP a_DT mere_JJ animal_NN in_IN his_PRP$ habits_NNS ._.

Idiotcy_NNP ._.
Paralysis_NN of_IN the_DT insane_NN is_VBZ also_RB very_RB rare_JJ ._.
This_DT ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS frequent_JJ causes_NNS of_IN death_NN in_IN European_JJ asylums_NNS ,_, adds_VBZ little_JJ to_TO the_DT mortality_NN of_IN Indian_JJ lunatics_NNS ._.

Ganjah_NNP smoking_NN ._.

Opium_NN smoking_NN ;_: a_DT Mahomedan_NNP vice_NN ._.

THE_DT admissions_NNS ,_, 65_CD in_IN number_NN against_IN 53_CD in_IN 1870_CD ,_, show_VBP a_DT small_JJ increase_NN ,_, which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB only_RB in_IN course_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ fluctuation_NN ._.
The_DT military_JJ admissions_NNS numbered_VBD 31_CD against_IN 32_CD in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ clear_JJ that_IN the_DT proposed_VBN method_NN of_IN despatching_VBG soldiers_NNS to_TO the_DT Upper_NNP Provinces_NNPS direct_VBP to_TO Bombay_NNP with_IN other_JJ invalids_NNS has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB been_VBN adopted_VBN ._.

READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) many_JJ cases_NNS recurrent_VBP insanity_NN only_RB indicates_VBZ repeated_JJ intoxication_NN ;_: and_CC Dr_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.
The_DT Hindoos_NNP ,_, as_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, give_VB by_IN far_RB the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS (_( 3_CD )_) are_VBP altogether_RB wanting_VBG ._.
In_IN England_NNP almost_RB all_DT lunatics_NNS are_VBP under_IN treatment_NN ._.
In_IN Bengal_NNP there_EX seems_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT great_JJ majority_NN never_RB reach_VBP the_DT asylums_NNS ._.
Then_RB ,_, again_RB ,_, nothing_NN is_VBZ known_VBN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ history_NN of_IN most_JJS cases_NNS in_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT cases_NNS sent_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT police_NN are_VBP generally_RB those_DT found_VBN wandering_VBG about_IN homeless_NN ,_, whose_WP$ insanity_NN is_VBZ chronic_JJ ._.
We_PRP might_MD ,_, indeed_RB ,_, fairly_RB expect_VB a_DT far_RB heavier_JJR mortality_NN in_IN our_PRP$ Indian_JJ asylums_NNS than_IN we_PRP now_RB have_VBP ._.
The_DT rate_NN was_VBD slightly_RB higher_JJR among_IN males_NNS than_IN among_IN females_NNS ._.
One-half_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ deaths_NNS were_VBD among_IN patients_NNS of_IN less_JJR than_IN a_DT year_NN 's_POS residence_NN ._.
The_DT Inspector-General_NNP has_VBZ analysed_VBN very_RB carefully_RB the_DT events_NNS of_IN 1871_CD in_IN relation_NN to_TO length_NN of_IN residence_NN ,_, the_DT general_JJ inferences_NNS being_VBG that_IN the_DT large_JJ majority_NN are_VBP comparatively_RB short-term_JJ residents_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN both_DT recoveries_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS are_VBP more_RBR numerous_JJ in_IN the_DT earlier_JJR periods_NNS of_IN residence_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN is_VBZ very_RB unequally_RB distributed_VBN ,_, being_VBG much_JJ greater_JJR at_IN Dacca_NNP than_IN elsewhere_RB ._.
12_CD ._.

3_CD Comparison_NNP of_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN 1872_CD with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT five_CD preceding_NN years_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT combined_JJ statistics_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT native_JJ asylums_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN are_VBP shown_VBN in_IN Statement_NNP No_NNP ._.
2_CD for_IN the_DT year_NN 1872_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT relation_NN of_IN the_DT leading_VBG events_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN to_TO the_DT population_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT cases_NNS to_TO the_DT number_NN admitted_VBN and_CC treated_VBN ._.
Similar_JJ figures_NNS for_IN the_DT five_CD preceding_NN years_NNS are_VBP adduced_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT mean_NN of_IN these_DT has_VBZ been_VBN prepared_VBN with_IN which_WDT the_DT num-_JJ bers_NNS for_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN have_VBP been_VBN compared_VBN ,_, the_DT increase_NN or_CC decrease_NN being_VBG exhibited_VBN in_IN separate_JJ columns_NNS ._.
Each_DT of_IN the_DT heads_NNS of_IN this_DT statement_NN will_MD be_VB considered_VBN and_CC analysed_VBN in_IN the_DT sequel_NN ._.
The_DT various_JJ ratios_NNS shown_VBN bear_VBP an_DT instructive_JJ comparison_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN individual_JJ institutions_NNS ._.
The_DT general_JJ inference_NN from_IN this_DT table_NN is_VBZ ,_, that_WDT while_IN the_DT population_NN of_IN asylums_NNS is_VBZ growing_VBG ,_, and_CC admissions_NNS are_VBP increasing_VBG in_IN number_NN ,_, the_DT discharges_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS bear_IN a_DT decreased_JJ ratio_NN to_TO the_DT number_NN of_IN residents_NNS ._.

3_CD ._.

9_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

11_CD ._.

Debauchery_NNP ._.

Dengue_NNP ._.
The_DT first_JJ point_NN of_IN note_NN is_VBZ the_DT appearance_NN of_IN dengue_NN fever_NN among_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ as_RB infectious_JJ as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB represented_VBN to_TO be_VB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ strange_JJ that_IN only_RB 37_CD of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS were_VBD attacked_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN no_DT instance_NN did_VBD the_DT fever_NN spread_NN to_TO patients_NNS lying_VBG in_IN adjoining_VBG beds_NNS ._.
Although_IN dengue_NN fever_NN was_VBD followed_VBN in_IN several_JJ instances_NNS by_IN insanity_NN ,_, sometimes_RB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN acute_NN mania_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT outside_JJ population_NN ,_, yet_CC it_PRP did_VBD not_RB appear_VB to_TO aggravate_VB the_DT mental_JJ disease_NN of_IN the_DT lunatic_JJ patients_NNS ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD always_RB mild_VBN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC delirium_NN was_VBD rare_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT fever_NN the_DT patients_NNS lay_VBP in_IN a_DT torpid_JJ state_NN ,_, unconscious_JJ of_IN the_DT racking_NN pains_NNS ,_, and_CC heedless_NN of_IN everything_NN around_IN them_PRP ._.
Only_RB four_CD cases_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN June_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD as_IN its_PRP$ height_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN ;_: thirteen_CC in_IN July_NNP ,_, none_NN in_IN August_NNP ,_, three_CD in_IN September_NNP ,_, fifteen_NN in_IN October_NNP ,_, and_CC two_CD in_IN Novem-_JJ ber_NN ._.

44_CD ._.
Pneumonia_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS common_JJ and_CC fatal_JJ diseases_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum_NN this_DT year_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ always_RB a_DT complication_NN to_TO be_VB looked_VBN for_IN in_IN protracted_JJ fevers_NNS ,_, or_CC after_IN any_DT disease_NN causing_VBG poverty_NN and_CC deficiency_NN of_IN healthy_JJ blood_NN ._.

143_CD B_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN Officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP in_IN the_DT accounting_NN for_IN money_NN stock_NN ,_, &_CC c._VB A_DT cash-book_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB kept_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT all_DT receipts_NNS and_CC payments_NNS shall_MD be_VB recorded_VBN daily_RB ._.
At_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN each_DT day_NN ,_, the_DT totals_NNS of_IN the_DT sums_NNS received_VBD and_CC paid_VBD during_IN the_DT day_NN shall_MD be_VB carried_VBN to_TO the_DT grand_JJ total_JJ column_NN and_CC a_DT balance_NN struck_NN ;_: the_DT balance_NN to_TO be_VB checked_VBN and_CC initialed_VBN daily_RB by_IN the_DT superintendent_NN ._.
Receipts_NNS other_JJ than_IN those_DT received_VBN from_IN a_DT Government_NNP treasury_NN are_VBP not_RB available_JJ for_IN disbursement_NN ;_: they_PRP should_MD be_VB remitted_VBN in_IN tact_NN to_TO the_DT district_NN treasury_NN daily_RB ._.
The_DT present_JJ system_NN of_IN payment_NN of_IN private_JJ servants_NNS will_MD be_VB discontinued_VBN under_IN this_DT rule_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ cost_NN will_MD be_VB budgeted_VBN and_CC charged_VBN as_IN temporary_JJ establishments_NNS ;_: recoveries_NNS from_IN patients_NNS being_VBG credited_VBN under_IN asylum_NN receipts_NNS ._.
Payments_NNS must_MD be_VB made_VBN either_DT from_IN the_DT permanent_JJ advance_NN or_CC from_IN money_NN received_VBN from_IN the_DT treasury_NN on_IN abstracts_NNS or_CC bills_NNS ._.
Refunds_NNS to_TO relatives_NNS ,_, of_IN money_NN advanced_VBN for_IN paying-patients_NNS ,_, must_MD ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, be_VB charged_VBN in_IN bills_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN purchase_NN of_IN stock_NN ,_, the_DT quantity_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN value_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT note_NN made_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ column_NN of_IN the_DT cash-book_NN ,_, intimating_VBG that_IN the_DT purchase_NN has_VBZ been_VBN credited_VBN on_IN a_DT given_VBN date_NN in_IN the_DT stock_NN ledger_NN ._.
A_DT stock_NN ledger_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB kept_VBN of_IN each_DT article_NN in_IN stock_NN ._.
Every_DT receipt_NN of_IN stock_NN for_IN cash_NN paid_VBN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB checked_VBN by_IN the_DT debit_NN in_IN the_DT cash-book_NN ;_: all_DT other_JJ receipts_NNS to_TO be_VB carefully_RB examined_VBN ,_, and_CC both_DT to_TO be_VB initialed_VBN by_IN the_DT superintendent_JJ daily_NN ._.
Every_DT issue_NN for_IN cash_NN must_MD be_VB supported_VBN by_IN a_DT credit_NN in_IN the_DT cash-book_NN ,_, the_DT fact_NN of_IN credit_NN having_VBG been_VBN afforded_VBN ,_, being_VBG recorded_VBN in_IN a_DT column_NN opened_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN in_IN the_DT ledger_NN ._.
These_DT and_CC all_DT departmental_JJ issues_NNS must_MD be_VB initialed_VBN daily_RB by_IN the_DT superintendent_NN ._.
Each_DT ledger_NN must_MD be_VB balanced_VBN monthly_JJ under_IN the_DT signature_NN of_IN the_DT superintendent_NN ._.
Stock_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN at_IN least_JJS once_RB in_IN every_DT six_CD months_NNS ,_, but_CC on_IN varying_VBG dates_NNS ._.
A_DT note_NN of_IN date_NN of_IN stock_NN taking_NN to_TO be_VB always_RB entered_VBN in_IN the_DT ledger_NN for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT visitors_NNS and_CC Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP ;_: a_DT permanent_JJ advance_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
100_CD to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN ._.
Out_IN of_IN this_DT sum_NN all_DT petty_JJ contingent_NN charges_NNS should_MD be_VB paid_VBN ,_, the_DT amount_NN being_VBG recovered_VBN by_IN presentation_NN at_IN the_DT treasury_NN of_IN abstracts_NNS ,_, weekly_JJ or_CC fortnightly_RB ._.
The_DT superintendent_NN must_MD be_VB careful_JJ to_TO present_VB an_DT abstract_NN at_IN the_DT treasury_NN on_IN the_DT last_JJ open_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN all_DT payments_NNS out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ permanent_JJ advance_NN during_IN the_DT month_NN will_MD appear_VB in_IN the_DT abstract_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT detailed_JJ bills_NNS of_IN the_DT month_NN ._.
There_EX should_MD be_VB one_CD abstract_NN and_CC detailed_JJ bill_NN for_IN asylum_NN contingencies_NNS ,_, and_CC another_DT for_IN expenditure_NN connected_VBN with_IN manufactures_NNS ._.
The_DT detailed_JJ contingent_NN bills_NNS of_IN the_DT month_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB presented_VBN at_IN the_DT treasury_NN ,_, but_CC should_MD be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP for_IN countersignature_NN ._.
That_DT officer_NN will_MD examine_VB ,_, countersign_NN ,_, and_CC transmit_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT Accountant-General_NNP for_IN comparison_NN with_IN the_DT charges_NNS in_IN the_DT treasury_NN accounts_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN recovery_NN of_IN any_DT retrenchment_NN which_WDT the_DT Deputy_NNP Inspector-General_NNP may_MD have_VB noted_VBN in_IN the_DT bills_NNS ._.
The_DT superintendent_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN a_DT discretionary_JJ power_NN of_IN outlay_NN up_RB to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
200_CD for_IN any_DT one_CD article_NN ._.
This_DT restriction_NN does_VBZ not_RB apply_VB to_TO purchase_VB of_IN raw_JJ material_NN for_IN manufactures_NNS ,_, the_DT expenditure_NN on_IN which_WDT is_VBZ limited_VBN by_IN budget_NN grant_NN only_RB ._.

37_CD Caste_NN of_IN the_DT admissions_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT natives_NNS of_IN Dacca_NNP the_DT residents_NNS of_IN Sylhet_NNP are_VBP regarded_VBN as_IN very_RB penurious_JJ ,_, impul-_JJ sive_NN ,_, and_CC immoral_JJ ._.
Whether_IN this_DT be_VB a_DT correct_JJ delineation_NN or_CC not_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN the_DT higher_JJR Hindu_NNP castes_NNS of_IN Sylhet_NNP intermarry_VBP much_RB more_RBR frequently_RB than_IN they_PRP do_VBP in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
The_DT information_NN regarding_VBG the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN Sylhet_NNP is_VBZ as_RB yet_RB very_RB defective_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP must_MD await_VB further_RBR inquiry_NN before_IN arriving_VBG at_IN any_DT accurate_JJ conclusion_NN ._.
Only_RB ten_JJ lunatics_NNS came_VBD from_IN the_DT Assam_NNP province_NN ,_, or_CC five_CD less_JJR than_IN in_IN 1872_CD ._.
Sixty-seven_JJ Hindus_NNP were_VBD admitted_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Eighteen_NNP ,_, or_CC one_CD in_IN 3_CD ,_, were_VBD Kayasths_NNP ;_: while_IN in_IN 1872_CD they_PRP numbered_VBD one_CD in_IN four_CD ._.
Kayasths_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT curious_JJ fact_NN also_RB that_IN 12_CD out_IN of_IN 69_CD criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS treated_VBD belonged_VBN to_TO this_DT generally_RB prosperous_JJ class_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN 4_CD out_IN of_IN 19_CD criminal_JJ males_NNS admitted_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN were_VBD Kayasths_NNP ._.
I_PRP find_VBP also_RB that_IN of_IN 281_CD males_NNS sent_VBD to_TO the_DT Dacca_NNP Jail_NNP during_IN 1873_CD ,_, as_RB many_JJ as_IN 73_CD ,_, or_CC over_IN a_DT quarter_NN ,_, claimed_VBD to_TO belong_VB to_TO this_DT caste_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP considerable_JJ differences_NNS in_IN social_JJ position_NN among_IN the_DT Kayasths_NNP of_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.
Those_DT on_IN the_DT west_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Brahmaputra_NNP refuse_NN to_TO intermarry_VB with_IN those_DT on_IN the_DT east_NN ,_, the_DT former_JJ claiming_NN to_TO be_VB the_DT only_JJ pure_NN race_NN ._.
The_DT lower_JJR grades_NNS cultivate_VBP the_DT soil_NN ,_, and_CC work_NN as_IN coolies_NNS ,_, domestic_JJ servants_NNS ,_, and_CC shop-keepers_NNS ._.
Wealth_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, sweeps_VBZ away_RB all_DT differences_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN reality_NN the_DT caste_NN has_VBZ no_DT sub-division_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 18_CD Kayasths_NNP ,_, six_CD came_VBD from_IN Sylhet_NNP ,_, five_CD from_IN Dacca_NNP ,_, four_CD from_IN Fureedpore_NNP ,_, two_CD from_IN Tipperah_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD from_IN Mymensingh_NNP ._.
Brahmins_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, It_PRP is_VBZ remarkable_JJ ,_, too_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT four_CD castes_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP which_WDT furnish_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS number_NN of_IN educated_VBN Baboos_NNP and_CC enterprising_VBG traders_NNS ,_, namely_RB the_DT Brahmin_NNP ,_, Baidya_NNP ,_, Kayasth_NNP ,_, and_CC Shaha_NNP ,_, should_MD send_VB one-half_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ Hindu_NNP lunatics_NNS to_TO the_DT asylum_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP certainly_RB less_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ or_CC fisher_JJ castes_NNS ._.
Chandals_NNS ._.
Eight_CD out_IN of_IN sixty-seven_JJ belonged_VBN to_TO the_DT Chandal_NNP caste_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT principal_JJ Hindu_NNP agricultural_JJ caste_NN in_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.
Mahomedans_NNS ._.
There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT slight_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN Mahomedan_NNP men_NNS admitted_VBD ,_, but_CC the_DT proportion_NN of_IN Mahomedan_NNP females_NNS has_VBZ risen_VBN ._.

39_CD Paralysis_NN ._.
One_CD case_NN of_IN paralysis_NN of_IN the_DT insane_NN was_VBD under_IN treatment_NN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC death_NN was_VBD caused_VBN by_IN a_DT casual_JJ attack_NN of_IN pneumonia_NN ._.
Shaik_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, aged_VBD 55_CD ,_, a_DT bheesti_NN by_IN profession_NN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN an_DT inmate_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN over_IN four_CD years_NNS ._.

12_CD due_JJ him_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT hurried_JJ unsteady_JJ walk_NN ,_, were_VBD the_DT chief_JJ symptoms_NNS of_IN the_DT brain_NN disease_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT 1st_CD November_NNP 1872_CD ,_, until_IN his_PRP$ death_NN on_IN the_DT 28th_CD May_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ temperature_NN was_VBD recorded_VBN twice_RB daily_RB ._.

On_IN the_DT 24th_CD May_NNP he_PRP was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN pneumonia_NN ,_, which_WDT ran_VBD a_DT very_RB acute_JJ course_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN the_DT highest_JJS point_NN registered_VBD was_VBD 104_CD ,_, on_IN the_DT fourth_JJ 104_CD 4_CD '_POS ._.
Pneumonia_NNP ._.
Pneumonia_NNP was_VBD less_RBR prevalent_JJ in_IN 1873_CD than_IN in_IN 1872_CD ;_: but_CC still_RB the_DT admissions_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS from_IN this_DT disease_NN were_VBD excessive_JJ ._.

of_IN the_DT total_JJ admissions_NNS ;_: in_IN 1872_CD ,_, 6.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, 2.8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN due_JJ to_TO this_DT cause_NN has_VBZ risen_VBN greatly_RB ._.

;_: in_IN 1872_CD ,_, 45_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP jail_NN the_DT deaths_NNS to_TO seizures_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN were_VBD only_RB 21.7_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1872_CD ,_, this_DT frequency_NN of_IN inflammation_NN of_IN the_DT lungs_NNS was_VBD referred_VBN to_TO the_DT vitiated_VBN air_NN developed_VBN in_IN the_DT overcrowded_JJ cells_NNS ._.
On_IN this_DT point_NN my_PRP$ opinion_NN is_VBZ unaltered_JJ ._.
As_RB long_RB as_IN only_RB 28_CD superficial_JJ feet_NNS per_IN man_NN is_VBZ the_DT average_JJ allowance_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB most_RBS crowded_VBD only_RB 26_CD feet_NNS are_VBP available_JJ ,_, we_PRP can_MD not_RB expect_VB affections_NNS of_IN the_DT lungs_NNS to_TO diminish_VB in_IN frequency_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, undoubtedly_RB true_JJ that_IN since_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT clinical_JJ thermometer_NN ,_, many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, formerly_RB entered_VBD as_IN remittent_NN fever_NN ,_, are_VBP now_RB correctly_RB classified_VBN ._.
The_DT commence-_JJ ment_NN of_IN pneumonia_NN in_IN a_DT debilitated_JJ lunatic_NN is_VBZ most_RBS insidious_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT faint_NN respiratory_NN sounds_VBZ heard_VBN through_IN the_DT stethoscope_NN are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO deceive_VB the_DT listener_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT thermometer_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT careful_JJ estimate_NN of_IN the_DT symptoms_NNS ,_, a_DT correct_JJ diagnosis_NN is_VBZ always_RB certain_JJ ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD not_RB confined_VBN to_TO any_DT particular_JJ season_NN ._.
Three_CD cases_NNS were_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN January_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN February_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN August_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN September_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN November_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT following_JJ months40_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP In_IN the_DT list_NN of_IN physical_JJ causes_NNS ,_, we_PRP find_VBP cholera_JJ ,_, fever_RB ,_, debility_NN ,_, leprosy_JJ ,_, and_CC syphilis_NN ,_, enumerated_VBN ._.

In_IN each_DT vertigo_NN is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ symptom_NN ._.

41_CD Restraint_NNP ._.
Table_JJ 15_CD shows_VBZ the_DT number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS confined_VBN in_IN solitary_JJ cells_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
All_DT lunatics_NNS on_IN first_JJ admission_NN are_VBP separately_RB confined_VBN for_IN at_IN least_JJS a_DT week_NN ,_, being_VBG taken_VBN out_RP daily_JJ to_TO be_VB bathed_VBN and_CC fed_VBN ._.

and_CC to_TO stop_VB their_PRP$ allowance_NN of_IN tobacco_NN and_CC pn_NN ._.

Lunatics_NNS employed_VBN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB supposed_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN that_DT number_NN did_VBD on_IN any_DT day_NN a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT old_JJ inmates_NNS ,_, and_CC most_JJS of_IN those_DT affected_JJ with_IN chronic_JJ mental_JJ disease_NN ,_, do_VBP little_JJ real_JJ work_NN ;_: but_CC a_DT good_JJ object_NN is_VBZ attained_VBN if_IN ,_, in_IN such_JJ instances_NNS ,_, they_PRP can_MD be_VB got_VBN to_TO employ_VB themselves_PRP at_IN work_NN ,_, however_RB light_NN ._.
It_PRP keeps_VBZ them_PRP out_IN of_IN mischief_NN by_IN placing_VBG them_PRP directly_RB under_IN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT keepers_NNS ,_, and_CC while_IN so_RB engaged_VBN their_PRP$ minds_NNS are_VBP diverted_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ morbid_NN thoughts_NNS and_CC delusions_NNS ._.

There_EX is_VBZ an_DT apparent_JJ large_JJ increase_NN this_DT year_NN under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN ``_`` diet_JJ ._. ''_''

The_DT year_NN 1872_CD was_VBD exceptional_JJ ,_, as_IN vegetables_NNS ,_, milk_NN ,_, and_CC oils_NNS ,_, were_VBD issued_VBN gratis_NN by_IN Government_NNP ._.
This_DT year_NN vegetables_NNS have_VBP been_VBN supplied_VBN at_IN the_DT contract_NN rate_NN ,_, while_IN milk_NN ,_, castor_NN and_CC mustard_NN oils_NNS ,_, have_VBP been_VBN sold_VBN at_IN prices_NNS below_IN the_DT bazar_NN rates_NNS ,_, namely_RB at_IN prime_JJ cost_NN ._.

F_NNP 42_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP Extended_NNP accommodation_NN necessary_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB clear_JJ ,_, from_IN the_DT returns_NNS now_RB submitted_VBN and_CC those_DT of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, that_IN much_JJ remains_NNS to_TO be_VB done_VBN to_TO render_VB the_DT Dacca_NNP asylum_VBZ a_DT fit_JJ residence_NN for_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS of_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ._.

Superficial_JJ area_NN of_IN asylum_NN buildings_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD laid_VBN down_RP in_IN Government_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
796_CD of_IN the_DT 24th_CD February_NNP 1873_CD ,_, ``_`` that_IN the_DT minimum_JJ amount_NN of_IN accommodation_NN to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO inmates_NNS of_IN lunatic_JJ asylums_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, whenever_WRB practicable_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_VB 50_CD superficial_JJ feet_NNS ._. ''_''
During_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN the_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN males_NNS sleeping_VBG in_IN the_DT asylum_NN was_VBD 196_CD ,_, with_IN only_RB 22_CD superficial_JJ feet_NNS of_IN room_NN ._.

43_CD The_DT average_JJ monthly_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT man_NN last_JJ year_NN in_IN the_DT asylum_NN was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
7-10_JJ per_IN mensem_NN ._.
The_DT saving_NN effected_VBN by_IN this_DT system_NN is_VBZ therefore_RB considerable_JJ ._.
The_DT chief_JJ obstacle_NN to_TO the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT scheme_NN is_VBZ the_DT dread_NN that_WDT native_JJ gentlemen_NNS entertain_NN of_IN being_VBG held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT escape_NN or_CC illness_NN of_IN any_DT boarder_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT object_NN of_IN Government_NNP is_VBZ properly_RB understood_JJ ,_, this_DT apprehension_NN will_MD doubtless_VB disappear_NN ._.
For_IN many_JJ obvious_JJ reasons_NNS the_DT boarding_VBG out_IN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN a_DT populous_JJ and_CC very_RB immoral_JJ city_NN is_VBZ objectionable_JJ ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT other_JJ course_NN to_TO adopt_VB ,_, unless_IN the_DT residents_NNS of_IN the_DT suburbs_NNS can_MD be_VB got_VBN to_TO interest_NN themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT experiment_NN ._.

Overseer_NNP ._.
The_DT overseer_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Camilliri_NNP ,_, continues_VBZ to_TO give_VB satisfaction_NN ._.
He_PRP takes_VBZ much_RB genuine_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN promoting_VBG the_DT various_JJ industrial_JJ works_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
His_PRP$ influence_NN over_IN the_DT inmates_NNS is_VBZ considerable_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP appreciate_VBP his_PRP$ kindness_NN and_CC thoughtfulness_NN ._.
Native_JJ doctor_NN ._.
Attendants_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP nothing_NN to_TO add_VB to_TO my_PRP$ former_JJ reports_NNS regarding_VBG native_JJ doctor_NN Prosono_NNP Coomar_NNP Sein_NNP ,_, but_CC that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ continued_VBN to_TO show_VB unusual_JJ intelligence_NN and_CC attention_NN in_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN for_IN regret_NN that_WDT Government_NNP has_VBZ not_RB as_IN yet_RB seen_VBN fit_NN to_TO reward_VB him_PRP according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ deserts_NNS ._.

The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT keepers_NNS has_VBZ not_RB effected_VBN any_DT change_NN in_IN the_DT standard_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP serve_VBP as_IN keepers_NNS ._.

2_CD ._.
Statement_JJ No_NNP ._.
1_CD shows_NNS that_IN the_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ again_RB been_VBN overcrowded_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT transfer_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS from_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS had_VBD to_TO be_VB almost_RB stopped_VBN ,_, and_CC only_RB those_DT from_IN Cuttack_NNP and_CC adjoining_VBG districts_NNS of_IN Orissa_NNP could_MD be_VB admitted_VBN ._.
The_DT overcrowding_NN has_VBZ been_VBN confined_VBN to_TO the_DT male-wards_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ accommodation_NN for_IN 31_CD males_NNS ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ male_JJ population_NN has_VBZ been_VBN 40.5_CD ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD 44_CD males_NNS remaining_VBG at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ a_DT tendency_NN to_TO a_DT yearly_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT present_JJ asylum_NN is_VBZ too_RB small_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
A_DT project_NN for_IN building_VBG a_DT new_JJ asylum_NN for_IN from_IN 80_CD to_TO 100_CD lunatics_NNS has_VBZ ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, received_VBD the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
New_NNP asylum_NN ._.
A_DT site_NN has_VBZ been_VBN selected_VBN between_IN the_DT new_JJ general_JJ hospital_NN and_CC Jobra_NNP irrigation_NN work-_JJ shops_NNS ,_, at_IN a_DT considerable_JJ distance_NN from_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT plan_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ asylum_NN ,_, with_IN arrange-_JJ ment_NN of_IN ground_NN and_CC buildings_NNS ,_, are_VBP now_RB under_IN consideration_NN ._.

Table_JJ V.CUTTACK_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ._.
63_CD the_DT insanity_NN commences_NNS with_IN acute_NN or_CC active_JJ symptoms_NNS except_IN in_IN very_RB exceptional_JJ cases_NNS ,_, as_IN in_IN acute_JJ ganja_NN or_CC dhatura_NN madness_NN ,_, or_CC after_IN some_DT very_RB severe_JJ mental_NN shock_NN ;_: and_CC even_RB the_DT latter_NN will_MD seldom_VB derange_VB a_DT healthy_JJ brain_NN ._.
In_IN most_JJS cases_NNS of_IN insanity_NN the_DT disease_NN commences_NNS by_IN gradually_RB insidious_JJ steps_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ chronic_JJ ,_, one_CD may_MD say_VB ,_, for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN before_IN it_PRP becomes_VBZ acute_JJ ._.

In_IN most_JJS cases_NNS after_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, when_WRB recovery_NN does_VBZ not_RB take_VB place_NN ,_, a_DT condition_NN of_IN dementia_NN supervenes_NNS ;_: but_CC in_IN this_DT ,_, again_RB ,_, patients_NNS are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO attacks_NNS of_IN mania_NN with_IN excite-_JJ ment64_NNS REPORT_NNP ON_VBD THE_NNP Conduct_NNP of_IN establishment_NN ._.
The_DT compounder_NN is_VBZ not_RB as_IN yet_RB very_RB skilful_JJ as_IN an_DT English_NNP clerk_NN and_CC book-keeper_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP is_VBZ steady_JJ and_CC industrious_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ taking_VBG pains_NNS to_TO qualify_VB himself_PRP for_IN the_DT post_NN ._.

2_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

The_DT daily_JJ average_NN of_IN sick_NN was_VBD slightly_RB in_IN excess_NN of_IN that_DT in_IN 1872_CD ,_, but_CC greatly_RB less_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT four_CD preceding_NN years_NNS ._.

Bayu_NNP ''_'' (_( vertigo_FW ._. )_)
``_`` Associated_VBN with_IN fever_NN in_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS is_VBZ bayu_JJ ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT natives_NNS commonly_RB ascribe_VBP their_PRP$ madness_NN ._.
This_DT term_NN means_VBZ ``_`` swimming_VBG of_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, or_CC vertigo_NN ._. ''_''
A_DT man_NN says_VBZ he_PRP was_VBD out_RP in_IN his_PRP$ field_NN ploughing_VBG the_DT ground_NN when_WRB suddenly_RB he_PRP was_VBD seized_VBN with_IN bayu_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT time_NN he_PRP remembers_VBZ nothing_NN until_IN perhaps_RB his_PRP$ admission_NN into_IN the_DT asylum_NN ._.
This_DT bayu_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT sign_NN of_IN weakness_NN from_IN one_CD cause_NN or_CC another_DT ._.
Under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN debility_NN (_( bayu_NN )_) ,_, eight_CD individuals_NNS (_( strangely_RB all_DT males_NNS )_) are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB become_VBN insane_NN ,_, i.e_NN ._.
2.13_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_JJ treated_JJ ._.
Epilepsy._NNP ``_``
Epilepsy_NN was_VBD assigned_VBN as_IN the_DT cause_NN in_IN 4_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT cases_NNS in_IN 1872_CD ;_: in_IN 1873_CD the_DT percentage_NN was_VBD 2.6_CD ;_: and_CC in_IN 1874_CD it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN 2.13_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
Of_IN eight_CD cases_NNS ,_, six_CD were_VBD males_NNS and_CC two_CD females_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT ,_, one_CD (_( male_NN )_) died_VBD ._.

of_IN total_JJ treated_VBN ._.

Debauchery_NNP ._.

of_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBD ._.

Grief._NNP ``_``
Grief_NN caused_VBD madness_NN in_IN 16.53_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_JJ cases_NNS treated_VBD ._.

The_DT most_RBS common_JJ causes_NNS of_IN great_JJ grief_NN were_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN relatives_NNS ,_, loss_NN of_IN property_NN and_CC of_IN law-suits_NNS ,_, and_CC domestic_JJ troubles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT desortion_NN of_IN husband_NN from_IN wife_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN Fear._NNP ``_``
The_DT cases_NNS which_WDT are_VBP attributed_VBN to_TO fear_VB are_VBP associated_VBN with_IN the_DT imaginary_JJ sight_NN of_IN ghosts_NNS ,_, goblins_NNS ,_, and_CC evil-spirits_NNS ._.
Bhuts_NNS and_CC dynes_NNS are_VBP familiar_JJ objects_NNS of_IN terror_NN with_IN the_DT lower_JJR classes_NNS of_IN this_DT country_NN ._.
Religion._NNP ``_``
Exaltation_NN of_IN feeling_NN ,_, with_IN perverted_JJ judgment_NN ,_, or_CC low_JJ melancholy_NN ,_, attributable_JJ to_TO associations_NNS of_IN religion_NN ,_, occurred_VBD in_IN five_CD cases_NNS (_( four_CD males_NNS and_CC one_CD female_NN )_) ,_, accounting_VBG ,_, together_RB ,_, for_IN only_RB 1.33_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_JJ treated_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Over-study._JJ ``_``
The_DT cases_NNS associated_VBN with_IN studious_JJ habits_NNS also_RB occurred_VBD at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN 1.33_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
At_IN one_CD time_NN we_PRP see_VBP an_DT individual_JJ whose_WP$ madness_NN is_VBZ altogether_RB mixed_JJ up_RP with_IN thoughts_NNS of_IN priests_NNS ,_, purans_NNS ,_, and_CC muntras_NNS ._.
At_IN another_DT the_DT Koran_NNP or_CC the_DT Bible_NNP is_VBZ the_DT centre_NN of_IN much_JJ incoherent_NN thought_NN ._.
One_CD Hindu_NNP ,_, now_RB in_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN never_RB moved_VBD anywhere_RB without_IN a_DT small_JJ flute_NN and_CC a_DT large_JJ copy_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ testament_NN in_IN Bengali_NNP ,_, from_IN each_DT of_IN which_WDT he_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO derive_VB equal_JJ comfort_NN and_CC joy_NN ._.
At_IN last_JJ he_PRP destroyed_VBD the_DT sacred_JJ book_NN and_CC broke_VBD his_PRP$ flute_NN ,_, and_CC since_IN then_RB he_PRP has_VBZ never_RB been_VBN so_RB happy_JJ as_IN before_RB ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT practical_JJ tests_NNS in_IN an_DT Indian_JJ asylum_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN of_IN mind_NN of_IN Muhammadans_NNPS is_VBZ the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT ,_, and_CC the_DT frequency_NN with_IN which_WDT ,_, they_PRP attend_VBP to_TO their_PRP$ prayers_NNS and_CC other_JJ religious_JJ duties_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN many_JJ a_DT good_JJ Mussulman_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN paying_VBG due_JJ attention_NN to_TO his_PRP$ prescribed_JJ religious_JJ duties_NNS ,_, the_DT approach_NN of_IN a_DT relapse_NN of_IN insanity_NN is_VBZ indicated_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ evincing_VBG a_DT sudden_JJ and_CC total_JJ disregard_NN for_IN all_DT such_JJ matters_NNS ._. ''_''
Restraint_NN and_CC seclusion_NN ._.
49_CD ._.
No_DT mechanical_JJ restraint_NN is_VBZ employed_VBN in_IN this_DT asylum_NN ;_: 104_CD patients_NNS were_VBD secluded_VBN during_IN the_DT year._NN ``_``

*_JJ DACCA.RESOLUTION_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP INSANE_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP FOR_NNP 1874_CD ._.
MEDICAL_NNP ._.
CALCUTTA_NNP ,_, THE_NNP 9TH_CD NOVEMBER_NNP 1875_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) observed_VBN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ._.
The_DT patients_NNS belong_VBP chiefly_NN to_TO the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS of_IN society_NN ,_, being_VBG cultivators_NNS ,_, domestic_JJ servants_NNS ,_, beggars_NNS ,_, coolies_NNS ,_, or_CC shop-keepers_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP principally_RB drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT large_JJ towns_NNS where_WRB the_DT asylums_NNS are_VBP situated_VBN ,_, or_CC from_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN ._.
Cachar_NNP and_CC Sylhet_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, continue_VBP to_TO send_VB to_TO our_PRP$ asylums_NNS an_DT exceptionally_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN insanes_NNS ._.
The_DT age_NN of_IN the_DT insanes_NNS when_WRB brought_NN to_TO the_DT asylums_NNS continues_VBZ to_TO range_VB generally_RB from_IN 20_CD to_TO 40_CD years_NNS ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN remarking_VBG on_IN the_DT increased_VBN mortality_NN of_IN the_DT asylums_NNS ,_, the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP observes_VBZ that_IN while_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT excess_NN over_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN five_CD years_NNS previous_JJ of_IN 28.8_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN the_DT absolute_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, the_DT death-rates_NNS yet_RB remained_VBD nearly_RB the_DT same_JJ ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_IN the_DT ratio_NN of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD 13.3_CD ,_, or_CC precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN the_DT average_NN of_IN five_CD years_NNS previously_RB :_: while_IN the_DT ratio_NN to_TO the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN patients_NNS treated_VBN was_VBD slightly_RB increased_VBN ,_, having_VBG been_VBN 9.3_CD against_IN 8.9_CD ._.
Contrasting_VBG the_DT ratio_NN borne_NN by_IN deaths_NNS to_TO average_JJ strength_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP with_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ figures_NNS for_IN asylums_NNS in_IN other_JJ presidencies_NNS ,_, we_PRP have_VBP the_DT following_JJ table_NN :_: (_( 3_CD )_) lunatics_NNS as_IN above_IN indicated_VBN ,_, the_DT numbers_NNS are_VBP not_RB given_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP trusts_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT extension_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN which_WDT has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN ordered_VBN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ,_, all_DT room_NN for_IN apprehension_NN in_IN the_DT future_NN on_IN the_DT score_NN of_IN overcrowding_VBG will_MD cease_VB ._.
6_CD ._.
Taking_VBG the_DT asylums_NNS separately_RB ,_, the_DT general_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN may_MD be_VB summarised_VBN thus_RB :_: (_( 4_CD )_) 11_CD ._.
